1b1(1): rgya ga swA dang/ ar+yA ba 'i pung+ya sa la glan nam ma hA ya na s+yAtra/ bong skad du/ 'phags pa la ba dang
1b2(1): mjal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ dam po dang go// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa
1b3(1): na gyismra dang / rlung sangs rgyas thams cad la dag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag glos zlos pa'i dus gcig na/ bco ldan
1b4(1): 'das grol 'grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dul bdul ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ zhi bzhi pa'i la dir dang ltung ba/ rgol
1b5(1): rgol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'khor dang
3a1(1): / dan gyi mthar grug pa ra gyi mthar thug pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid bsgoms pa bdag tha~Md bsgoms pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ kun / 
3a2(1): pa'i rnyog pa med pa kun tu rtog pa'i rtog pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa/ rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ lus
3a3(1): kyi 'du byed rab tu gsal ba lus kyi 'du byed rab tu gsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa/ mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa'i 'khor dang
3a4(1): ldan pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sems shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba shes rab shin tu rnam par grol
3a5(1): ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa 'phags pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dabal dang / lhag ma dang / shun lpags kyi skyon dang bral ba
3a6(1): dag pa snying po la gnas pa/ shAkya'i yul ser skya'i gnas shing na mo d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na/ lnga sde dang grags byin dang / 'char ga dang / lteng rgyas 'od srungs/ 
3b1(1): dang / gA ya 'od srungs dang / chu klung 'od srungs dang / 'od srung chen po dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu la sogs pa dge slong stong zhes brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen phra
3b2(1): thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba shes rab shin tu rnam
3b3(1): bar grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po// bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ sred pa kun tu sbyor ba/ yongasu zad pa/ yang dag pa'i
3b4(1): shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang / thabs cig ste/ de'i tshe nam gyi tho rangs kyi res la/ 
3b5(1): bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bltas te/ bla gab med pa na bzhug so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
3b6(1): cang mi smra ba la gzig so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la gzigs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong gang gis rgyal po zas
3b7(1): gtsang ma mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu 'ga' zhig tshol cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u dir+ya stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ 
4a1(1): @pus mo g.yas pa'i ldangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
4a2(1): bcom ldan 'das bdag gas rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bgyi'o// da gad nas 'phel pa ma che bcom ldan 'das kyis su rigs// 'du rna la 'di skad ces ga 'astsal
4a3(1): to/ ko'u dir khyod ni blam bla mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug shig/ de ba'i tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / grags sbyin dang / lteng rgyas 'od srungs
4a4(1): dngang chu rung 'od srungs dang / ga ya 'od srungs dang / 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos kyang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas
4a5(1): to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po
4a6(1): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'ga' gyi bu khyod kyang bla ma Ta mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba byin gyis 'dug shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po
4a7(1): 'di ji snyam du sems te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed pa'i dge slong gang zhig bcom ldan 'gyu ba zed snyam ste/ dede nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos
4b1(1): ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/ de ltar mnyam par banag pa'i sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'chad cing / dge slong 'chad
4b2(1): ka 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do zhes dgongs pa mthong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa re'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa char
4b3(1): ga la ba der song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das ni khyod la dge slong 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par
4b4(1): dad par bya bar nus so zhes dgongs shing bzhed do// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de lta yin gyis khyod kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya bar dad pa bskyed cig de skad ces
4b5(1): smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rigs rnams ni dad par bya
4b6(1): bar shin tu dka' ste/ rgyal po'i rigs ni lhag par dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi ras dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka' ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'a
4b7(1): kyi bu chen po 'di lnga stong dper na/ shing khur bcu 'am nyi shu'am/ sum cu 'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ shing khur brgya yang rung ste/ gshir bag med cing / sam la
5a1(1): mang du lon pa zhig yod/ de la mi la la zhig gis/ me btang na me'i phung po chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de la yang la la zhig gis mar ram/ 'bru mar gyis gtor na po'i phung ba
5a2(1): de bas ches che bar 'bar te/ de'i steng ngam rlung gi 'khor du 'gro ba ni shin tu dka'o// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu rin po de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams rnapa/ 
5a3(1): bar dka'o// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na glang po che mche ba can kha gdangs pa'i so zag tu 'gro ba ni shin tu dka'o// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bzhin
5a4(1): du/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams kyang mgu bar dka'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di
5a5(1): skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ni de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod ni dge slong 'char ka 'dis/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya bar nus so zhes/ bcom ldan
5a6(1): 'das kyis dgongs shing bzhed pa yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang bar byed par dgongs sam/ 
5a7(1): sbas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char kang de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'char ka ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byed do// zhes dgongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
5b1(1): kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni yang rangs dad par bya'i/ yang na khyod
5b2(1): kyis dad par bya'o// 'char ka nga'i nyan thos ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gi rang na khyod ni 'di ltar rigs dad par byed pa'i mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa
5b3(1): 'char ka la tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka bzang po nga las mnyan par byos// khyod ni rigs dang byed mchog rab yin gyis// shAkya'i rigs rnams dga' bskyed pa yi/ 
5b4(1): rgyal po'i dam pa myur du dang bar byos// rgyal po rab de dad par byas nas ni// rigs ni kyi bu lha dag dang ni mi rnams la// mtha' dbus med pa'i legs pa 'byung 'gyur gyis// mi
5b5(1): yi dam pa myur du dad par byos// da lta na ni shAkya'i bdag po de// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rtag pas dkrugs shing nyams// ri'i ngos nas dbab 'dril mi bzhin du// brtson 'grus rtsol ba
5b6(1): thams cad btang ste gnas// dbang phyug nyams pa rjes su dran byed pas// yid la gnod 'gyur sems dang yid kyang stor// dper na tshong pa nor dang bral ba dag/ rjes su dran zhing
5b7(1): nyon mongs gnas pa bzhin// lha'i gnas nas lha dag shi 'phos shing // lha rdzas 'dod pa rjes su dran pa bzhin// rgyal ba'i bstan pa mngon par mi shes shing // rgyal po bde nyam/ 
6a1(1): nga ra gas 'an/ ngas na pa ma ni snru ba dang / mis ldan su mchogs pa bzhi dung / yongs dud drug ni nas sa dran byed byed// sa dra ga
6a2(1): ste sngags 'dzin// nAdangs phrog 'byed pa'i stobs can gyis// ji ltar ma zhig yongs su nan gror ma// bdag kyang me shes gtan yang mi shes ltar// sna'i bdag pade yang du bdun
6a3(1): suM gangs kyi bas bsgribs gyur na// ji ltar mi dag bltar bu mi mthong ba/ de bzhin rdul chen bsdu bsgribs pas na// rgyal por ba bar bya ba mi mthong // nyid kyis lag sum
6a4(1): shi bas smos gyur pa'i// mis ni rang gi sems kyang mi shes te/ de bzhin da rgyal chen pos smras pas// rgyal po des kyang dge ba shes so// dper na khyim tha
6a5(1): bas myos pa yi// bud med snying rjer smre sngags 'don byed pa/ de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas// rgyal po de yang snying rjer smre sngags 'don// de lta
6a6(1): pas ni 'char ka thabs mkhas pa/ khyod kyis 'dir ni rgyal po dad par gyis// nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bskal par byos/ chos kyi rgyal man+t+ra nA dAm pa blang
6a7(1): bar brjes par gakhyod ma gtags pasrid pa ma mi bdag nan la mthun zu med ngas rgyam 'i sems ni rab tu dang byang/ gajigs
6b1(1): dge slong gang yang med/ 'char ka sngon gyi d+has nAs// 'das yi b+hU du mi bdag po nig/ ming ni bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba ste// / sa
6b2(1): skyong byed pa rnam par grags pa byung // de ni chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod// rgya mtsho'i tha mar thug pa'i sa
6b3(1): 'di ni// chos dang ldan par rgyal po des kyang sbyangs// grong dang grong khyor dag kyang bad ba nye zhing // bza' shing 'bras bu me tog rgyas pas gang // 'phags
6b4(1): pa'i skye bo dag dang shed las skyes// sdig dang bral ba rnams kyis rab tu gang // dri za brgya stong dag gis gang bste// sdong du ma tsher ma rtsa shing ngan pa med// 'jam zhing dge sbyong gnas
6b5(1): kyi tshogs kyis spras// chu klung 'babs stegs bde bas rab tu rgan// drang srong tshogs brgya rjes su rgyu ba ste// k+She bo'i dkar chos rnams kyis kun tu bsgrubs/ ngan song lam ngan rnams ni rab tu
6b6(1): d+hinanasams thams cad ldaganas 'byung // rgyal po de la bdag yodapa ni// rgyun gyi sangs rgyas myong ba mdzang ba'o/ dge pa'in padag ni bskyed pa can// yon tan mang pos pazhes pa'i blogs pa/ 
6b7(1): ming ni blo zas snying po zhes byaste// srog chags bre ba khrag khrig rnams kyi mchog/ 'dod pa rnam la sngon du lta ba can// mi bdag khyim na gnas kyang dben la dgab/ rdul ba dben pa 'phel zhes bya dres
6b8(1): yi pho brang 'dra ba'i khyu mchog 'dir// na cung tshogs
7a1(1): kyis kun nas mdun bdar te// 'dod pa'i yon tan bzang la spyod ces smras// bu'i dam pa khyod la nga yis ni// ji ltar 'dod pa'i bya ba gang ma byas// 'dod pa
7a2(1): rnams la khyod yid ci yi phyir// ma mos nga la bu yis myur du smos// srid pa'i 'gro ba'i yon tan mkhas bgyis te// bu khyod rin chen khyim la dga' ba bskyed// bud med rin
7a3(1): chen 'khor dang 'grogs bgyis te// yul la dga' zhing mos pa bskyed par gyis// dka' thub gnas na 'khod pa'i drang srong dag/ de btang ras ni phyir yang 'di dag na/ 
7a4(1): dka' thub btang zhing 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod// 'dod pa de dag bu gcig khyod la stabs// de lta bas na 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod// nga dang rgyal srid thams cad khyod dang 'bru
7a5(1): rnam thos bu yi gnas dang 'dra ba ste// gnol med khang gi rgyan can khyim 'dir spyod// 'di dag rnams kyang mchog gi gzugs ldan zhing // lha mo 'dra la sgyu rtsal mtshar phyin pa/ 
7a6(1): ral mo sna yi tshul dang gru la mkhas// bsnyen bkur bsnyems shing yon tan yid kyang 'brog/ mig ni badz+ra'i lo ma 'dra ba ste// bim pa'i mdog 'drim du mdzes yid du
7a7(1): 'ong so dang bzhin mdog dri ma med cing bzang // phra la smin ma legs shing mgul bsdug/ badz+ra ni glang po che yi sna yang 'dra// brag so shas rgyas thal gong legs dang / 
7b1(1): ldan / lag pa rkang pa'i mthil ri zangs kyi bamadog/ sor ro byad kyis phra bar legs dang ldan// lce ni zangs mdog 'dra la srab cing dag tshig ran 'jam par smra ba'i tshul dang ldan
7b2(1): sa ni zag bzangs so rnams rang rong med// che ba rab dkar mchog gi brgyan dang ldan// lto ba phyang der 'dug cing lta ba sdug/ sta zur yangs shing rmed pa rdo rje 'dra// byin pa glang po
7b3(1): che yi so 'dra zhing / mda' rgyu snying po legs par skyes pa bzhin// dregs cas glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros dang ldan// gzhan du mi sems yid kyis khyod la lha// rtse ba 'dod cing da
7b4(1): la bab dang ldan// gnoru snying rje ltos la brtse ba byos// bu cig khyod dang bud med 'di dag gi/ mdog bzang ba dang dar la bab pa yang // shing gi rtse mo'i me tog bzhir ltung
7b5(1): gis// nga rgyal mthong la 'dod pa bster bar bgyis// blo gros snying po ldan des smras pa yi// pha dang 'khor rnams kun la 'di skad smras// yab cig khyod ni mang bar gsung
7b6(1): kha lags gang dag tshig gis grags pa ma smad mang // yon tan rnams la mos pa bdag gi tshig/ bsams te gtan la ba ba la rgyal po gson// ji ltar rmi lam
7b7(1): na yang 'dod la bdag/ sems mi dga' zhing ma mos de 'dra son// sa'i bdag pos bka' stsal 'di dag ni// mkhas pa rnams la mdzes pa ma lags te/ ma
8a1(1): @mkhas skye bo dag gis yang dag bsams/ mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag rtag tu sla// long ba ma lags ci'i rtswa zhig gis// long ba'i tshig gis la mgol
8a2(1): 'dzin par bgyid// zang la gnas ba su zhig ji ltar na// mgon med chus khyer ba la 'dod pa skyed// grol ba ji lta bu na bcings pa yi// tshig gis btson ra der ni 'jug par
8a3(1): bgyid// sa mnyam gnas shing ma 'khrul ji ltar na// nyam ngar gnas la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid// sa bdag 'dod pa rnams la chags bcas shing // 'dod pa'i longs spyod
8a4(1): dag gis chus khyer ba// long ba chus khyer brtson par gnas pa dang // nyam ngar gnas 'drar bdag ni de skam bgyid// mi'i bdag po khyod ni long ba bzhin// bdag mig can
8a5(1): khyad par mthong ba lags/ khyod ni 'dod pa'i chu bos khyer ba lags// bdag ni 'dod pa rnams la rnam par smod// 'dod pa dag ni dug gi lo ma bzhin// sbrul gyi ma/ 
8a6(1): 'dra sdug bsngal bgyid pa ste// rtse gsum pa dang ral gri mdung thung 'dra/ me'i phung po shin tu 'bar ba bzhin// blo gros snying po ldan pas de skad du// smre sngags 'don
8a7(1): pa'i ba dang 'khor la smras// rin chen sna bdun dag lam bltas par// rgyal sring rnam par spangs te rab tu byung // sbrul gyi bags rnying rjes paco 'drang ngo // ngar slabs
8b1(1): nus pa'i thal ba bzhin spangs te// blo gros snying po ldan daphyogs med pa// sdig pa rnam par bral te rab tu byung // gzho ru de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas/ zor ba'i bu zhig rjes
8b2(1): su rab byang ba// ming ni zla bas byin zhes bya ba ste// blo gros snying po'i rjes su rab tu byung // gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas// tshangs pa'i gnas ni bzhi po bskyed nas raM/ 
8b3(1): grogs dang bcas pas mngon par shes pa las// ma lus mtha' dag bskyed par byas par gyur// 'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta bas na// mi'i seng ge de ni 'dod khams 'das
8b4(1): tshangs pa yang dag nyid ni thob bya'i phyir// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba byas// de ltar gnonu rab tu byung bas na// pha de bu lam dang gyur pa dang / zla bas byin pa
8b5(1): de'i gan song nas// legs par bshad pa'i tshig gis dga' bar byas// 'char ka khyod ni de la ci snyam sems// de tshe blo gros snying po gzhan snyam 'am// nga nyid de yi
8b6(1): tshe na der gyur te// 'dod pa'i longs spyod don du gnyer ba med// 'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems// bden pa 'phel ba gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am// mi yi bdag
8b7(1): po zas gtsang 'di nyid de'i/ rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya bar gyur// 'char ka khyod ni de la ci snyam sems// rjes su rab byung sa byin gzhar snyam 'am/ khyod zhing ngan
9a1(1): de'i dus na ni// bden pa 'phel ba dad pa byed pa yin// de lta bas na 'char ka khyod kyis 'dir// rgyal po zas gtsang dad pa mngon skyed cig/ sa skyong byed pa 'di ni
9a2(1): dang gyur na// skyid pa chen po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das la mi smra bas khas blangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas zhag
9a3(1): de 'das nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i btsur mo'i 'khor
9a4(1): gyi mdun na/ shAkya stong tsam zhig dgos pa zhig gi ched du 'dus shing 'khod do// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su byon nas/ ser skya'i gnas
9a5(1): 'di nyid na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas bdag ni dbang phyug gis longs spyod chen po la nyam
9a6(1): par byas so// gral te gnon nu de khyim na gnas na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' ba nyid rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun
9a7(1): ngangaldan par gyur te/ de'i rin po che sde bdun na 'di dag ste/ 'di lta 'khor la rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / na rin pa che dang / nor bu rin pa che dang / bung med
9b1(1): rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po re ste 'di bdun ro// de la bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhar gyi sde rab tu 'jom
9b2(1): pa stong yang tshang bar 'gyur ba zhig/ des gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang chud pa med cing mtshon gyis 'da' ba med la/ mnyam snyom mnyam pa med/ 
9b3(1): cing / chos dang 'thun par legs par phab nas bskal pa rdzogs par bskyangs par gyur pa zhig ste/ de ltar gyur na bdag cag kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la
9b4(1): dbang phyug gi dbang dang ldan zhing / rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa dang / dbang phyug gi dbang phyug
9b5(1): chen po yang rnyed par 'gyur ba zhig na/ de ltar bdag cag ni gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas/ de lta bu'i longs spyod kyi dbang chen po dang bral bar gyur to// snyam mo// des de/ 
9b6(1): snyam du bsams nas/ shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/ nga'i bu de la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur byed par su yang ma 'gro shig/ la la zhig nga'i bu de blta ba 'am/ bsnyen
9b7(1): bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro na// de'i lus la gnod pa'i chad pas gcad do// de'i tshe shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nas byung nas song bar gyur te/ 
10a1(1): shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char
10a2(1): ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshun byon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa leg so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun yang ring zhig nas byon to// 
10a3(1): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi
10a4(1): mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char
10a5(1): kas shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin la 'di skad ces smras so// dga' ba'i bzhin de bzhin te bcom ldan 'das la bskur mi mnga'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde bar banus
10a6(1): so// mi bde ba mi mnga'o// de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med de// bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do// shAkya'i bu shin tu leg
10a7(1): par sa kyis kyang kya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin cha dang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan cig dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas/ 'khor de nas byang ste/ tshad nga ldan pa 'tshar kag/ 
10b1(1): la ba der song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur byon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa leg so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char
10b2(1): yang ring zhig nas byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la bskrun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ 
10b3(1): de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / che dang
10b4(1): ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad la 'di skad ces smras so// shin tu legs par sad de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la bskrun mi mnga'o// stobs dang
10b5(1): ldan no// bde bar bzhugs so// mi bde ba mi mnga'o// de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o// bde bar byon to// mnyal ba med do// bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do// 
10b6(1): shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral gyis kyang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang / shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin dang / shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad gnas dben pa na 'khod
10b7(1): par mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka chur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa
11a1(1): @'char ka byon pa legs so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhiganas byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la bskur mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang
11a2(1): ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel dam/ bsod snyoms
11a3(1): kyis 'o ma brgyal dam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu bya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral la/ 'di skad ces smras so// mya ngar med dang mya ngan bral/ bcom ldan
11a4(1): 'das la bskur mi mnga'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhugs so// mi bde ba mi mnga'o// de la nyam ba ci yang pi mnga'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod skor
11a5(1): kyis 'o rgyal ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i
11a6(1): phyir brtson par byed do// de skad ces smras pa dang / shAkya'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa 'char ka bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das ni le
11a7(1): sra pa dang / brtan bkur bya bar 'a ma bdag cagagis de skar mi nus sa//  pa'i byer nam 'di ltar rgyal be bas gsang mas pa'i bul balngala'am/ bstan bkur bya
11b1(1): byir su yang ma 'gro shig/ la la zhig de la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song na/ lus la gnod pa'i chad pa gcad do zhes bka' stsal to// de bas na 'phags pa 'char ka
11b2(1): ltar bdag cag rgyal pos 'jigs pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur byed du 'dod par mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ 
11b3(1): kye ma rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di ni shin tu yang nga rgyal gyis gnod par gyur na/ ji ltar bdag gis de'i drung du 'gro bar bya snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams so// 'on kyang bdag gis
11b4(1): nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyi shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags pa/ steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang gar du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa
11b5(1): 'char kas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa des na mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas/ bar snang la skyil mo krung bas/ 
11b6(1): te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ngo rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas na mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis bar snga
11b7(1): la skyil mo krung bcas shing / 'ong ba mthong nas/ de la thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad nas smras pa// tshon bsgyur gos can khyod ni gang nas 'ongs// khyod la ci dgos myur du smra bar byos
12a1(1): khyod la gang dgos de yang myur tu sbyir// brtul zhugs grub pa mthong bas shin tu dga'// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la
12a2(1): tshig su bcad pa/ rgyal po bdag ni khyod kyi sras kyi bu// bdag la chos dgos rgyal po gang na bzhugs// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshos skyel te// bde bar gshegs pa
12a3(1): skyob pa'i bshos bkur ro// yul 'khor bdag po che ba'i dpal mnga' ba// khyod la mi mchog sras mchog grags pa thob// gzi brjid kyis ni phyogs rnams kun tu 'bar/ 
12a4(1): ston gyi nyi ma gung gi 'od dang 'dra// ji ltar sprin med na mkha'i nyi ma ni// phyogs rnams kun tu 'od byed mngon par 'bar// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// ye shes mang
12a5(1): bas phyogs rnams kun tu snang // ji ltar ston gi nyi ma shar ba dang // srin bu me khyer zil gyis mnon cing snang // de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/ mu stegs gzhan ni s+dza / 
12a6(1): rnams kun bcom lam mer bzhugs/ ji ltar nyi mas zil gnon skar ma rnams// nyin par 'od stor lam mer mi rung ba// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras
12a7(1): zil gyis mnan pas mu stegs gzhan mi snang // ji ltar nyi ma'i zil mnan zla ba ni// nam mkha'i dbyings na 'ong stor nyin mi snang // de bzhin khyod sras zil mnan mu sten
12b1(1): rnams zhi ba'i ldanan zla bzhin gsal ba med// sang ga'i ngar thas na tham rnams// shugs kyis rmongs rnas pasam bci bzhin du// ris la gsag du byar nas ldam pam
12b2(1): stag gir ro gzhan gyis bzod par dka'// de bzhir rgyal ba drang srong chen po'i gsung // bdag med nga ro mu stegs gzhan thos na// shes rab dman pa sring ba'i rtsar phyin kyang
12b3(1): gsung thos nas ni thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten long ba la// spyan dang ldan pa des ni mig kyang gsal// snang ba mdzad cing rdul kyang rnam
12b4(1): par sbyangs// ye shes sdang ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon par shar// bdeng mi bde'i lam gnyis rab tu bstan// lam dang grol ba'i lam yang rgyal bas bstan// lam stor
12b5(1): skye bo rnams ni lam du btsud// 'dam du bying ba rnams kyang zang la bton// ji ltar skom pa'i sa la srin gyis ni// sgang dang bshong bcas char gyis ngoms par byed/ 
12b6(1): de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// 'gro ba lhar bcas chos kyis ngoms par mdzad// ji ltar char gyis ngoms pa'i raM lung nags// rtsa dang gel ba nags chal shing
12b7(1): rnams dang // khri shing sdong po sman gyi rnam pa dang // me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis sa mdzes pa// de bzhin stobs bcu mi 'jigs mnga' ba dang // ma 'dres bco brgyad chos
13a1(1): @mnga'i sdong po la// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes me tog dang // 'bras bus spras pas rgyal po'i sras mdzes so// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na lhun po'i ri/ 
13a2(1): lha'i gnas gyur mi skul rnam par mdzes// de bzhin rgyal po khyod kyi sras// dge sbyong rgya mtsho'i nang na rnam par mdzes// bde stsogs khyim btab brgya byin lha dbang po// lha yi/ 
13a3(1): stan la 'dug na mdzes pa ltar// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes// byams pa'i stobs can zab mo'i 'brug bsgrags te/ 
13a4(1): thugs rje chen po'i glog 'phreng rir ldan pas// dran pa nyer bzhag char rgyun 'dab bgrigs te// rgyal ba klu mchog de ni chos char 'bebs// yongs dag dkyil 'khor tshul
13a5(1): khrims rab kyi gzer// ting 'dzin nyon mongs lha min rab 'jom sa// ye shes nyi zer srid pa'i sred pa skems// rgyal ba'i nyi chen 'gro bar rnam par mdzes// ting nge/ 
13a6(1): 'dzin dang tshul khrims gzings dang gru chen te// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nor bu rin chen tshogs// byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas bsam gtan rlabs// thar pa
13a7(1): 'dod pas sangs rgyas rgya mtsho bsnyen par bya/ tshul khrims rnam ngag dra pa brtan bar bzug/ ting 'dzin la mthun pa yal ga 'dag/ byang chub yan lag mchag sung
13b1(1): sdong bdag med grib lngar rgyal ba'i sdong po sten// tshul khrims rags mtha' sten pa'i stobs chen po// ting 'dzin zhi ba'i khrod phug na gnas// stong pa mtshan med smon med cu
13b2(1): yul can// rgyal ba stobs can seng ge khyod kyi sras// thub pa mi gnas gnas ni rnam par ston// rgyal ba khyu mchog brjed pa'i stabs bzhud pas/ byis pa so so mu stog
13b3(1): gnan sngangs te// khyod kyi sras ni khyu mchog sgra yang 'byor// tshul khrims gter dang yon tan dbyig gis brgyan// bsam gtan dang ba'i zhi gnas nye bar bskyabs
13b4(1): ye shes kyis bsrungs thar pa'i spyod yul can// rgyal ba tshong dpon gtso bo nor gtong mdzod// dge ba yongs su bzung bas sdig bcom ste// nyon mongs zhi mdzad dge brten
13b5(1): dga' sogs pas// lha dang lha min bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog rnam par mdzes// tshul khrims mchog sbyin blo gros glog 'byin cing // yan la// 
13b6(1): brgyad lam char chen glan gyis spangs// thub pa gces pa'i lo tog 'bras bu stsol// khyod kyi sras ni gru chen 'brug sgra sgrog/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gang zag mchog de brda
13b7(1): bar 'ongs sam ci// bsod snyoms rgyu bas 'dren pa mngal lam// de'i lus la ngal bas du ba med dam// thang gsum ut+pal bzhin rnyings sam// 'char kas smras
14a1(1): @pa rdzu 'phrul stobs mnga' bsam gtan spyod yul can// dgyes shing bde bas yan lag yongs rgyas te// thub pa zhi pa'i sgoms 'jug gnas bcas pas/ 
14a2(1): gser gyi pad+ma lta bur rgyal mi rnyings// rgyal pos smras pa/ sngan chad rdza rnga rnga brar sgras bskul zhing // gling bu'i sgra sran nga ros bskul byas te// bud med glu'i dbyangs kyis bsla
14a3(1): bslang na// da ltar sad na sdug bsngal mi myong ngam// 'char kas smras pa/ bsam gtan dgongs pa ting 'dzin zhi tshul can// ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'i tshul la mkhas pa ste/ 
14a4(1): mnal tam bzhengs sam bzhud dam bzhugs pa na// sdug bsngal mi mnga' rgyal ba rtag tu dgyes// rgyal pos smras pa/ che ba'i rkyen 'os mal mchog bshams pa la// me
14a5(1): mar sdong po kun nas mtha' bskor te/ bud med tshogs kyis bskor cing nyal nyal na// da ltar mun par nyal na cis myi rmongs// 'char kas smras pa/ thub chen 'phags
14a6(1): pa gzims pa ni// byams pa'i gdan bting thugs rjes bde bar bzhengs// dga' ba'i gnas pas dgyes dang ldan pas na// srid rgyud btang snyoms can la rmong
14a7(1): mi mngal// rgyal pos smras pa/ shAkya dpa' bos de mdun du bdar// bstan btsas mkhas dang rtse zhing dga' byas te// gzhal med khang 'dri'i khyim du dpa' byas na/ 
14b1(1): nga'i bu de nags mthar ji ltar dga'// 'char kas smras pa/ chos kyis 'byung ba ni sems ldan rnams kyis// zhi ba'i thugs mnga' de rtag mdun du bdar// ni ba'i dgon par nig/ 
14b2(1): sngon mdzad pas// ston pa 'jigs bral de ni der dgyes so// rgyal pos smras pa/ sngan chad gnoru khyim na gnas pa'i tshe// yan lag spos pa'i kyi 'bru mar zhim thugs te
14b3(1): rgyal po'i rkyen du 'os pas khrus byas na// nags kyi mthar na thub pa su yis bkrung // 'char kas smras pa/ khrims gtsang 'bab stegs chos chu rdzing bu ste// thub pa
14b4(1): des bkrus gnan yang bkru ba mdzad/ u la mig sher sras dang bcas su 'bog/ rang yang rgal la skye bo phal chen sgrol// rgyal pos smras pa/ gser gyi skud pa nor bu
14b5(1): 'phreng bas brgyan// rgyal po'i rkyen 'os gos mchog bzang gyon gyon// tsan+dan zhim pos shing mad pa logs par bris// nags chen de gsapa thub pa su yis brgyan/ 
14b6(1): 'char kas smras pa/ tshul khrims spos byugs yon tan 'phreng bas brgyan// khrel yod na bza' ting 'dzin bsam gtan brgyar// mngon shes rig pa rnam thar brgyan pa'i sku
14b7(1): rnam grol ga'i mang 'thub pa nags na mdzes// rgyal pos smras pa/ rtse gnyis mtshon dang ral gri mtshon thogs pal// dpa' bo yul du bams lus bsrungs te/ mdzan
15a1(1): gdugs kyis rtag tu dga' bas dga'// gcig pu nags na 'dug na su yis bsrungs// 'char kas smras pa/ byams pa'i stobs kyis thub pa yongs
15a2(1): bsrungs te// de dpung ye shes nyan thos zham ring g.yog/ yon tan tshogs la nges pas 'jigs mi mnga'// stobs bcu dgyes pa mnga' zhing mi 'jigs brnyes// rgyal pos
15a3(1): smras pa/ nga yi bu yi yon tan khyod kyis smras// chos legs spyod cing du ba med brjod pa thob// khyod kyang zan zo bsod snyoms bkur bar gyis// bdag kyang mi'i dbang po ltar
15a4(1): 'gro'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de ni/ tshogs kyi slob dpon tshem
15a5(1): kyi mchog/ dge sbyong gi tshogs yongs su sdud pa/ drang srong chen po ste/ dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ dge sbyong gi rgyal po lham me lhan re/ lhang nge'o// rgyal po che
15a6(1): po 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba yar gyi chos bco lnga la za ba nya ste yongs su rgyas pa'i tshe// skar ma'i tshogs kyis kun nos skor ba ni lham me lhan ne ltung nga ba de bzhin du/ 
15a7(1): bcom ldan 'das de yang dge slong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham ma ldan ne lhang nga'o// rgyal ba chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ nim na star gyi dus na shin tu rnam
15b1(1): sbyar re lha ro'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang / dge slong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs ra shin tu l+h+wam me ldan na ltung po'o// 'di lta sde dbar na/ ra rgyal bar rab rgyam/ 
15b2(1): nang na 'dug pa ri lham me lhan ne ldang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham me lhar ne ljang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper rany+dza
15b3(1): dbang po brgya byin ni/ chos bzang lha'i 'dun sa na gnas na lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs ra/ lham mi
15b4(1): lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang / lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang / lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i
15b5(1): tshogs kyi nang na gnas na lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na zhugs na lham me lharan re ljang de'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ 
15b6(1): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong gis bskor na lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs
15b7(1): na lham ma ldan ne lgang ngo'o// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan de lta bu brjod pa 'di thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'am/ 
16a1(1): de'i nyan thos su bang ma/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu chel/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags na/ bcom ldan 'das thog mar bcas pa nyid kyi tshe/ 
16a2(1): sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos/ rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos// 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg/ che mtshim
16a3(1): rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs shing snang ba dpag tu med
16a4(1): ba 'byung ba lta ci smos/ btsas ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten par sa la gom pa bdun bor ba dang steng gi bar snang las chu'i rgyun grang dro rnam pa gnyis byung ste/ de gnyis kyis
16a5(1): khrus byas pa dang / de'i lha'i khri bzang po dbus gser las byas pa byung ba dang / steng gi bar snang las lha'i gdugs rnga yab dang / bcas pa byung ba blta 'ang ci smos/ 
16a6(1): btsas ma thag tu lha thams cad brag 'tshal bar gyur pa dang / gang gi tshe bcas nas gang gi tshe mngon par byung ba de'i bar du ram yang 'jal pa mang pa/ rtag tu dam bcas pa
16a7(1): la brtan pa/ dzin sbas pa de ltar byed pa/ rtag tu cun mi chad par brtson 'grus pa/ yang dag par smrab/ srub meng po gzi mas/ bdag gis blan meng pa yang dgapa
16b1(1): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rgal nas bskal bar bya'o zhes smras pa ltani smos snyam te/ ngas de ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang / 
16b2(1): gyur ba'i dam bcas pa de dran nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// blo mchog mang ra ba gang zhig bltam ma thag/ nor pa med pa'i gsung ni brjid mdzad de// gang
16b3(1): zhig la ni gsung mnga' ba// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig bltam par gyur ma thag nyid du// 'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur bar bya'o zhes// mgor thos
16b4(1): mnyam pa med pa'i gsung brjod pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// su zhig rmi lam rmi ba'i dus na yang // brdzun gyi rlig ni nam yang ma gsungs te/ 
16b5(1): ji skad gsungs pa de ltar mdzad pa la// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// gser gyi phung po gangs ri mnyam pa yis// gang zhig chags par bya bar mi rus shing / 
16b6(1): gang zhig chags las rnam par 'das gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// mtshon rnon 'dra ba'i ngag rtsub tshig rnams kyis// gang zhig khro bar bya bar
16b7(1): ma nus shing // zhe sdang dngos po las ni rab 'das shing // de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// chags par gyur pa zhe sdang rmongs gyur pa// gang zhig zul bar nus
17a1(1): par ma gyur te// shes rab rgyal po dang ni ldan gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su nig yid mi ches// 'dod pa'i dga' dang bde rnam du ma dang // longs spyod dag la
17a2(1): rtog pa'i rnam pa yis// gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi res// rmad du byung ba rnam pa brgyad dag gis// ngo mtshar 'dzin gzhug na
17a3(1): yang ma nus te// dpa' sdug ldan zhing rtag tu mi dam pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// mkhas pa dag gos brjod pa'i tshig snyan pa// rnam pa sna tshogs du mi'i
17a4(1): tshig gis kyang // gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// don gyi tshul la brtson dang ldan pa dang // chos dang 'dod la nges pa'i tshig
17a5(1): rnams kyis// gang zhig btsang bar nus par ma gyur pa// de'i gsung las nig yid mi ches// rngam med stobs mtha' yas lngar gyur pa// gang dag grong khyer mchog na
17a6(1): byung ba'i tshe// dpung rnams kyis ni thub par ma gyur pa// nga'i gsung la su zhig yang mi ches/ byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir// gang zhig 'dod pa'i bden
17a7(1): blangs nas su/ 'ji mang rgya byer ri rigs spong ma dzad pa// de'i gsung la suseM ga yeng mchis// byang chub dam pa mngon par band pa'i phyir// nan pa ma yin semasas
17b1(1): gang zhig gis// lo drug par du dka' thub drug spyad pa// de'i gsung la su zhig ying mi ches// 'jig rten lan pan dang bde ba'i phyir/ byang chub dam pa don du gtar bar
17b2(1): lo drug lon pa'i tha ma tshong ku gsol// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang la lo drug bar du bdud kyis ni// rtag tu phye bzhir 'brangs te grags btsal kyang / 
17b3(1): de la glags ni rnyed par ma gyur pa// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang bral gyur cing // su la cung zad tsam yang mi slong la/ 
17b4(1): 'jig rten dag gi don ni mdzad gyur pa// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig gzhan las gnas pa ma mdzad pa// rtogs par dka' ba rab tu zhi ba yi// 
17b5(1): byang chub bla med mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas pa// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig tshangs pa nyid kyis gsol btab pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis de yi
17b6(1): tshig gsan te// nyid kyis chos ni rab tu bshad pa na// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig bdag la thugs brtse don gyi phyir// shAkya'i grong khyer khyim du byon
17b7(1): gyur te// gakya'i tshogs rnams grol bar mdzad pa na// de'i gsung la su nig ying mi ches// rgal bar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das gang gis// sngon gyi thugs ngom/ 
18a1(1): bcas pa dgongs mdzad de// bdag cag sred pa'i rgyud las bsgrol mdzad ra// de'i gsung la su zhig yid bai rjes// de'i dus dbab blta bar dus mkhyen pas// bcom
18a2(1): ldan 'das kyis de'i dus mkhyen te// 'dren pa dus su thugs brdzi mdzad pa po// de'i gsung la su zhig yid po res// mi'i 'dren pa yi ni sku mchog la// blta ba'i don du bdag ni 'gro
18a3(1): bya zhes// rgyal po des ni rang gi sems kyis su// de snyam du rjesu bsam par byas// de ras rgyal po zas gtsang mas de ltar ring zhig du rjes su bsams ras/ tshe dang ldan pa la
18a4(1): ka la smras pa/ dge slong khyod la ci zhig dgos// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshig su bcad de slar smras pa/ rgyal po khyod kyi don
18a5(1): du bsam bya ste// khyod nyid dad par bya phyir bdag 'dir 'ongs// stobs bcu mnga' la dad pa'i sems bskyed na// skyes pa bud med dag kyang mtho ris 'dong // stobs bcu
18a6(1): mang 'azhing yon tan chad meng ldan// drang srong chen po shAkya dga' mdzad pa// 'dir byor rgyal po thugs dang skyeng cig dang // khyod kyis grags pa tshad me 'jig rteran 'byung // khyod kyi sras ni
18a7(1): me ba ngas pa ste/ skabs bcu brags rje thugs brtse cher mnga' ba// chu khrang ba co bzhin chags mang pa'o// skabs brgyartags med thugs mang 'byung ba mngad/ ming pa'i drub bsas
18b1(1): rgal gyur nas// 'gro ba mang po chu bo che las sgrol// rkang gnyis gtso bo ma 'jigs zang 'don gyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// srid pa'i zug rngu bzhi po kun bdon te// smar pa'i gtso/ 
18b2(1): skye dgu'i zug rngu 'byin// gso bar byed pa mkhas pa dam pa'i mchog/ 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// bdud kyi sde can dpag med pa ma mdzad de// nag po'i phyogs rnams sngar bcas yod
18b3(1): mnan nas// mchog tu zhi ba'i byang chub brnyes gyur kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// 'gro ba bsgrol zhing chos kyang bstan pa dang // 'chi med zhi ba mi la bshad gsol zhes// mi
18b4(1): dbang la ni lha dbang gsol 'debs kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ri dad pa skyed// phas kyi rgol ba'i chos rnams zil mnar te// ston pa dpag yas 'khor lo rab bskor nas// sems can bye ba tshad
18b5(1): med 'dul mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// rnam dag spyan mnga' de ni 'gro ba dag/ mun pa rab rib stug pos bsgribs pa yi// mig sbyor rab rib sel cing gsal mdzad kyis// 
18b6(1): 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas nyon mongs la// rga 'chi med mchog mi la ston mdzad cing // 'chi med gnas su sems can don mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la
18b7(1): ni dad pa skyed// mi chen gsum gyis bsregs pa'i 'jig rten 'dis// mes tshig sa la sprin chen char pa bzhin// bzhi gnyis dam pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa
19a1(1): @#/ skyed// dri gsum dri ma spangs shing skyon gsal te// dri ma gsum las grol mdzad cing // stobs bcu rnam par snang ba skyong mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// skye dgu
19a2(1): kun la pha bzhin thugs brtse bas// stobs bcu thugs rje mnga' ba byams par dgongs// thugs rje thugs brtse sems can 'grol mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// bcom
19a3(1): ldan 'das de ni mdul sems can 'dul// thugs rje mnga' ba ma zhini mdzad cing // rgod pa rnams kyang nyon mongs ni mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad paskyed// skye bo rnams kyi srid pa'i
19a4(1): rgya mtsho skems// rgya mtsho las ni lha bus ji lta bar// stobs bcu thugs rje che mnga' sgrol mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// tshad med yon tan tshigs kyis mdzes gyur
19a5(1): pa 'thugs rje chen po dang ba'i thugs kyis spyod// yun ring 'khrugs pa'i skye bo dang mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// nor bu rin chen chu dang byed pa bzhin// rgyal ba skye
19a6(1): bo dang bar spyor mdzad cing // me'i 'thab rtag rab tu dang mdzad kyis// 'dran pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// nor bu rin chen rang bzhin yong dag pa/ mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongasu
19a7(1): byed rgyal ba bzhin skyon pas la dag pa'i thugs/ mkhas pa'i skye ba dga' ba yongs myed/ 'jig rten gtso bo la dad pa thob 'gyur na// mi dang lha gasdug bsngal khur yang 'dang/ 
19b1(1): srid pa'i rgyud spangs ni pa mchog tu 'gro/ 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// bdag gi yon tar phyogs gcig brjod pa ni// namakha'i dbyings la mkha' lding nge bzhin te// bdag ri rgyal ba'i ma
19b2(1): tan mthar phyin min// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka las legs par bshad pa yang thos/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
19b3(1): dpa'i mdzad pa'i yon tan de lta bu yang nyid kyis mngon tu mthong // sngon bdag rgal nas skyes bu khyu mchog khyod kyang bskal bar bgyi'o zhes dam bcas pa yang rjesu dran nas/ de'i tshe ba
19b4(1): ldan 'das la dad pa thob par gyur to// de ltar dad pa thob pa'i sems kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smraso// dge slong khyod ni nga'i bu'i chos las skyes pa'i bu yin nam// 
19b5(1): khyod bdag zan zo la bcom ldan 'das kyi shos khyer te song shig/ nga yang bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i phyir phyi bzhin 'ong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma
19b6(1): mngon par dad par byas nas/ zan zos te bcom ldan 'das bshos khyer nas song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po zas gtsad
19b7(1): ma ni ga srong 'char kas dang par byas te/ deng skya po phal po che'i don du 'gyur// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ 
20a1(1): @#bdag gi byas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la leg so// zhes bya ba gnang ste/ 'char ka legaso leg so// de ring rgyal po zas
20a2(1): gtsang ma dad par byas pas/ khyod kyis bsod nam mang du bskyed// de'i tshe bcoM ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnam la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ring dge slong 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dang
20a3(1): par byas pa'i bsod nam kyi phung po bskyed pa de la gal te gzug shig yod na ni// phyog bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu yang bsod nam kyi phung po de mi shong ste/ bsod
20a4(1): nam kyi phung po de ni de tsam du dpag tu medo// de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas/ phyag bcabs lhung bzed bkrus te/ mtshan ma'i rna ba 'di lta bu mdzad// mtshan ma'i rna ba de lta bu mdzad pas/ 
20a5(1): rgyal po chen po rna thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stob dang ldan pas/ lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/ 
20a6(1): brkyang ba la bskum pa tsam gyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu rang gi gnas nA mi snang bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par 'gyur te/ des bcoM ldan 'das kyi zhabra la mgo bos bya/ 
20a7(1): 'tshal na/ byang phyogasu brten te steng gi bar snang la gnod sbyin gyi chog kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal
20a8(1): chen pa yul lakhor srung yang dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas mang su bskor cing mdun du 'dar nas/ sngam bzhin du bco ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to// des bci ldan 'das
20b1(1): dbral lag zas phyag 'tshal ma/ shar phyogasu brten te/ gleng ga par snang laza ba'i tshas kyis bskur nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dag sung gi dag 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par byud
20b2(1): to// rgyal po chen po 'bag skyes po yang grul bum bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing / mdun du bdar nas/ snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des
20b3(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lho phyogasu brtan te steng gi bar snang la grul bum gyi tshog kyis bskor nas/ thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun/ 
20b4(1): mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug
20b5(1): par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bo sa phyag 'tshal nas/ nub phyogs logs su brten te/ steng gi bar snang la klu'i tshogs kyis bskor nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ 
20b6(1): bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su
20b7(1): skor cing mdun du bdar nas/ snga ma bzhin steng gi bar snang la thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// de bzhin
20b8(1): du lha'i dbang po rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i dbang po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po
21a1(1): @##/ tshangs pa dang / lha'i rgyal po 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang
21a2(1): gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ris nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ steng gi bar
21a3(1): snang la re re zhing yang g.yog lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// lA ma yin
21a4(1): gyi dbang po thag zangs ris kyang / lha ma yin khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa/ brkyang ba'am/ brkyang ba las
21a5(1): bskum pa tsam gyis/ lA ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris lha ma yin gyi gnas nas mi sdang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs
21a6(1): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// bya'i rgyal po 'ad ba bzangs brgyad khri drug stong yang rang rang gi gnas nas maM
21a7(1): snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sun sar 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod
21b1(1): tsang 'dug par gyur te/ gnan mu stegs can kun du rgyu rgyal po'i khab tha dad pa nas lpags pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang 'dus par gyur to// de la 'di sad ces bya ste/ nam mkha' mang
21b2(1): su dag pa'i dbyings dkyil du// ma lus rdzogs gyur zla ba nya ba yis// sar ma'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// nam mkha' zla ba bzhin du rnam par mdzes// zla badzi med
21b3(1): dkyil 'khor nal mnga' ba// mun par ba rib sel cing dri gsum 'dzem// rngog ge can tshogs zil gyis mnan nas ni// mkha' la skar ma'i bdag po bzhin du mdzes// nyi ma'i 'ong
21b4(1): gzer brgya yi lus 'dzin pa// ston gyi dus na mun sel rnam mdzes shing // lha min tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas su// nyi ma de ni pad+ma'i kha yang 'byed// nyi ma'i 'od gzer
21b5(1): brgya 'dra'i sku mnga' bas// stong gsum po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni// mi'i nyi ma rnam par mdzes gyur cing // nyan thos pad+ma'i tshal mchog kha yang 'byed// lha'i rgyal po dbang po brgya
21b6(1): byin ni// 'dun sar lha'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba// lha'i 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// bde stsogs khyim thab sbyin ldan rnam par mdzes// rkang gnyis dbang po
21b7(1): dpal sdug stobs bcu yang // dge sbyong tshogs kyis mdun bdar stong gsum na// rtog ge tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes// 
22a1(1): lha'i rgyal po 'thab bral dbang byed pa// 'thub zal bzang po lngas mchod btsun byas pa// 'thab bral bzang po sna tshogs nang bzhugs te// 'thab
22a2(1): bral rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa mdzes// gzi brjid mtha' yas stobs bcu mnga' ba yang // lam ngan ngan 'gro dong ba zil mnan nas// yan lag brgyad pa rab du sngon mdzad cing // 
22a3(1): stobs bcu yon tan rnams kyis rab du mdzes// lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan de// dga' ldan gnas na lnga'i tshogs kyis bskor// lha tshogs bzang po zil gyis mnan nas na/ 
22a4(1): sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rab du mdzes// de bzhin lha dang lha min tha ma yang // lha mi lha min tshogs kyis bla mar byas// 'khor brgyad po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni// skyes bu seng
22a5(1): dam pa 'jig rten mdzes// lha'i dbang po bdag por ba 'phrul ni// lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas su// rang gi bsod nams mthu yis la gnas ma// gnas shing de ni rab
22a6(1): tu rnam par mdzes// de bzhin nyon mongs rnams las rnam grol zhing // stobs bcu mnga' ba nyon mongs bral bapo// mdul 'dul mdzad 'dul ba'i rgyal po yang // skye bo ris
22a7(1): kyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes// grwa'i rgyal po dbang sngar byed pa ni// grwa'i gnas nas 'dug cing la tshogs zil mnan me// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis/ rnam par
22b1(1): mdzes par gyur bci bzhin du// de ltar rgyal ba stobs bcu'i snod ba dag/ sngan chad snang bas lha mi zil mnan te// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis// rgyal 'dzin
22b2(1): tu rnam par mdzes/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na ni tshangs pa yang // tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams rang gis zil mnan te// shin du snyan pa yan lag brgyad ldan dag/ yongs su brjod
22b3(1): byed cing mngon du mdzes// de ltar rgyal ba tshangs pa 'drar gyur pa// dge sbyong rgyal po dge sbyong tshogs rnams kyis// mdun du bdar te bden pa'i gdam gsung ba/ 'jig rted gsum
22b4(1): po dag na mngon tu mdzes// nyan par 'dod pa lnga dang mi rnams dang // lto 'phye chen po dag ni dus mkhyen nas// skyes bu khyu mchog yan lag brgyad ldan gyi// gsung rnams kyis ni rab
22b5(1): tu ston pa mdzad// byal ma nam mkha' dpag par nus kyang srid// rgya mtsho bum pas gnal du rung yang srid// ri rab srang brgyar gzhal du rung yang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha'
22b6(1): rtogs mi nus so// rgyal po mngon pa dang bar byas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / bam po gnyis pa// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka song nas ring po malon par rgyal
22b7(1): po zas gtsang mas shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/ grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma 'char ba'i snga ltas ni gang 'di dmar reng 'char ba'o// dmar reng shar na nyi ma 'char bar shes
24a1(1): d+ha na pa cheg bdun khang pa bcugs pa ba ba bsan thug pa bcang zhiban ga nas 'dang bar rnar// za ba cag pa ma zhanas
24a2(1): gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril brag yer ka bzlas pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan dang ldan pa brgyad khri ba shams te 'dong bar gyur te// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal
24a3(1): zas bcang ma dang / shAkya rnams rgyang ring po nas bong ba gzigs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed gang gis sumacu rtsa gsum gyi lnga bskyed mos tshal du 'dod pa
24a4(1): ma mthong ba de dag gis shAkya ser sna'i gnas nas 'ong ba 'di dag la ltos shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag shAkya rnams ser skya'i gnas nas byung ba ni su bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha
24a5(1): sbed mos tshal du 'dong ba dang / rjes su 'thun no// de la 'di sang byaste/ ser sna zhes bya ba'i grong khyer dam pa nas// rgyal po zas gtsang mi yaM mchog ste// 'khor dang bcas
24a6(1): ji ltar bong gyur pa// de ltar bsan gyis khyed cag de nyin cig/ shing rta brgya song mchog dang ldan pa dag/ legs par brgyan cing mdzes par sbas nas ni// ser skya'i gam
24a7(1): zang mar dab panas// ma' bang bangs bzung bar rdzur// rang nas dang ldan yang sri ba ga/  yang grasangs lapal dang bcasamatshanams pa sa
24b1(1): bsre// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang sngo// lhag kyang sngo ning thags srang dag kyang sngo// dril bu g.yer/ ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ri sngon po'i gos can te/ 
24b2(1): rgyal mtshan sngon po bsring bas mdzes par byas// shing rta ser ning rgyan yang ser ba dang // dzA yang ser ning ser po'i 'khor dang bcas/ mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang ser po
24b3(1): ste/ de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang ser// lug kyang ser zhing thag srad dag kyang ser// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni ser po'i gos can
24b4(1): rgyal mtshan ser po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta dmar zhing rgyan yang dmar ba dang // rta yang dmar zhing dmar po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga
24b5(1): dag kyang dmar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dmar// lcag kyang dmar zhing thag sad dag kyang dmar// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams
24b6(1): kyang ni dmar po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan dmar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta dkar zhing rgyan yang dkar ba dang // rta yang dkar zhing dkar po'i 'khor dang
24b7(1): bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dkar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dpa padag kyang dkar// lug kyang dkar ning thag srad rnams kyang dkar// dril bu g.yer kabadra ba
25a1(1): rnams dang ba/ brnams dpa ma/  dngarab bzang bas pangs pa sa/ gang mag na
25a2(1): dang // rnga yang bkra zhing bkra ba'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang bkrab ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam padag bkra// lhag kyang bkra zhing zag srad dag kyang baH// jil ng+gA
25a3(1): g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni bkra ba'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan khra bo bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin du// glang po
25a4(1): brgyad khri chang ba bshams pa ni// gser gyi rgyal mtshan rnam par brgyan// glang po rnams ni gser gyis chal par brgyan// de dag seng du rin cen sna bdun gyi// khang pa brtsegs pa
25a5(1): dag ni bzhag nams// rnam pas tshogs brtan pa la// shing \u0f7frnams kyi bya bzhin bzang bar bshams// de bzhin na mchog snang brag brgyad rgya meng // rin chen sna bdun rgyan gyi
25a6(1): dga' bar brgyan// rgyal po'i cha 'os rgyal po 'tsham stabs can// phung po de dag rnams kyi phye bzhin 'brang // rab tu dri ni mkha dog lnga pa yi// me tog salam rgyal ba'i lamang
25a7(1): bkram// ngar gyi lnga l-I dag kyang rab tu bres// bdug spos snod rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan// gru mkhan gar mkhan rnams dang thad rnams dang / bum rnga thogs pa rnams kyis ma
25b1(1): bar byas// rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yang // rab tu dga' zhing rgyal ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang // rgyal po gshegs pa'i le'u sa gnyis pa'o// 
25b2(1): de nas rgyal ba zas gtsang ma dang / shAbya rnams ta babs pa'i bar du gnon pa dang dang sa byin nas// gnon pa las babs nya dang thang gi 'khor gyis yangs su bsar \u0f7f// mdung dubyung nga/ 
25b3(1): n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang mang rgyal che bar mkhyen nas// mig gang lhag tsam gyi steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la rgyal po zas gcang
25b4(1): ma mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir// 'chag cing bzhugs par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar chag pa'i g.yas phyogs nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am ring du 'a chag cing 'anan// 
25b5(1): g.yon phyogs nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin nam ring du 'chag cing 'gro'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i nam 'bring du lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul
25b6(1): dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa pa'i phyir/ gdugs 'dzin cing bsil yab kyis g.yob par gyur to// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / yul 'khor srung
25b7(1): gnyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das bachag pa'i shar phyogs sogs kyi thog mar thags zag pa gcig drug par te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i spang srad nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal bder lags su bas ma sbyar
26a1(1): ba bdud te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'chag
26a2(1): ba'i nub phyogs logs kyi thog mar tha gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ldang srang ras/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud te/ bcom ldan 'das
26a3(1): la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khong par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal chen bana' rus kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang // gzhan 'phrul dbang
26a4(1): byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ lnga'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / lha'i me tog
26a5(1): man+ta ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / lha'i spos kyi phye ma rab tu 'thor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lha'i rol mo sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs dag kyang steng gi bar
26a6(1): snang las spa 'byin par gyur to// mi las 'das pa'i gru'i nga ro yang steng gi bar sdang las byung bar gyur to// sprin las spos kyi char zam zim yang 'bab par gyur to// lha'i me tog ung
26a7(1): bangag su can da kyi bya char yang 'bab par byar ba/ danas papam bcom ldan padas kyis rdzu 'phrul gyirnam pagang mngan par mang bas/ sa dang ma rnams kyad 'tsha ma ma
26b1(1): ra thar pa dag bung rngu bathum mngan bar mdang pa nganas rgyam thas bcang masas dngas bcom ldan 'das la ma chad babyang ba yang mthab lung rin pa sa 'dra sardzams drang
26b2(1): khang pa brtsegs pas kyang bar snang gang bar mthong nas/ nga'angasam du sems te/ tsatsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis lags par gsungs pa na nga mtshar che ste/ sdod bcoms na 'das 'od
26b3(1): gyur pa'i che/ 'di sang ngal ri grong chen po bzhi'i dbang phyug la dbang bar gyur pa ngo mtshar ma che ste/ ngas ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rteran gyi khams su lnga dang mi'i nang du chos kyi dbang thug sa
26b4(1): dbang bya'o// zhes gsungs ra/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de ni 'di yin pa lnga ste/ bdag ni mi'i 'khor can du zad/ bcom ldan 'das ri lha dang mi'i 'khor can du gyur
26b5(1): sram mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tha gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mog las pa'i ldang sa la bcugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshig 'di
26b6(1): skad ces sras so// bcom ldan 'das bsam ma thag du sus kyang ma brten par sa chen po la gom pa bdun bzung te/ phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gsung brjod pa/ nga ni 'jig rten na mchog ni
26b7(1): bdag tan na brgya'o// nga ni 'jig rten na rabs/ ngas sra ba dang / na ba dang na ba dang / 'tshe bar mthar dbyung ngo nas gsungs pa bache/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyig pas gnas lamam
27a1(1): bos gdugs te phyag bgyis so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das ning ba'i grong du bcud nas/ 'dzam bu'i grib ma bsil ba la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ nyi ma yo yang 'dzam bu'i
27a2(1): grib mas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ma btang ste/ lha'i bu gzhon nu drug thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyis so// da yang bcom
27a3(1): ldan 'das 'di dang lan gsum du phyag 'tshal lo// zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang sbas so// gang che rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod bltam nas// sa chen 'di la gom pa bdun
27a4(1): bzhud de// sa ni 'jig rten 'di na mchog ces gsungs// de tshe mkhas pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// gang tshe thub chen zhing ba'i grong bzhud de// 'dzam bu'i grib ma bzhugs pa ma gtang zhing // 
27a5(1): lnga bu gzhon nu drug gis bdud gyur pa// de tshe mchod 'os khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// da yang 'di dang khyod la lan gsum du// thub pa khyod kyi nabs la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje che mda' la
27a6(1): mis mchod pa btso/ khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis lhag ci spos// mtshan ni don grub lags shes sngon brjod pa// pha dang ma yis bsams te btags pa lags// khyod kyi bsam rdzogs bdud
27a7(1): tsa brnyes pas na/ don nub lags par bdag gis dgadong 'chal// de nas 'dong pa na spong ba'i la rnams de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge khri lnga'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu bting ba rnams
27b1(1): bsnga tshogs su sbal ba bshams so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'ar bar yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bus g.yog par bting ngo // steng du yang lAb yang zad
27b2(1): gyi ras bcos bu'i bla bre bres so// de nas bcom ldan 'das par snang gi 'chags de nas babs te/ gdan khri bshams pa la bzhugs so// rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang 'khor dang bca
27b3(1): pas bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs
27b4(1): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bar snang la 'khod par gyur to// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// ser sna zhes bya grong khyer dam pa yi/ n+ya gro d+ha'i ra ba nyams dga'
27b5(1): bar// rgyal po zas gtsang de dag gang gi tshe// 'jig rten mgon po phrad pa de yi tshe// skye bo mang po dag ni 'dus gyur te// lha ma yin dang mkha' lding dbang po dang // thu tshogs rnams dang
27b6(1): bzhin grul 'bum dang // dri za rgyal po rnams kyang 'dus par gyur// de bzhin gsang ba'i bdag po rnams 'dus te// mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang mi rnams dang // de bzhin 'dod bdag ni stong
27b7(1): pa'i lnga// rab tu dga' ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur// de bzhin gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa yi// tshangs pa rnams dang tshangs pa'i ris rnams dang // 'od gsal ba dang dge rgyas pa
28a1(1): ngag dang // 'bras bu che bar gtogs dang gnas gtsang 'dus// dge sbyong dag dang de bzhin bram ze dang // spyod ba can dang kun du rgyu dag dang // gcer bub
28a2(1): dang / mu stegs gzhan mang po// log lam rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang 'dus// sangs rgyas nyid kyi gzi brjid dam pa yis// rgyal po chen po zas gtsang de yi sems// yongs su
28a3(1): smin par bya ba'i don gyi phyir// de yi che na 'dus pa chen por gyur// sngon chad bcom ldan 'das kyis legs bshad pa'i// tshig gis 'khor rnams yongs su tshim par byas// da ni rgyal ba rgyal
28a4(1): bzas gcang la// rgyal ba'i mthu ni rab tu bsar bar bzhed// bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po zas gtsang gis// gnor du khyod rnaMs bdag chen po la// rgyal por 'gyur nas mkhas pas lung
28a5(1): bstan gyis// khab nas ma byung shig ces sngon gsol ba// gling bzhir dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba ste// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams mchod// rin cen sna bdun dag dang ldan
28a6(1): par 'gyur// 'byor pa bzhi pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur// chos la gnas shing sa yang spong bso// blang ba ni dbang dang rdul rigs rgyal chen 'gyur// me laM bdag dang me yi mchod par
28a7(1): bong/ lo 'phye ches mchod 'gyur zhes gsol ba btab// de nas de che byang chub sems dpa' das/ bsal ba bye ba khrag khrig dpag med nas// bdag ni rtag tu bden pa'i tshig sras kyis/ 
28b1(1): rgyal ba bdag gis 'tshig la gsan ces gsungs 'di sar phreng bzhi pa yi rgyal srid kyis bdag la bar mdzad par bzhed pasam de sa'i tshul las rgyal po chen po tho da
28b2(1): la cung zad tsam yang thugs mar// rgyal po chen po sngon che byung ba ni// rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis rus la gcig cig 'bangs/ rgya mtsho'i rlabs ni phyir log gyur ba dang // rus la dzen
28b3(1): khron pa'i nang du ltung // de la khron pa'i nang gi rus sbal gyis// rgya mtsho'i rus sAl gang nas 'dir 'ongs te/ nga'i the tshom skyes pa gcad pa'i phyir// khron pa'i nang gi rus sAl de nying ga
28b4(1): rgya mtsho'i rus sbal blo chen des sbas pa// nga ni rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis bkur bkur te// khron pa 'dir ni de ring por bar gyur/ rgya mtsho'i brlabs chen de ni phyir log sang// nga de slar log
28b5(1): 'gro bar ma nus te// nga ni rlabs dang bral bar gyur pasam// rus sbal khyod kyi khron par gnas cha'o// de la khron pa'i nang gi rus sbal gyis// rgya mtsho de ni zon pa 'di tsam ma// 'on te
28b6(1): khron pa 'di bas che ba zhig dris ldan da la myur du spos shes smras// rgya mtsho'i rus sbal blo rgya chen po des// khron pa'i rus sbal de la tshig smras pa/ khron pa'i rus sbal khyod ni byis pas
28b7(1): blo rgya chung zhing shes pa rab tug/ nga ni lin cha can gyi chu der bcas/ yun ring ngus nas den gyi skye yang / rgya mtshom tha' ma shes par ma nus ma dbus pa shes par gal nus shes
29a1(1): sbas/ de ltar mi yi bdag ze khyod kyis kyang // bdag gi mthu ni thugs su ma chung ngo // gling bzhi pa yi mchod pa rnams kyis ni// khyed kyis bdag la
29a2(1): bslu bar mdzad par bzhes// bdag ni chos can chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur// chang pas mi gtsang mtshon chas 'da' med par// stong gsum 'jig rten khams 'di bsrung
29a3(1): bar bya// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pa thob par 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul stobs bsgoms pa yi bdag nyid can// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon tshig snang bzhed nas// de phyir 'a
29a4(1): chen po ni de dag dang // sems can rnams la thugs kyis dgongs pa mdzad// rgyal po zas gtsang sems ni mgu bya'i phyir// thugs kyis yongs su bskul ba mdzad pa dang / 
29a5(1): 'jig rten gsum pa mtha' dag ma lus par// de yi chen der ni 'dus par 'gyur/ rgyal po 'dus par byas pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// 
29a6(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dang tsha la ma yin gyi dbang po zagazangs ris/ bcom ldan 'das la mchong bar bya ba'i sems thag mar skye bar 'gyur ba deg bung mtshan ma mdzadang / 
29a7(1): de nas su ma yin gyi dbang po thob bangs ris lam yin khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang / snga ma yin gyi bu mo khrag khrag phrag drug bcu dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchong bzag mar
29b1(1): te/ des rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che rin thang yod pa dang / rin thang med pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir phul lo// rin po che gzhan tu ma
29b2(1): chen po de na med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul pa byas te mchod par phul lo// rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi shing rta khrag khrig phrag drug cu yang mngon par sprul to// shing rta de dag re
29b3(1): zhing rta cang shes khrag khrig phrag drug cu mngon par sbal te// rta de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra can/ rkang lag gi brgyan gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis sbas
29b4(1): pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i dbyar 'dab can/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go// cang shes de dag gi brgyan du bya ba'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyi bya ru dag kyang
29b5(1): mngon par sprul to// shing rta de dag kyang gser gyi rgyal mtshan can// gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla bre de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las shing rta de dag gi
29b6(1): phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur te/ shing rta de dag 'dod na ni rjes su 'dong // shing rta de dag sdod na ni sdod pa sha srag go/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla bre dag la yang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ rin po
29b7(1): che sna bdun gyi 'breng ba'i lda ldi mngon par sbyangs so// yang bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla bre de dag kyang / rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang ldan par mngon par sprul to// shing rta'i
30a1(1): rgyan dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla bre'i rgyan de dag rlung gis stong ma/ sba snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde bsha stag 'byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste dperan
30a2(1): rol mo sil snyan yon lag brgyad dang ldan pa mnyam pas sgra phyung na/ sgra sman cing yid du 'ong ba dang / mnyam na bde bar 'byung ba de bzhin du shing rta'i rgyan de dag dang / rta'i rgyan de dag dang
30a3(1): yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla ze'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod nas/ sra sran cing yid du 'ong la/ mnyan par bde ba sha stag 'byung bar gyur to// shing rta de dag gi 'bang gis kyang seng gi bar la
30a4(1): dpag tshad drug cu bsgribs te 'khod par gyur to// shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin yang rol mo sil sran sna tshogs rjes su 'azang bar gyur to// shing rta de dag thams cad la yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo
30a5(1): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni sil san len/ la la ni gu len/ la la ni gar byed/ lal ni can
30a6(1): dan dang / ut+pa la'i byems 'thor// lal ma a ga ru dang / tam satsha ma ma'i bems 'thor/ phags ni lham yin gyi lA rdzas kyi khrims 'thor// la sa ni gser dngul gyi khrims bathos
30a7(1): lal ni man+dAr ba dang / man+tar ba chen po dang / maN+Da nig dang / many+dzugag chen po dang / brdzug sa dang / bdugag chen pa dang / mdog par dang / mdog dka' chen po dang / srasngar rapa
30b1(1): skar chen pa dang / s+ya sngar kha bo dang / khwa sAr tha chen gyi me tog mngon par sprul cing / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'gyur ro// lal na gsar byam dag dang / dngus kyim tog dang / rnas
30b2(1): tsa me tog dang / bai DUr+ya'i me tog dang / smug gi me tog dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog dang / rdo rje'i seng po'i me tog gis mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni rin po che sna bdun dang / dbyug gi
30b3(1): snyim pa bkang ning bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni da bza' dang rgyan 'bul lo// la la ni sku regs dang / zhabs kyi rgyan dang / snor gdub dang / gdu bu dang / gdu bu thab pa
30b4(1): dang dbu rgyan rtse gsum dag/ dpung rgyan ras a ser sung dang / mu tig gi ngo shal dang / nor bu'i do shal dang / se mo do dang / b+ha do dang / mgul rgyan su tshogs 'thor bar gyur to// malan
30b5(1): tsong tsong gshibs pa/ la la ni mgo rgyan la la ni rna cha ga du bkor la la ni gser gyi 'phreng ba'i rin po ches sbas pa/ la la ni rin po che'i 'phreng ba gser gyis sbas pa/ la la ni gser gyi dra ba/ 
30b6(1): la la ni gser gyi 'phreng ba dang / nor bu'i 'greng ba dang / mu tig gi 'breng ba thogs so// lal ni gser gyi gdugs dang / dngul gyi gdugs dang / beDU r+ya'i gdugs dang / shes gyi gdugs dang / 
30b7(1): sdug gi gdugs dang / rdo'i snying po'i gdugs dang / mu tig dmar po'i gdugs dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs tha dad pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi bdar kha dog sna tshogs dang / chonas
31a1(1): tshogs can mang bzags so// la lani spos chu char 'bebs shing 'khod par gyur to// lal na bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'ang dag gis bango
31a2(1): bar bsod par gyur to// maM mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mi 'phrul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rkang gnyis gcol phyag 'tshal lo// khyod la ngo zla yang ma mchis// 'jig rten gsalal
31a3(1): phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i ri la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs sel la phyag
31a4(1): 'tshal lo// snod dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas pa mi mnga' bzhugs mi mnga'// le lo mi mnga' rgod mi mnga'// brtson 'grus rtsams shing
31a5(1): rdul bcoMs// ngas par rtogs pa thag 'jams// dad pa thathas thangs na sdugapa// mangs pa mtsha sna bdud nga ban cam thas rgya sa thas pargyayang mngon par gyum/ rganapa
31a6(1): bzang gi rdal de dag re ra nang yang bzhugs khrag khrig drug cu drug bcu mngon par smras to// btsugs sa de dag rer dang yang ba'am badz+rab/ bstan sdug paran pa ches bdun gyi rang bzhin can
31b1(1): sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re zhing yang khyams bkra ba bstan sdug pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig zag drug cu drug tu mngon par sprul te// ngas gser
31b2(1): khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni dngul// gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni bai DUr+ya// them pa dang kha khyer ni shel/ ka ba ni sdug ka nu ni mu tig dmar po// sa gnan rdo snying po'i rang bzhin can na
31b3(1): stag go// bai DUr+ya'i khyams rnams kyi gdung byam ni shel/ thal bu dang sgo bar ni gser/ bem pa dang kha khyer ni dngul/ ka ba ni spug ka nu ni mu tig dmar po// sa gni ni rdo'i sring po'i rang
31b4(1): bzhin can sha stag go/ shel gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung bya ma ni bai DUr+ya/ gral bu dang sgo par ni sug/ them pa dang kha khyer ni rdo'i snying po// ka ba ni gser/ ka nr-i ri dngul/ sa gni ni mu/ 
31b5(1): tig dbar po'i rang bzhin can sha sngag go/ srug gi khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni rdo'i snying po// gral bu dang sgo 'bar ni mu tig dmar po// them pa dang kha khyer ni gser/ ka ba ni dngul/ ka nu nI
31b6(1): shelas gan ni bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ mu tig dmar po'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni sug/ bral bu dang sgong bar ni rdo'i snying po// them pa dang / kha khyer ni dngul/ ka dza naM
31b7(1): gser/ ka Tu ni bai DUr+ya/ sa gni ri ke ke ru'i rang bzhin car sha stag go// rdo'i snying po'i khyams rnams kyi gdung byam ni mu tig dmar po// gral bu dang sgong phar ni gser/ them pa dang kha khyer
32a1(1): ni dngus/ ka ba ni bai DUr+ya/ ka nra na ke ke ru/ sa gni ni shel gyi rang bzhin can/ sha stag go// khyams de dag du yang seng ge'i khri rin po ches
32a2(1): bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ lA ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs bting ba/ kA tsa linI'i sring g.yogs can/ mtha' gnyis su rten ma bzang po bkod pa khrag khrig phrag drug tu
32a3(1): drug cu mngon par sbal to// seng ge'i khri de dag gi rkang rten rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can dag la ras bcos bu sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ shing bal las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / 
32a4(1): srin bal las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / zar ma'i shun pa las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / shun lpags las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / ka shi ka las byas pa shin tu phra ba phye
32a5(1): baphrag drug cu drug cu bting bar gyur to// seng ge'i khri de dag re re'i ngos gnyis su yang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rin po che sna bdun las byis pa
32a6(1): bsil yab thogs pa gnyis gnyis mngon par sbal te/ seng ge'i khrid de dag la lha ma yin gyi bu gnon nu 'khod pa dag la g.yo ba bo// khyams de dag re re zhing yang rin po che
32a7(1): sna bdun las byas pa'i gdugs khrag khrig drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// khyams de dag re re zhing yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug rngu mngon
32b1(1): bar sprul te// de la gser gyi khyams su na rgyal mtshan sngon po la lu bser po shal gyis sras pa dag bcugs/ dngul gyi khyams rnams suni rgyal mtshan ser po la'ang ba
32b2(1): ba zhiser gyi sras bdag bcugs/ beDUr 'i khyams rnams sun rgyal mtshan dmar po khu ba gser ba shal gyis smras bdag bcugs/ shel gyi khrims rnams su rgyul mtshan
32b3(1): dkar po'i yu ba bai DUr+ya gser gyis sbas pa dag bcugs/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan khra bo gser gyi yu ba baiDUr+yas sbas pa dag btsugs so// de la
32b4(1): rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni tog ser po// rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni tog sngon po// rgyal mtshan dmar po rnams ni tog dkar po/ rgyal mtshan dkar po rnams ni dog dam
32b5(1): po/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan rnams ni tog rin po che sna bdun sha stag go// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag par snang gi nam mkha' lding zhing / bcom ldan 'das
32b6(1): lan gsum bskor ba byed par gyur to// de 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che sa srung gi bu ni bar snang gi nam mkha' las 'gro zhing sum cu
32b7(1): rtsa gsum pa'i lnga rnams bskyed mos tshal yongs 'dus brtol du nye bar 'jug go// de bzhin du po zang gi rdal de dag kyang bar sdang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing / bcom ldan 'das
33a1(1): la lan gsum bskor ba byed do// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag dang / ba gam de dag dang / bzhugs sa de dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de

33b1(1): mchod pa des bus rgyas par gang bar gyur to// rin pa che ba zang gi rdal de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar

33b3(1): rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang spos chu'i rdzas kyi dri des khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi song chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khabs 'di'i sems cad gang
