86b6(1): me mnga'o// khyod kyis sred pa drung nas byung // ma rig pa ni thugs kyang byung // rnam pa bzhi po'i phyin ci log/ rnam pa kun tu yongs su spangs// gang du 'jig rten mi chud de// 
86b7(1): dgas rngon pas ci bzhin du// 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur ba yi// yang dag khyod kyis gzigs// sems can 'jigs tshogs lngar lhung ste// stong pa nyid ni ma 'chal bas/ 
87a1(1): ma rig pa'i mun pas gtibs// 'khor ba'i brtson rar dga' bar bgyid// khyod kyis yang dag ci bzhin du// 'gro de chang ba spong bar gzigs/ 
87a2(1): gang gis rnam dag mig byung ba'i// ye shes snang ba rab tu bstan// phung po stong pa rnam par shig/ ming dang gzugs kyang gsog 'dra zhing // khams rnams dang ni skye mched
87a3(1): dag/ bdag med stong bar rnam par shig/ chos gang dang ni ming gang gis// chos gang mngon par brjod bgyi ba// chos de chos des stong pa ste// thub pa khyod kyis stong par
87a4(1): bstan// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos med pa la// skye bo'i tshogs chen mngon sprul na// de la sems can gdags ma mchis// srog dang gang zag ma mchis ltar// de bzhin phung po
87a5(1): khams rnams dang // dbang po dag dang skye mched kyang // yang dag ma yin sgyu ma zhes// skye bu dam pas bstan pa mdzad// ji ltar ri mo mkhan zhig gis// bud med gzug
87a6(1): ni rnam bris shing // mnyam pa dang ni mi mnyam dang // l-I dang yang ba bstan bgyis kyang // byis pa'i mig ni bsras pa ste// de la mi mnyam ci ma mchis// de bzhin chos dbyings
87a7(1): mnyam lags na// khyis pa rnams ni de la rmongs/ gang shes khyod kyi srab pa la// legs bsrabs rmongs par mi 'gyur ba// lag mthil sbur ru ra bzhin du// de ni kun mkhyen
87b1(1): khyad kyis bstan// shes rab rten pa khyod kyis ni// me shes sngon ma rab bus te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas// sems can rnams la chos bstan pa// de ltar bdag
87b2(1): cag myur du ni// tha med byang chub ni thobs// de ltar 'dren pa khyod bzhin du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi// 'khor ba'i lam log 'di dag tu// 'khyams par 'gyur
87b3(1): pa'i sems can la// ji ltar 'dren pas bstan pa bzhin// bdag gis chos kyang chos myur bstan// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bani ris kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa
87b4(1): thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba// rgyu ma mchis par rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'dren pa
87b5(1): 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i 'dzum gyi rgyu// dpa' bo chen pos lung bstan gsol// skyes bu dam pa 'khor 'di dag/ bde gshegs deng bshad mthong nas ni/ 
87b6(1): yid gnyis chen po 'tshal 'gyur na// kun kyang the tshom 'tshal bar gyur// de ring su yis bdud pham bgyis// nem nur gang gis gcad par gyur// su zhig de ring chos stogs
87b7(1): gyur// skyes bu mchog gis lung bstan gsol// de ring khyod la su yis mchod// ston pa gang gis bsnyen bkur bgyis// 'gro kun nem nur 'chal gyur na// rnam par 'dren
88a1(1): pas lung bsan gsol// dzaM ltar rkang gnyis mchog khyod kyis// lung bstan 'di dag thos gyur na// 'gro bathe tshom 'tshal 'gyur ba// 'dren pas
88a2(1): de ltar lung bstan gsol// ci nas rnam pa thams cad du// kun mkhyen lam la gnas pa rnams// myur du byang chub thob 'gyur ba// de ltar 'dren pas bstan tu gsol/ 
88a3(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal ba// 'gro ba dran pa'i phyir// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgon po la// 'dzum pa'i rgyu rnams
88a4(1): dri bya zhes// rje thul khyod kyis dris pa legs// 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir// bstan pa yid du 'ong 'gyur zhing // nyams dga' byed pa de bshad kyis// dran pa mngon byor
88a5(1): mnyan par gyis// dgu khri rngam pa'i lha rnams kyis// mchod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu// de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la// shin du dang ba'i yid kyis byas// sangs rgyas mngon
88a6(1): par bsad pa byas// snang banyid kyang shes par gyur// chos rnams sanangs pa rnyed// rab bstan sa rab tu gnas// phrin yang songs rgyas bya ba'i zag/ brgyad chungs
88a7(1): 'di dag mchod// ma 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas ni// bye ba mtha' yas mchod par 'gyur// 'dzin pa de dag ji srid du// sangs rgyas bye ba gcig mchod cing // bstan bkur byas
88b1(1): bar bgyur pa/ de nyid byang chub 'tshang ma rgya// de bas shin du byi ba na// kun kyang gang zag mchog tu 'gyur// mtshan ni 'od zer chang bste// 'jig rten kun mkhyen
88b2(1): thub par 'gyur// 'jig rten sgron ma de dag gi/ nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba ni// blo'i mchog dang ldan pa dag 'dus pa brgyad cu 'byung bar 'gyur// slob med
88b3(1): gzigs pa de dag ni// mi rnams de'i dus kyi che// lo grangs bye ba brgyad cu tham// srog gi dbang po gnas par gyur// shes rab mtha' yas de dag gi/ nyan thos 'dod chag
88b4(1): bral ba rnams// lus kyi mtha' ma 'dzin pa dag/ bye ba tshang med 'byung bar 'gyur// sems can rnams lathugs brtse ba'o// 'jig rten mgon po dpal ldan rnams/ 
88b5(1): mya ngan 'das pa'i ring srel yang // shin tu rgya chen 'byung bar 'gyur// mi dbang mya ngan 'das gyur nas// rnam par 'dren pa dpal ldan pa// rgyal ba'i mchod rten rnams kyis
88b6(1): ne// sangs rgyas zhing rnams legs brgyan 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyis// mchod rten de dag thams cad la// srog chags brgya dang srong rnams dang / khrag
88b7(1): khrig rnams kyis mchod byas nas/ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/ mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur// rang byung mya ngan 'das nas kyang // de dag dam chos gnas
89a1(1): 'gyur ba// lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu chang bar gnas par 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams kyis// bzung zhing yongs su bsrungs par
89a2(1): gnas// 'jig rten thugs brje mdzad pa dang // shAkya yongs su sbyin mdzad phyir// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams la// 'jig rten sngon ma lung bstan ma dang// de thos nas na
89a3(1): skye bo kun// kun du dga' zhing rab dga' ste// sems can mgu yod rangs 'gyur nas// ston pa la ni mngon par bstod// rgyal chen bani'i ris kyi lngalha lung bstan
89a4(1): dpa'i le'u sde bcu bzhi pa'o// bam po drug pa'o// / de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba khrag brgyad
89a5(1): nus// lA ma yin dag dang / nam mkha' lding dag dang / klu'i bu mo dag dang / klu dag dang / grul 'bum dag dang / dri za dag dang / gnod sbyin dag dang / mi 'am ci dag dang / 
89a6(1): 'phreng ldan grang po can dag dang / rdul chen bani'i ris kyi lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan yang thos nas// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la tshim ning mgul yi rangs
89a7(1): / rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas// yid 'byung ba chen po skyes te// 'dod pa'i tshul gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod
89b1(1): kha byor btsun par gyur te/ de dag gis rin po che'i khang pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa rin po ches bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ mu tig dmar po'i 'greng ba dang / beDU 'i baphreng bas
89b2(1): brgyan pa// gser gyi 'phreng ba sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che skar mdog gi/ 'phreng bas brgyan pa// sa gnas rim brgyad dang / ba gam dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / 
89b3(1): skar khung gis brgyad pa// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis brgyan pa// lha'i seng ge'i khris brgyan pa// bla bre chen po dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/ 
89b4(1): lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa lha'i rol mo sel snyan sgra rab du byung ba phrag brgyad cu mngon par sprul to// rta cang shes kyis drang ba'i shing rnga lha rdzas kyi rnam pas legs
89b5(1): par brgyan pa// gdugs dang / mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mdzes par byas pa/ bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang mngon par sprul to// ser sra'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams
89b6(1): cad dang / ldan pa'i 'khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad me tog man+dA ra ba dang / lha'i mchod pa de dag gis rgyas par gang bar byas so// glang po che sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag
89b7(1): brgyad cu yang mngon par sprul te// glang po ches srung gi bu de dag re re zhing yang mgo bye ba phrag brgyad cu glang po ches srung gi bu'i mgo de dag re re zhing yang so drug drug/ so de
90a1(1): dag re re zhing yang rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu de dag re re zhing yang pad+ma stong phrag bdun bdud/ pad+ma re re ning yang 'dab ma brgyad khri brgyang khri/ 'dab
90a2(1): ma de dag re re ning yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo de dag re re zhing yang 'khor bdun bdun yod pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa sha stag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che
90a3(1): khang pa de dag mdun du byas te/ dbus su glang po ches srung gi bu dag btsud nas/ phyi bzhin shing rta de ltar bshams pa de dag bkye nas// bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas
90a4(1): so// rin po che khang pa de dag las kyang / lha'i tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / ut+pa la dang / ta ma la'i lo ma 'phye ma dang / gser gyi phye ma'i char mngon par bab par gyur to// 
90a5(1): gsar dang / dang la dang / baTar dang / lha'i me tog man+t+ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen
90a6(1): po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdag dkar chen po dang / sbal pa'i me tog gi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to// gser dang / dngul dang / byeDUr dang / shel dang / mu tig
90a7(1): dmar po dang / sdug dang / rdo'i sring po dang / rin po che sde bdun gyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to// lha'i bu ma de dag la la ni gru lon/ la la ni gar byed/ lal
90b1(1): na ral ma byed// lal na lus kyi tshul sbyar zhing / lha ma yin gyi mchod pa lta bu dang / glang po ches srungs gi bu de dag dang / rin po che khang pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas/ 
90b2(1): de'i 'og dun cang shes kyis drang ba'i shong rnga bye ba phrag brgyad la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas// lha'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang ba
90b3(1): yang phul bar gyur to// lnga'i bu mo sel sran bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to// shing rnga bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag la yang lha'i bu mo gzhan
90b4(1): bye ba phrag brgyad cu po mngon par sprul te// lha'i bu mo de dag kyang la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sbur zhing / lham
90b5(1): yin gyi mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin byas so// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag 'di snyam du sems te// ji ltar sprul pa'i lha'i bu mo 'di dag
90b6(1): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa las na/ chos thams cad kyang sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin du des so snyam nas// de dag 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni ci ltar de
90b7(1): bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa de bzhin pa skul ba dang 'dra ba yin ni sum du sems par gyur cing / de dag gis chos thams cad sprul ba dang 'dra bar shes nas/ chos lathe ma
91a1(1): med pa thob par gyur to// de dag de ltar the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom
91a2(1): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de dag chos cang sprul pa dang 'dra bar rtog cing / bdag cag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar
91a3(1): mthong / mchod pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong / bcom ldan 'das kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang bstan pa de dag kyang sprul
91a4(1): pa dang 'dra bar yang dag par shes te/ de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o// zhes bya bar shes nas// the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur te// de'i tshe bcom ldan
91a5(1): 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa gang bgyis dang // sprul pa'i mchod pa 'di dag gang bgyis dang // lha rnams kyi ni
91a6(1): sangs rgyas mchod byas pa// de ltar chos 'di thams cad sprul pa nyid// 'dren pas chos kun gsungs pa gang lags dang // de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mtha' dag
91a7(1): ba 'di das thams cad stsal pa 'ang shes// de ltar gyi tshigs de dag tho thos skyes// bcom ldan sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin du// son pa'ang de bzhin du stsal pa dang 'dra ba
91b1(1): / rnal bas lung bsan bdag cag 'tshal gyur pas// 'dil bdag cag pa chom ma mchis so// rgyal bsam mang skye bo rnams mthun nas// byis pa'i sa thab tha dang
91b2(1): gang btags pa// nga dag kun kyang sprul pa de bzhin de// bde gshegs 'gro ba lung bstan de bzhin no// slob pa rnams dang gang dag mi sra pa dang // bcom ldan nyan thos du
91b3(1): ba'i sa thob pa// de dag kun kyang bcom ldan sbrul dang 'dra// bcom ldan bstan la the tshom mchis so// bcom ldan gang rnams mi swa lhur len cing // gser ru lta bur gnyis
91b4(1): med nyon mongs spangs// de dag rnams kyang sprul 'dra bcom ldan 'das// bde gshegs bstan la the tshom ma mchis so// gang rnams 'gro ba kun la de phan phyir// rgyal
91b5(1): ba'i byang chub spyod pa bag yod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs sras dag kyang // khyad par ma mchis sprul pa 'di dang 'dra// bde gshegs rang byung rnam par
91b6(1): 'dren pa mchog/ stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas thugs rje can// ye shes stobs 'phags 'jig rten gtso bo dag/ srul pa 'di dgra de dag rang bzhin mtshungs// 'dren
91b7(1): pas 'di la chos rnams gang gsungs pa// gnas meng ni gsil nyon mongs med gyur cing // sdug bsngal ni byed mthar thug grangs med pa// de yang sprul pa de dag ci bzhin mo
92a1(1): bcom ldan 'di la chos rnams gang dag kyang // sprul pa'i rang bzhin ma lags de ma mchis// gang tshe go'u ta ma'i bstan pa 'di// bdag cag rdzogs
92a2(1): nas the tshom thams cad spangs// sprul ba 'di 'drar chos rnams kun mthong nas// bdag cag rnams kyang 'jig mgon por gyur// bde gshegs spyod yul 'di la spyod pa
92a3(1): rnams// the tshom ma mchis rang byung 'dren par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa
92a4(1): thugs su chud nas/ 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rda thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su gcad de/ gsol pa/ gnal yas grangs mnga' mtha'
92a5(1): yas gzi brjid can// bde gshegs rnams ni rgyu med 'dzum mi mdzad// rnam par 'dred pas 'dir ni 'dzum mdzad na// rgyal bas 'dzum pa'i tshigs gsungs the tshom khum/ 
92a6(1): shi rang byung ba de gshegs na sa nas 'dzum pa 'di khrung bar rig nas 'jig rten the tshom 'chal/ 'gro ba'i ba tshom thub pas bsal du gsol// 'gro ba 'di dag the chomamamami
92b1(1): mdzod// sna tshogs 'di rnams rab tu yid dga' bas// rgyal ba son de lnga rdzas rnams kyis mchod// bde gshegs de dag don du 'dzum pa mdzad// rgyal ba 'khor
92b2(1): 'dir dga' mdzad bka' stsal gsol// zla ltar dri med 'od mnga' mtha' yas gza'o// ci nas bde gshegs bka' ni 'di thos pas// mgon po 'gro ba thams
92b3(1): cad dgar 'gyur bar/ rgyal ba lnga tshogs mchod mkhyen bka' stsal gsol/ khad gshegs lnga tshogs 'di yis chos rnams kun/ sprul pa lta bur
92b4(1): rnam par rdzogs gyur na// stobs bcu mnga' bas don 'de bka' stsal te// rab rib bral ba lnga'i bslab pa gsungs/ skye bo 'di dge the tshom zag
92b5(1): gyur nas/ thub pa de ltar byang chub spyod rtsom 'gyur/ rab tu dpa' ba 'khor 'dis thos gyur te/ dgongs pa rig nas rgya chen rtsom par
92b6(1): 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa na thul la tshigs su bcad de sar bka' stsal pa// lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu dga' shes
93a1(1): nas rnga thul khyod kyis dus dang ldan pa'i tshig sbas pa de ni dus la bab pa ste/ 'dzum pa dris pa de ni lung bstan to// 
93a2(1): lha rnams bsam shes 'jug pa de dris pa/ des ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don chen byas// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu dengs bstan gyis// dga' zhing dang
93a3(1): sems kyis ngal son// lha tshogs rnams kyis chos rnams 'di dag ni/ ma lus sprul pa lta bur shes gyur nas/ chags med ye shes mthong ba dpag
93a4(1): med cing // rab rib bral ba'i 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// srid pa'i rgyun na sngon yang 'khor ba'i tshe// mi'i gtso bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed mchod
93a5(1): sred rgyud de na de dag thub pa las/ chos rnams sprul pa lta bur ma mthong ngo // 'di dag gang la mchod mchog 'dir byas pas/ chos rnams
93a6(1): sprul pa 'dra bar mngon du mthong / bde bshags bstan pa 'di la byas pa ni// chung zas mi 'gyur bar chad yod mi 'gyur/ 
93b1(1): sgrub tha mams ma la ma rnam sa man pa ma ma rdzur / khyung ga pas sa bang ba
93b2(1): sarnas pa lam kya stsal pa la ma /  sa gan jal par
93b3(1): das bstan pa pas mngagachos rnams 'di dag sprul pa'ang bar sems gnas dalas na pag mang
93b4(1): sgrar du mang byang chub mchag sa thasasem cu rtsa gsum pa grang bstan pa'i ya / btsas pam/ 
94a1(1): de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thob nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te// rab tu dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyang lung bstan
94a2(1): pa la/ thogs pa mi mnga' bar shes shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni nyams dga' ba ste// de dag thob nam shes pa 'am ma mthong ba'am// ma rtogs pa'am/ mngon sum du ma byas pa 'am/ 
94a3(1): skye ba 'am// 'gag pa 'am// las sam las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yang med do zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyed do// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis
94a4(1): thug su chud// shes par bya ba yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa 'dir zad do// de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid du rab tu gzigs/ rab tu mkhyen legs par mngon du mdzad pas// de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen
94a5(1): ba zhes bya'o// de la kun rdzob ni 'jig rten gyi spyod par de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so// don dam pa gang yin pa de ni rdzob du med pa ste/ shes rab bya ba ma yin pa/ rnam par bya ba ma yin pa/ yongs su
94a6(1): shes par byang ma yin pa// ma bstan pa rab tu ma bstan pa/ mthas par ma byas pa/ mnyes par rnam par ma shes pa/ ma bstan pa ma mthong ba// ma gtags pa 'dzin dum bcug pa/ rtogs
94a7(1): mgus pa/ thob par ma byas pa mthob pa/ nye bar ma bsnyen pa// mthong bam nag pa/ ma spangs pa bu ba med pa// byed pa med pa// rab tu ni pa med pa/ ma spang ba ma bstong pa/ thong pa ma yin pa
94b1(1): ma thob pa ma yin pa/ bde ba ma yin pa/ sdug bsngal ma yin pa// sman pa ma yin pa// gzugs ma yin pa// gzugs med pa ma yin pa/ grangs med pa/ bgrangs pa med pa/ 'jig rten
94b2(1): med pa// 'jig rten me dang bral ba med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa// rnam par byang ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ ldog pa med pa/ ma brtags pa rnam par ma rtags pa/ ma g.yos pa/ 
94b3(1): ma bsams pa/ ma bskyod pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa/ ma smos pa smos pa dang bral te/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
94b4(1): rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi mtshan
94b5(1): ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang
94b6(1): lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa// 
94b7(1): gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar gyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs su sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar du sems pa'i mtshan ma
95a1(1): // mi dmigs pa/ yid la bya ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ sa dang / chu dang me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dod pa dang / 
95a2(1): gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ltar chos gang dang gang brjod pa'i rang bzhin gang
95a3(1): gis brjod pa'i chos dang de brjod pa'i rang bzhin de dang des mi brjod pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de ltar nyams dga' ba yin na/ de byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa/ mi shes
95a4(1): pa rnams kyis thos na 'jigs shing sdang ba dang / skrag par 'gyur te/ des 'jigs par gyur pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las nyams par gyur te/ de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i
95a5(1): 'jig rten gi mya ngan du bya ba ste/ 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyun to zhes te/ de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi
95a6(1): don tu bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te// de dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod de/ bcom ldan 'das
95a7(1): gyi gabs la mgapas phyag 'jal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskar ba byas te// khrigs gcig tu 'kheng // thugs ga cig tu bdinas 'thabarnal byin ga gis bcom ldan
95b1(1): 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa rgyal ba khyod kyis phung po dben par gzigs// khams dang skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin te// dbang po'i grong ni mtshan mas dben
95b2(1): pa dang // kun kyang thub pa khyod kyi ji bzhin gzigs// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i dben pa 'di gnyis te// khyod kyis gzhan las ma gsan rang gis gzigs// de ni kun rdzob bden dang don
95b3(1): dam ste// bden pa gsum pa gang yang ma mchis so// gang gis bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba rnams// bde ba'i don du dad pa skyed 'gyur ba// rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams kyi don srud/ 
95b4(1): 'jig rten phan phyir kun rdzob de bstan to// sems can tshogs kyi 'gro drug gang bstan pa// sems can dmyal bdud 'gro ya dgas dang // lha min ris dang lha'i rigs rnams dang / ma'i
95b5(1): seng ges kun rdzob btags pa mdzad// rigs dma' de bzhin mtho ba'i rigs rnams dang // phyug po'i khyim dang dbul ba'i khyim rnams dang // zan gyi tshogs dang de bzhin yog gi tshogs// / 
95b6(1): bud med tshogs dang skyes pa ma ning dang // 'gro ba'i khyad par ji snyed gang yang rung // mtshungs med khyod kyis 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa// kun rdzob bden par mkhas pas thugs chung nas/ 
95b7(1): 'jig rten phan pas mo la de bstan to// de la dga' 'gro ba 'khor ba na/ 'gro ba'i chos brgyad de la mi 'byung ste// thob dang ma thob snyan dang mi sman dang // bsod dang spong dang sdug bsngal lo// 
96a1(1): thob brdzun da lachags bsgyud / mtha bag+h+nA sa kya nga zug par 'gyur// gang gcam pastan rdul 'dis byas par bya/ na masu sa
96a2(1): gnond par 'gyur// kun rdzob lnga don dam sa smra ba/ de dag rong ba'i blo ldanags par bya/ mr-i sdug sdug dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang / bdag med dang btsun pa dag tu smra ba
96a3(1): mi rtag chos la rtag ces smra bgyid cing // de ltar dga' skye mtshan mar gang gnas pa// de dag bde gshegs gsung ri thos gyur nas// 'jigs shing ji bzhin rtogs spong bar bgyid/ 
96a4(1): de dag bde gshegs gsungs ni srungs gyur pas// sems can dpral bar sdug bsngal mi bzang myong // de dag tshul mnA bde ba mtshol bgyid kyang // sdug bsngal brgyad
96a5(1): zos par myong bar 'gyur// 'jig rten yin pa'i bstan pas nig gis// ma yig blos ni rnam par rtogs gyur na/ sbrul gyi pags pa rnyi ltar rab srungs ni// srid pa kun las
96a6(1): 'das nas zhi bar 'gyur/ chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin dben pa ste/ snong pa mtshan ma med bdon dmanas// gang gis zlos nas dgi' bskyed pa 'gyur ba/ dag bla med byang chub khrong
96a7(1): 'gyur/  ltung ba dag shegs pas gsungs pa'i chos// de la lha rnam the tsom ma mchis te/ 'gro bathar cang yongasu dgrol ba'i phyir// ga blan med pa'i byang cing 'tshal/ byang chub blo nan rje dag thom
96a8(1): rnams/ sras bu mchog gis dga' ba skyeng dugs so// de gathos pa'i gre'i kun la srang srang du/ blan med pa'i byang chub grib par 'gyur/ de nas de'i bcom ldan 'ad kyis 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lba bye ba drag
96b1(1): bani bcu po reg gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thug su chud nas/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan la tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten panu pas 'dzum pa mdzad/ 
96b2(1): khyod kyi 'khor ni thi tsom 'tshal bar 'gyur// mi mchog 'dzum pa'i rgyu de bka' stsa la gos la// des ni 'khor 'di rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha rnams lung bsta na de ni thob gyur na// 'a'o
96b3(1): 'di shin tu dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur/ rigs pa ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la/ bde bar nan tan bgyid cing rtsom par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod 'khor 'di ni mchog ldan te/ drang srong
96b4(1): chen po sangs rgyas yon tan snod// 'gro ba 'di rnams bsdu ba mdzad skad du// snyan pa'i gsungs ni legs par brjod du gsol// sangs rgyas yon mthu' dag thos gyur pa// skye dgu
96b5(1): kun la rab tu smad par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan de thos nas// mkhas pa rnams ni tshul bzhin rtsom par 'gyur// mi'i dam pa slu ba'i mchog gis 'dir/ the tsom 'chol
96b6(1): kha'i nim nur legs par gsol/ 'khor rnams thams thos par dga' zhing sdod// lha rnams lung bskrun pa ni bka' stsal gsol// kun kyang rim gror gus par rna blags te/ khyod kyis
96b7(1): lung bstan rab tu dga' ba la// sgrib pa rab tu sang shing dag nyid// 'jig rten phan phyir skyes bu mchog gis gsung / de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis tshe dang ldan pa thul la tshigs bcad de
97a1(1): @#// sar bka' stsal pa// 'jig rten pan phyir mkhas pas 'jam mdzad pa// Na thul khrod kyis dris pa dus dang ldan// sangs rgyas yon tan mthu ni thos gyur na// skye bo tshogs chen rnam
97a2(1): kyi don du 'gyur// sangs rgyas yon tan tshogs la blo zhan cing // 'dod chags blo dang zhe sdang blo ldan zhing // tshe rabs brgyar ni rtsod pa'i blo can dang // gti mug blo can dga' bar snyed mi 'gyur// 
97a3(1): gang rnams rgyal bas bstan la dga' ba dang // gang gis rgyal ba rnams la sngon dris pa// gang rnams snying rje tshe dang ldan pa dag/ de kun sangs rgyas yon tan ldan par 'gyur// gang gis 'gro ba
97a4(1): gdon zin mthong 'gyur te// mi'i seng ge snying rje cher bskyed pa// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'di thos nas// ut+pal 'bring bzhin mgol khyer bar 'gyur// nga yi 'khor 'di rab tu gar gyur pa/ 
97a5(1): sngon gyi rgyal la bsnyen bkur sngon byas te// de dag sas rgyas yon tan yid 'ong 'di// me tog 'phreng ba nin de ngang yang dgas// 'thab bral lha rnams sngon gyi rgyal kun la// bsnyen bkur bus song
97a6(1): chags pa grangs pa// na mangs skang cing sangs kyis tha ldan 'gyur// ming rje gan nang pon mangs mang ba ldan// rgyal ba mi'i sang ba gad+hAn// khri steng ngan la sran chang bzhin pa rdug/ 
97a7(1): byang chu med pa ldan kyang cing // dag bamatha' las 'di gsu kyis byas// sems can can mongs 'angam drung rig rgya na/ ldag sngal gyur ba rnams la stong rje babyung / 'a ma
97b1(1): can pan mdzad la// chos tshul mtha' yas yongs su dris par gyur// gang thos nas ni rnam par 'dren 'gyur ba// rnam 'dren chos la 'jug pa 'chad par 'gyur/ mi'i nyon mongs spyod par rab
97b2(1): mkhyen nas// de dag rnams la rgya chen chos kyang 'chad// rnam 'dren skyes bu dam pa'i mchog de dag/ rang bzhin med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'chang // de dag rgyal ba'i gsung de thos gyur nas// 'gro ba
97b3(1): thams cad stong par rab tu rtogs// cis stong zhes bya mtshan ma'i rnam par stong // rang bzhin med cing mtshan ma med pa smra// rgyal ba'i chos rnams de ltar shes gyur nas// kun kyang sangs rgyas
97b4(1): yon tan rnams la gnas// de dag gang la mchod pa rgya chen byas// bdag gi chos bzhin du ni lung bstan nas// skar tshogs mnyam pa'i bskal pa dam pa la// bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// 
97b5(1): bde gshegs mnyam pa med pa bye ba phrag/ nyi shu nyi shu yongs su gang bar 'gyur/ blo gros dag ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro// sems can bsam yas yongs su spong bar 'gyur// 'thab bral 'khod
97b6(1): pa'i lha'i bsam pa rnams// rta thul gyis ni yongs su zhus byas pa// rgyal ba dgra rgyal drang srong chen po yi// lung bstan lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga'// // 'thab bral ba lung bstan pa'i
97b7(1): le'u bcu drug pa'o// de nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas 'thab bral ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas
98a1(1): rgya rgya// 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de gang zhig/ cig zugs sam/ 'on te tshor ba 'am/ 
98a2(1): 'on te 'du shes sam/ 'on te 'du byed dam/ 'on te rnam par shes pa zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan snyam ras/ de dag 'di snyam du sems
98a3(1): / gzugs ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis
98a4(1): na med par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/ byang chub sems kyang ma skyes pa na ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par
98a5(1): 'chang rgya bar bya/ tshor dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa yang byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na/ de la ji ltar ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ 
98a6(1): gzugs kyang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i yang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ gzugs kyang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang
98a7(1): smos pa med/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang smos pa med pa/ byang chub kyang smos pa med pa/ gzugs kyang gnyis su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang gami
98b1(1): chu med pa/ zung rngub kyang gcimasu med pa/ gzugs kyang g.yo ba med pa/ bung drung kyang g.yo bamed pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang gam ba med pa/ bung chub bang g.yo ba med pa/ blang
98b2(1): g.yo ba med pa/ ming gzugs kyang dmigs su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang dmigs su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs bu med pam cisar 'gag pa ze
98b3(1): pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa/ 'gag pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa'i bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ de ltar
98b4(1): chos thams cad mi dmigs na/ 'di la sangs rgyas ni gang / byang chub sems dpa' ni gang / lung bstan pa ni gang / gzugs ni gzugs kyis spong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
98b5(1): par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub ni byang chub kyis stong / 
98b6(1): lung bstan pa ni lung bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis song ste/ de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa la/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba/ 
98b7(1): dang / lung bstad pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang / lung bsan pa'i bar zhes bya ba de dag ni/ tha skad tsam mying tsam/ brda' tsam/ kun rdzob tsam/ brjod pa tsam gangags pa tsam sde/ de la mkhas pa rnams kyis
99a1(1): mngon par zhen par bya ba'i mi cha'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing rtse rtse ba las/ de nyal ba las bsad na 'dod pa'i yon tan de
99a2(1): dag mi mthong ste/ rjes su dran yang mi rnyed cing de ltar ma rnyed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyang byang chub tshol
99a3(1): na de dag byang chub dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub ma rnyed cing ro ma myong bas sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu nor bu ra ba ste/ chos de
99a4(1): dag gi don ni rnam pa bzhin la/ so so'i skye bo de dag kyang rnam pa gzhan du zhen to// chos de dag ni de ltar shes par bya ba ma yin na/ de la chos gang zhig sangs rgyas yin/ gang zhig byang chub sems
99a5(1): dpa' yin/ gang zhig byang chub yin/ gang zhig lung bstan pa yin/ de ltar chos thams cad dmigs su med de/ so so'i skye bo yang dmigs su med/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang dmigs su med/ 
99a6(1): nyan thos kyang dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dmigs
99a7(1): su med/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang dmigs su med/ sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang
99b1(1): u da/ brtsam ldan 'dam ma pa na can ze rnam ma mtsham/  namamam mtsham pa rnam sa 'anas/ dpa' 'an ngas kyi 'i 'du ga la ba sa da
99b2(1): med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la mthong ba bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/ de dag gis 'thab mal gyi mthong ba las zang bar du 'phags pa/ bcom ldan 'das la mdzang ba dus
99b3(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khor nas bcom ldan 'das 'gyi
99b4(1): su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas pa/ de dag 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// rnam thar sgo gsum po ni rnyed gyur pas/ mtshungs pa med nga'i
99b5(1): spyod yul spyod par 'gyur/ gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes ma yin te/ sems dang bsam pa de bzhin ma mchis pa/ chags med zo mnga' rnams kyi spyod yul lags mo'i seng ge phung po dben la byes/ 
99b6(1): skyes bu dam po mkhas pa de dag gis byang chub sems kyang nam yang byung ma mchis/ phung po dben pa'i yon tan myong 'gyur nas/ sangs rgyas dgongs la nem nur srungs blo ldar/ de dag byang chub spong pa ma
99b7(1): mchis shing / byang chub sems dpa' la yang de dag mi spong de/ dga' dang zhum par 'gyur ba ma mchis par/ bde gshegs sras rnams spyad pa spyod pa pogyid/ bde bar gshegs kyis chos rnam
100a1(1): @mnyam par gzigs/ de la rgyal sras 'jigs dang bral ba rnams/ yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas legs spyod cing / mkhas pa de dag 'jig rter 'dir spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma rnam
100a2(1): par gzhig bgyis shing / mtshan ma'i rnam pa thams cad rab spangs te/ srid pa gsum la de dag yang mi smon/ dngos po stong par smon lam de dag bgyid/ phung po 'di dag ma skyes rtogs gyur
100a3(1): cig/ lung bstan bde gshegs nyid kyang ma skyes la/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub byang ba skyes/ de ltar gang 'tshal de la rmongs ma mchis/ skye bo'i chos dang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams// dadag
100a4(1): kun dang bde gshegs ma skyes te/ mi'i seng ge de ltar gang 'tshal ba/ de ni khyod sras khyod ni de'i yab/ gang zhig phung po 'gags pa ma mchis shing / khams dang skye mched de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos
100a5(1): byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'di kun 'gag med 'tshal ba dang / gang rnams byang chub 'tshal zhing spyod bgyid pa/ 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag 'gag ma mchis/ 'gro ba zam
100a6(1): ca 'gag med thor gyur na/ de 'dra'i blo ldan byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ phung po skye mched dag dang khams rnams dang / byang chub rgyal brgyal sras mi g.yo bar/ gang gis 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i chos
100a7(1): 'di 'dzin pa lags/ phung po sems med de bzhin gyi mched dang / khams dang byang chub rgyal brgyal sas dang / lung bsan de bzhin sems pa ma mchis par/ rang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal
100b1(1): ba'i sras/ rang byung chen po dngos nyid stong pa ste/ khams dang skye mched dag dang rgyal ba dang / byang chub dang ni lung bstan rgyal sras rnams/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong par gang spyong pa/ thang
100b2(1): ba spros 'dra de bzhin khams rnams dang / skye mched rkang gnyis mchog dang byang chub dang / lung bstan spros pa med par gang spyod cing / de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras/ gnas pa
100b3(1): ma mchis mi gnas ma lags te/ mchis pa ma lags ma mchis yong ma lags/ 'dus byas ma lags 'dus ma byas ma lags/ de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras/ rgyal
100b4(1): dang 'gro 'di de ltar yongs mthong zhing / ston pa'i dgongs pa de ltar 'tshal gyur la/ de ltar bgyis na gang zag mchog mchod cing / 'dren pa 'khor dang bcas la ba sker bkur lags/ 
100b5(1): rnam par 'dren la bstod pa'i bsod nam gang / ji snyed 'jig rten par mdzad mkhyen pa yi/ dge ba de yis 'gro bar rang byung ba/ rgyal ba mtshan mchog ldan pa grub par shog/ de ras btso
100b6(1): ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan ris gyis lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol
100b7(1): be 'dren pa rgyu med stobs ni gang zhig gis/ stobs chen brnyes pa 'di ltar 'dzum mdzad do// 'dzum pa'i rgyu de 'dren pas bka' stsal gsol/ des na 'jig rter 'di dag dga' bar
101a1(1): / 'gyur/ kye thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum ma dzang ba/ 'gro ba 'dis mthong the tshom 'tshal 'gyur te/ nyan par 'chal zhing gzhan du mi sems par/ kun kyang 'jig rten par ni
101a2(1): zhal ru lA/ 'di ltar dper na nad pa nad skyo ba/ sman pas bsgo ba bzhin du 'dzin bgyid pa/ de bzhin 'a khor 'di lung bstan thob 'tshal zhing / rkang gnyis dbang po bde gshegs zhal du lta/ 
101a3(1): 'khor 'di thams cad rgya chen ldan pa ste/ sangs rgyas dgongs la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan/ rgyal bas lung bstan de dag zos 'tshal te/ kun kyang bde gshegs nal dulta zhing sdong / de la rgyal
101a4(1): thugs rje che bskyed cing / ci nas 'khor 'di rab tu dgar 'gyur dang / sangs rgyas dgongs la bsam pa gzhog 'gyur ba/ ye shes stobs kyi the tshom bcad du gsol/ mi'i khyu mchog lung bstan
101a5(1): dus la bab/ the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom gsal du gsol/ sangs rgyas slar sngo'i dgra ni mi mnga' na/ rtog ge'i tshogs kyi sde na gzhig du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul
101a6(1): la tshigs su bcad de skar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis 'jig rten sgor mdzad la/ 'dzum pa'i don dris de ni dus dang ldan/ de ltar 'jig rten mkhas la dris pas na/ di ring 'gro ba'i don
101a7(1): chen bya/ 'digarten pan phrir 'dzum pa 'di ma rang ba/ gang gis chos rab 'di dag shes gyur te/ nga la mchod pa rgya chen 'di byam pa'i/ dga' ldan lnga'i bsam pa mkhyen nas mdzang/ 'thong
101b1(1): yang dag rtogs pa bzhin du mthong / rgyal ba'i dgongs pas chos nyid rnyed par gyur/ gang la 'gro ba thams cad rmongs gyur pa'i/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rab tu rtogs/ sngon gyi rtul ba
101b2(1): rnams la lhag bya byas/ bsam pa cig gis nub legs par zhus/ de nyid du ni stong zhing legs par bsgoms/ sngan chad byas pa de ni 'dir yang bstan/ de dag de bzhin gshegs dang deng drang
101b3(1): cing / skyes bu mchog dang grogs pa thob gyur nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'dren pa bstod byas pas/ di ring 'gro ba'i don chen shin tu byas/ 'gro ba thams cad skye med ji bzhin du/ byang chub rgyal ba de
101b4(1): bzhin lung bstan dang / gang dag zhi ba thob nas spyod pa dang / byang chub de bzhin de dag skye ba med/ 'gro ba kun gyi chos nyid 'di 'dra ba/ de shes byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes/ lha rnams gang yang
101b5(1): de la the tshom med/ byang chub sems kyis rtag par de ltar spyod/ de bzhin 'gro ba 'gag med ji bzhin du/ lha tshogs 'di dag rtogs pa'i blo can te/ mkhas pa 'di dag nem nur med pas na/ de phyir
101b6(1): 'di dag rgyal bar rang byung 'gyur/ gnas pa med pa la ni des gyur na/ g.yo ba med pa de la nem nur med/ 'gro ba kun la sems pa yang min pa/ de la'ang lha rnams the tshom yong med do// chos rnams
101b7(1): ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med/ byang chub sems dang de bzhin byang chub dang / thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med/ de la'ang lnga rnams the tshom rnam par dag/ tho mchog ldan pa'i dga' ldan lnga
102a1(1): bya // 'di rnams/ kun kyang gnas med de la rab gnas te/ de phyir lha rnams byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ rang byung nyid ni myur du thob par 'gyur/ 'dren pa skar ma 'dra bar bskal pa la/ 
102a2(1): 'gro ba mtha' yas rnams par 'brel bar 'gyur/ rgyal ba de dag mtshan du 'gyur ba ni/ rang 'byung chos la rnam nges rgyal ba'o// de ltar rgyal bas la dga' ldan lha rnams kyis/ bsam pa mkhyen
102a3(1): te 'gro ba bstan mdzad pa/ de thos nas ni lhar bcas 'jig rten yang / yid rangs gyur cing stobs kyang thob par gyur// dga' ldan pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// de nas de'i
102a4(1): rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga' ba bye ba phrag bdun cus lha ma yin rnams nas// dga' ldan ris kyi bar gyi lha de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgul
102a5(1): yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas shing / de bzhin nyid la the tshom med par gyur nas/ stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
102a6(1): rgal mgo bas phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bdir logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bang
102a7(1): thag gis 'tshal bal na/ chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' dang mtha' das mtha' yas pa'i mtha' dang / mi gnas pa'i mtha' dang mi bzang pa'i
102b1(1): mtha' dang / mi gnyis pa'i mtha' ste/ mtha' ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de la ma nor ba'i slang du yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// chang ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' yas pa'i mthar
102b2(1): zhes bgyi'o// chags pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ngo bo zhing ma mchis pa'i slad du mi gnas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i spang du
102b3(1): mi zad pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ro gcig pa'i slad du mi gnyis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' ma mchis pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'
102b4(1): 'di ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba lags te/ chos gang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i
102b5(1): mtha' ste/ byang chub gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis pa ni byang chub lags par rig par bgyi'o// zan mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub bo// de ci'i
102b6(1): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni rang bzhin ma mchis ste/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang rang bzhin ma ma mchis pa lags pas/ de'i slad du mtshams med pa rnams kyang byung
102b7(1): chub bas brgya'o/ bcom ldan 'dam phreng ba ma lus pa'i myangan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni rang bani ma mtsham pa sa/ mtshams med pa rnams pang ngo'i rang bzhing ma ga ci'i thang du rjes
103a1(1): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das gang
103a2(1): su dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal ba de dag ni gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te 'khor bar bzhugs pa zhig mchis na ni/ mya ngan las 'das
103a3(1): pa yang 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'khor bar bzhugs pa gang yang mchis na/ de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
103a4(1): rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ lha'i dbang po rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga'
103a5(1): ris kyi lta bye ba phrag bdun po de dag rang gis lung bstan pa gsan nas 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa na thul gyis bcom ldan 'ad
103a6(1): la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas 'dzum pa mdzad// 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni khyod kyis ma bstan to// rang byung skyes bu dam pa gang dag kyang // rgyu ma ma mchis par
103a7(1): 'dzum pa mo mdzad pas// khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum pa mdzad pas/ mthong nas lngar bcos 'jig rten tho chom 'tshal/ 'dzum pa'i rgyu gang lags rang byung gsungs/ the tshom 'jal na
103b1(1): the tshom bsal du gsal// khyod kyis 'jam mdzang skye thos gyur na// 'khor 'di thams cad ngo mchar thob par 'gyur/ byang chub mchog ni yongs su bsgru bslad du/ de dag lam mtshan
103b2(1): shin tu rnam dag 'gyur// the tshom 'tshal ba dag ni nam du yang // byang chub yid bzhin bde bar mi 'grub ste// the tshom som ni bsal nas mkhas pa rnams// byang chub mchog mi
103b3(1): dang skal ldan 'gyur/ rkang gnyis dbang po khyod kyi 'khor gyi 'khor 'di dag/ sdig pa yongs spangs byang chub sems dang ldan// lha rnams lung bstan de dag thos gyur na// rgyal ba'i ni
103b4(1): 'phang rgya chen thob par 'gyur// de bas rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing // the tshom 'chel ba rnams la thugs brtse bas// lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad lung bstan cing // 'gro ba 'di dag pam
103b5(1): cad dga' bar mdzad/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// ngas ni 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa mdzad// na thul khyod kyis
103b6(1): zhu ba de nus pa// lung bstan de ni khyod la ma lus par// snyan par ngas byas pa kun kyang nyon/ 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha tshogs 'di rnams kyis// thams cad mkhyen par bdag cad
103b7(1): lung bstan te// mu stegs tshogs kyi bsam pa zil mnan nas// 'khor 'dir seng ge'i nga ro chen po bsgrags/ gnam du rdo 'phangs sa la ltung ba ltar// de la the tshom za bar mi 'gyur te/ 
104a1(1): de ltar the tshom med pa'i tshul thob pa/ bdag cag zhi ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes// nyi ma nub gyur nas srod gyur pa'i tshe// mi rnams zla ba myur du 'char bar shes// de bzhin rgyal
104a2(1): ba'i sras po tshul thob dag/ bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur mnga' bar shes// skar tshogs dbus na zla ba gnas pa ni// sems can mtshungs par 'di la the tshom med// de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras
104a3(1): po tshul thob dag/ bdag cag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar shes// ji ltar cim nub par gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin bde gsheg sras po tshul shes pa/ ye shes dam pa thob par 'gyur du shes/ 
104a4(1): chu klung ji ltar gzhol bar 'bab 'gyur zhing // rgya mtshor 'bab par mkhas pa rnams kyis shes/ de bzhin bde gshegs spras po tshul shes pa/ byang chub rna chen thob par 'gyur bar shes/ 
104a5(1): de ltar gnam du bong ba 'bangs pa ni/ sal ltung bar 'gyur du the tshom med/ de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa de dag kyang / 'jig rten mkhas par myur du 'gyur zhes 'jug/ gang thob nas ni the ma
104a6(1): med 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas yon tan gnas par bdag shes la// rang gi sar zhe lag stong ma yin par// mkhas pa rnams kyis chos ning rab tu mthong // gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni bye ba phrag/ 
104a7(1): sangs rgyas gzugs bsgyur bar chad smras bus kyang // chos la mkhas pa chos cid rab mthong ba// de dag byang chub las ni zlog mi nus/ de ltar sangs rgyas yon na rab gnas shing / bdag gi bdang
104b1(1): nyid yon tan brjod byed pa// de la 'dren pa cho ga tshul mkhyen pa// mi dbang lung bstan de la yi rang mdzad// de ltar lha tshogs 'di dag tshul 'di la// gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog mngon shes shing // 
104b2(1): de dag bde gshegs 'gyur zhes rang sprul// 'jig rten mkhas pa rjes su yi rang mdzad// rta thul de bas mkhas pa gang gis rnams// bla med byang chub thob par byar sems pa// de dag tshul 'di
104b3(1): shes par gang gyur pa'i// 'phags pa'i skye bo mkhas la bsten par bya// gang dag tshul la 'jug pa rab mthong zhing // mkhas pa gang dag bde gshegs bsnyen bkur ba// de dag byang chub lag
104b4(1): mthil 'dra bar bsal// tshul shes de dag rang gis rang 'byung 'gyur// gang gis bskal pa stong du dka' thub spyod // sha khrag lpags la mi lta byas pa bas// gang gis tshul 'di skad cig
104b5(1): rtogs gyur na// de ni khyad 'phags dka' thub de ltar min// 'das pa'i rang byung gang rnams 'byung ba dang // ma 'ongs sems can phan bzhed gang 'byung dang // da ltar dus na 'dren pa gang
104b6(1): bzhugs pa// kun kyang tshul gyis bde bar gshegs pa thob// rab 'phrul lha tshogs thub pa'i tshul shes pa// 'di dag nga la mchod pa mchog byas shing // 'dren pa thams cad bsnyen bkur rab
104b7(1): byas nas// tshul gyis su ni rang byung thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i ting 'dzin gang yin pa// de ni rgyal ba rang byung gnas pa rnams// de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul po// tshul
105a1(1): / 6/ tho ba rnams kyis sngon bsten myur du thob// de la rta thul sangs rgyas sras rnams ni// sangs rgyas gnas pa de la nem nur med// sangs rgyas tshul la sems can rnam brtse ba/ 
105a2(1): tshul shes pa dag ston pa'i lam la spyod// de ltas tshul la dad pa'i yid byas ste// brtsams par bya ba'i sdug bsngal spyod la min// rtag tu bde bar gshegs pa bsten byas na// bla med byang
105a3(1): chub myur du thob par 'gyur// ba bar gshegs pa'i gsung mchog thos nas ni// 'khor kun rgyal ba'i byang chub yang rangs ste// rjes su yi rangs the tshom med gyur nas// 'phrul
105a4(1): dga' ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / bam po bdun pa'o// // de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po dbang bsgyur la sogs pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rigs kyis lnga
105a5(1): lag khrig phrag brgyang rgyas lAm yon rnams nas 'phrul dga'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang bris nas tshim ning mgu' la yi ngas te/ rab tu dab
105a6(1): ba'i dga' ba dang / ying bde bskyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das 'bul dga' ldarna pas kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes pa rnas
105a7(1): sa ba ga cag pas ni sang dag pa ying ma dri mibasan/ de'i mtha' gsus kyad ci 'jal/ de ci'i sring dre te/ bran bldan 'das 'angs la ni ga nas mang ga pa rang migs / 
105b1(1): yang de ltar dmigs par 'gyur te/ de ni gnyis kyis spyod pa'o// de ltar bu de ni theg pa la yang dag par bzhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags so// 
105b2(1): bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gnyi su mchis pa'i chos rnams la/ zhes mi spyod ma mos na/ de 'di snyam du bdag cag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// snyam du sems leg
105b3(1): kyang / de ni lam log par bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi ba'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub tu smon pa 'di ni lam log par zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
105b4(1): gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'ga' zhig dmigs par gyur na/ byang chub mngon par rdzos
105b5(1): par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das chos ni 'das pa ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa ma lags/ da ltar byung ba ma lags// 'dus byas ma lags// dngos po ma lags/ dngos
105b6(1): dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags// mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags// spangs par bgyi ba ma lags// bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon
105b7(1): tu bgyi ba ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba de yang chos gang gis gnyen po yang ma lags la/ chos gang yang chos de'i gnyen po ma lags so/ de ci'i slang du zhe na/ chos de
106a1(1): ri kun nas nyon mongs par lags/ rnam par byang ba ma lags te/ gang gis chos gnar gyi gnyer por gyur pa'i chos de yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmig sa
106a2(1): gang ches de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i chos gcan de gang yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so// de ci'i slad du ne na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cing ni mtshan ma pa ma thal ba ste/ de dag na
106a3(1): mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spangs par bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'dra
106a4(1): gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshar ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyi ma skyes pa'i
106a5(1): mtshan ma nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de yang ma skyes pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyi 'gag pa ras rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi 'gag pa gang lags
106a6(1): pa de yang bgag pa'i mtshar ma dang bral ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba yang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang bral ba'o// 
106a7(1): 'dus byas kyang 'dus byas kyi mtsharam dang bral ba'o// 'dus mthas kyang 'dras mabyas kyi mtshan ma dang bral bag// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ji tsam du pung pos bzung ba'am/ 
106b1(1): skye ba dang 'gag pas bzung ba'am/ 'das pas 'bral ba'am/ ma 'ongs pas bzung ba'am/ da ltar byung bas bzung ba'am/ bdus byas kyis bzung ba'am/ 'dus
106b2(1): mi byas kyis gzung ba de dag ni rnam pa thams cad du mi dmigs te/ de ltar mi dmigs pa de ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba yang ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba yang
106b3(1): ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba'ang ma lags/ bsgom par bya ba'ang ma lags/ mngor du bgyi ba ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / 
106b4(1): rigs kyi bu mo de ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa ces bgyi'o// de ras gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha de dag gis ji ltar shes pa'i chos de lta bar lung
106b5(1): bstan nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das srid pa mthar phyin legs par gsungs// 'drer par
106b6(1): srid pa'i snying por brnyes na// skye bo mi mkhas de dag 'jigs pa yis// 'khor ba'i pha rol bgrong phyir rab tu zhugs/ phung po rnams ri kAr tu mi dmigs te// phung po
106b7(1): mtshan mas phung po stong pa nyid// chos gang gi gnyen por gyur pa ni/ mtsha mas steng ste gang yang ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid kyis steng phyir dngos po gang / yongs shes
107a1(1): chung sad paskams du du phyu g+sa gang sa mA mAn+tas gang du sa mi dmigasan// dngas parnams ning ngas med byung gsung// byang rlabs
107a2(1): mthun mar ma migs// byang chub grags chis rnams dpaser// sangs rgyas gang yang mtshan par me dmigs te// byang chub sems dpa'amamarnams rnam
107a3(1): mi 'gyur/ mamakhas gang dag pa tshan ma mngon zhe na/ de dag byang chub 'drang \u0f7fsems bskyed kyang / mtshan par spyod cing spyod yul lag pa ste/ blo gros mamam
107a4(1): lam mo sbyang / mtshan masus spangs sangs rgyas spyod yul la/ spyod pa de dag sangs rgyas bstaran lam khams/ mtshan pa de bzhi na mtshan med spangs ste/ ste dang sa
107a5(1): stong de bzhin dmigs med pa/ mkhas pa de dag byang chub la ma la skyeng / de dag byang chub dam ni pa thob/ phas kyi rgol bkur gyi spyod yul min/ gnas de nyar rdzas
107a6(1): rnams kyis bgrong bya man/ rang rgyal rnams kyang de la mi 'gro ste/ rnam grol sems ldan zag med thub med/ dgra ba com bstan pa 'di la gang brtson dang / de bzhin rang
107a7(1): rgyal skyeb par gyur pa dag/ mkhas pa'i spyod yul nga la spyang yul med/ go'abang de mtshan me skyeng pa dang / tshe steng pa 'di la sdom pa dang / bang rnams stong pas skyeng nas/ 
107b1(1): snong sgra dang / chos kun rang batshan yang smras 'thob ma nus/ sangs rgyas ma smang rnams kyi bslab pa la/ slob dang rnam thal slob pa slob pa'i rnams/ mkhas de rtogs pa med
107b2(1): par byeng chub rtogs/ storabs bstar pa bzhin du gyes byed lags/ sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo bstod pasan/ bdag cag bsang rams ma rnye gang thob des/ 
107b3(1): pa byang chub dam pa 'chang tu zhing / mi shes ston mdzad sangs rgyas grub par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gsar 'phrul dbang
107b4(1): byed ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag brgya cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud ras/ skye bo pa la po che de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas
107b5(1): ri dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gzhon 'phrul dbang byed lha'i bsam mkhyer nas/ rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad la/ thub pas
107b6(1): 'dzum po'i rgyu ni ma gsungs la/ rgyal ba 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bstar du gsol/ 'drer pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad ces/ rgyal ba khyu mchog dam pas de sad gsungs/ 'jig rten don
107b7(1): srang 'dzug pa mdzad pa'i rgyu/ 'dren pa bka' stsal the tshom bsal du gsol/ drang srong chen po'i zhal nas 'dzum rigs nas/ mthu cher khyod kyi 'khor rnams ji tshim 'tshal/ go'u ra
107'a1(1): rgyal bas 'dzin pa sa lta/ 'jig spya sa 'ad+hAm sang bsanags pa/ bde dga' kho ba'i rlungs cu bzugs / mu las
107'a2(1): pa'i sems kyis thal sbyar snad/ 'khor 'di yangs pa'i sems ldanathe tshoma'i tshul/ don yod grags mnga' so mu zhi bas bai drugasel// 'dzir ner slar srung bde
107'a3(1): gshegs bstan la the tshom ma mchis te/ phyir zhing dang bskyed rim 'gro tshar bgyid de/ the tshom mi'i tshul sems ri grol 'gyur bar/ rnal bas skye bo'i the tshem lags
107'a4(1): par 'khum/ bde gshegs bstar la 'di dag bde garas shing / gang lam rang byung rgyal ba gshegs gyur pa/ lam deras ni the tshom ma mchis mchig/ de bas
107'a5(1): po'i dri tshom bcad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldar pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ skye bo tshogs ched don dbang brten byas nas/ tshigs su bcad de dus su seM
107'a6(1): sma ning / 'dzum pa'i don gyi na yongs su zhus pa/ khyod kyi tshig ri dus dang ldan pa yi/ dathul dri bde'i don dris pas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen 'di'i don byas 'gyur/ khyod kyis de dris skye che
107'a7(1): chen dag/ byang chub mchog te yang nga ba zhus par 'gyur/ gzhan 'phrul debang byed pasam pangs mkhyen te/ dbul 'dzum pa 'di ni ngas bstan to// 'jig cher mkhyen pa bstan pa'i las
107'a8(1): 'di nas/ don du gnyer ba 'di dag de bzhin 'dod/ gang gis 'gro ba 'odangs mtshan med par/ smig rgyu la ni ji ltar chu bzhin mthong / byis pa'i rmongs pa mkhas pa'i tshul bzhin te/ 
107'b1(1): de dag rje su byang chub 'dod pas bslab/ mtshan ma'i 'du shes spang phyir mi rnams gang / rtag tu mtshar ra mngon dga' 'jigs 'gyur zhing / mtshan ma'i 'du shes log pa'i
107'b2(1): lam du 'dod/ mtshar ma med pas byang chub mchog 'thob 'gyur/ med pa'i rtog ldan mnan mar rnam brtag nas/ ji lngar brtags pa de ltar mchis pa yin/ mtshan ma stong
107'b3(1): par rnam mthong mkhas pa yi/ zhi ba dag ni dam pa 'thob/ 'du shes mtshan chen mnyam sems rgyud kyis/ sdig pa bgyi dag mi mkhas de dag byed/ 'gro ba kun du sdug
107'b4(1): bsngal mi chung myong / de ltar mi mkhas mtshan mar brtag pa byas/ mtshan mar 'du shes pa ni phung po dang / sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems dpa' mthong / de ltar mtshan
107'b5(1): ma med cing stong mthong ra/ byang chub gzhal med bla na med pa 'thob/ 'du zhes mtshan ma can la nyon mongs 'phel/ mtshan maM med pa kun tu spyir ba sbeng / mtshan ma las ni kun sbyor
107'b6(1): gzhan med de/ kun tu sbyor ba de nyid mtshan med yin/ gang rnams byang chub thob par bya rtog pa/ rtog pa de nyid mi mkhas pa'i longs spyod rnam pa thob byed na/ longs spyod de nyid mchin ma med par
107'b7(1): 'gyu chos rnam gang yang rang bzhin nyid kyis med/ rnam par rtog pas chos byung kun kyang steng / rtog pa med pas mtshan ma med par 'gyur/ de nying byang chub ngu ni mkhas mi smra/ rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag
107'b8(1): thos gyur nas/ mi 'jigs ldan pa'i 'khor ni the tshom bsul// dper na tsam pa ka'i 'dzir pa ltar/ mkhas rnams thub pas gsungs pa leg shes 'dzin/ 'jigs pa med pa'i lha tshogs 'di dag gis/ mchod pa 'phag
108a1(1): / pa blan med bum shing // rgyal ba'i spyod yul chos kyang rnam shes nas// 'gro ba rnam par 'dren pa kun ma khyen gyur// gzhan 'phrul bang byed pa lung bstan pa'i
108a2(1): 'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bye ba phrag drug cus lha ma yin rnams nas/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha'i bar dag gis mchod pa yang mthong / 
108a3(1): lung bstan pa yang zos nas/ tshim zhing mgul yi rang te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bgyur
108a4(1): byas pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan la mi 'dod pa skyes shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di la ni snang ba thob ste/ chos zab mo
108a5(1): la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag gis chos thams cad byas pa yang ma yin/ ma byas pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de bzhin du skyes pa yang ma yin// 
108a6(1): ma skyes pa yang ma yin/ byung ba yang ma yin/ ma byung ba yang ma yin/ grub pa yang ma yin/ ma grub pa yang ma yin/ 'phags pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ogags pa yang ma yin/ 
108a7(1): gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang mayin/ rnam par byang ba yang ma yin/ rjes su chags pa yang ma yin/ khong za ba yang
108b1(1): ma yin/ rmongs pa yang ma yin/ marmongs pa yang ma yin/ shes pa po yang ma yin/ shes pa po med pa yang ma yin/ mthong ba po yang ma yin/ mthong ba po yang ma yin/ tshor
108b2(1): ba po yang ma yin/ tshor ba po med pa yang ma yin/ ston pa po yang ma yin/ ston pa po med pa yang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin/ dngos po yang ma yin/

109a3(1): kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin// rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can ma yin// byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' ma

109b1(1): bzad pa'i phyir// nga'i snying dag ni bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su brgyad pa dag gi sna mngon par spang pa/ nil zhi ba'i thugs mnga' ni baspyad cing ni ba'i pha rol khron// nib brten
109b2(1): par mdzad cing 'gro la zhi ba ston pa rjes su son// zhi ba'i spyod yul dgyes shing byang chub zhi la dri zal 'khrugs ma mchis// khyod kyis 'chi med zhi ba 'gro rgyud thams cad zad pa myur du
109b3(1): brnyed/ ni ba thob par bgyid pa'i zhi ba'i lam mchog zhi ba yang dag ste// yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs slong rnams ni mdzad 'gro ba thams cad btom// sngon gyi rgyal bas bstan pa'i byang chub
109b4(1): gzhal yas zhi ba de 'god// de snyed sangs rgyas 'phags pas bsten pa'i grong khyer zhi bar deng zhes gsungs// 'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bsten pa'i bslab pa bsnyen/ 
109b5(1): gal te bslab pa de slob 'gro ba 'di dag byang chub gzhal yas thob// bslabs nas zhi zhing yid zhi zhi ba'i lam dong dbang po zhi ba dag/ 'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro ba ni byed mthu chen zhi ba shes
109b6(1): par gyur// 'dren pa khyod kyi sras mchog zhi pa 'gro ba zhi bgyid gang dag gis// 'chi med ni ba mtshan ma thams cad zad pa rnam par rtogs gyur pa// de dag 'dren pa tshul la mkhas pa mchod
109b7(1): pa mchod pa mchog gis mchod par 'gyur// nyon mongs ni zhing mtshan ma kun spangs ni brtags tu ston par 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad ni zhing mtshan ma thal ba de nyid mya ngan 'das// thu
110a1(1): / pa gang dag zhi las zhi 'dod sems pa de dag nyon mongs 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod kyi byang chub dang ni 'gro kun chos kun bsam mi khyab/ thub pa blo ldan 'dam las rgal ba de la bdag
110a2(1): cag dogs ma mchis// gang dag phung po bor te byang chub zhi tshol de la zhi bar rtogs// phung pos 'jigs pa de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la dga' ma lags// dben pa'i blo gros ldan pa/ 
110a3(1): zhi tshol de dag blo 'khrugs gyur pa ste// chos kyi mtshan ma spyod yul 'di dag byis pa zhes ni ston pas gsungs// thams cad mkhyen pas zhi dang mtshan ma'i 'ching ba zhi bdag gsungs//

110a5(1): yul thob par gyur// bdud kyi rtsod las rgyal nas nyon mongs zhi ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa thob// rna mo 'drer zhi ba mdzad la bstod pas bdag rngub bsod nams gang rnyed pa// chags med thug
110a6(1): mnga' bde bar gshegs pas 'di tsam zhes ni mkhyen gyur pa/ des ni 'gro ba thams cad lam mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsnyer gyur pa/ ni bying zhib bsnyen nas mkhas pas mchod pa'i
110a7(1): ni rang byur sdig med shog/ de nas ma ma dzad kyi bdag patshangs pas tshangs pa rnams dang / lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la stong par rig nas/ bdag nyid kyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs
110b1(1): bcad pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ ming bang khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad ni/ log pa rmongs byed chang ba stong 'dra zhing / ston gyi sprin 'dra mig 'phrul 'a
110b2(1): bar mkhyen/ rgyal bas 'dod pa'i yon tan med par mkhyen/ ji ltar mi zhig rmi lam bkres gyur pa// kha zas ro brgya zos kyang ma 'drangs pa// de la bkres med zas med sems can med/ 
110b3(1): rmi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cad gzigs// skom pa'i mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na// chu bsil dang zhing rnyog med 'thungs gyur kyang // ngoms med tsha ba zhi bar mi gyur te// de bzhin
110b4(1): khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad gzigs// 'di la byed med tshor med sems can med// byas pa de bzhin med cing rnam smin med// 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur ba de med ces// 'di 'dra'i chos
110b5(1): mkhyen the tshom yod mi mnga'// mi zhig yid du 'ong ba'i tshig smra na// dga' bar 'gyur yang tshig la 'pho ba med// tshig nyid med cing dgar 'gyur dngos kyang med// de mkhyen de la the tshom yo
110b6(1): mi mnga'// pi waM sgra snyan mnyan na rnar snyan te// sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod min// de ltar mkhas pas phung po 'di gzigs na// phung po'i rang bzhin gang yang dmigs mi mnga'// nor bu rin
110b7(1): chen rang bzhin gsal dag pa// gos kyi drung banas sna tshogs mtshon du 'gyur// de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang // log pa'i rnam par rtog pas de ltar gyur/ brlan dri ming spyod
111a1(1): @#// dang bral ba yang // rkyen dang sbyar na dri ni ma gzhan du 'gyur// de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang // sos rang gis brtags pa'i rnam pa bzhin// ri ltar mi yis dung
111a2(1): sgra thos te// sgra 'di ga las byung zhes brtags pas kyang // rang bzhin stong pa'i dngos te de mi dmigs// ming bang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// ji ltar mi zhig gsod pa'i kha zas la/ 
111a3(1): yan lag srog phan ji ltar 'gyur brtags na// dngos med yan lag srog kyang de bzhin te// drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs// ji ltar mi zhig nam mkha'i 'ja' mthong na/

111a5(1): rnam gzigs na// zong khyer rang bzhin de bzhin ming mi dmigs// grong khyer ji bzhin de ltar yan lag gling / mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus dga' bar zhig

111a7(1): ni phyogs su mi 'gro 'byung ba med// phyogs su de bzhin 'gag par mi 'gyur te// mo dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji yar jing brdungs pa'iH// thogs pa med cings

113a1(1): @/ 'brel cing gnas par 'gyur/ de dag rnams kyis sangs rgyas ning ni ning gi 'byor ba gnal yas te// 'dren pa chen po rnams kyis bskal pa khrag zig rnam pa dramar ni/

113a3(1): chos ni 'gro la ston par 'gyur// de dag zhing mchog rnams su skyo ba'i thams cad mkhyen la ma sbyangs pa'i// sems can gcig kyang mi 'byung srid pa de la phan la mya ngan 'da'// de dag

113a6(1): de bzhin bdag med dang // zhi ba sring cing mtshan med ni maud mya ngan 'das dang byang chub ni// swa skad de dag yang dang yang 'byung de dag rnal gnas par 'gyur// sgra mang rdzas nas de dag
113a7(1): 'khor ba bral gnas thob par mi 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i sA shing ngam rtsig pa dag dang gang na'ang yong mi 'gyur// zag pa med dang mkha' dang gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang rnams nams/ 
113b1(1): de tshe sangs rgyas mthu las yan lag brgyang dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byung // de tshe 'dres pa'i nyes pa med cing 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang dang // gti mug dag gis gzir ba rnams kyin na

113b3(1): bskal pa zag khrig byang chub brtson byas nas/ drang srong chen po de dag smon lam gyis ni 'byor pa 'di bsags te// zhing mchog den sems can tshogs gang yod pa de kun bde gshegs 'gyur/

113b6(1): pa'o// // de nas 'od gsal gyi lha bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyis/ lha ma yin rnams nas tshangs pa'i bar gyi lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgul

114a1(1): bder lags su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du gang la bsupa
