115a3(1): pa// yongs su gtang du ma mchis pa/ ma btang ba yongs su ma btang ba ste/ a zhes bgyi ba ni sus kyang ma bgyis// chos gang gang gi 'gag pa'i rgyu 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so// 
115a4(1): a ni ma lags pa yang ma lags pa ste// chos gang gi mi 'gag pa'i rkyen du 'gyur ba ma lags so// a ni gnas pa yang ma lags// mi gnas pa yang ma lags/ a ni
115a5(1): btags pa yang ma lags/ ma btags pa yang ma lags// a ni spangs pa yang ma lags/ ma spangs pa yang ma lags// a ni shes pa yang ma lags/ ma shes pa yang ma
115a6(1): lags/ a ni dmigs pa yang ma lags/ ma dmigs pa yang ma lags/ a ni stong pa yang ma lags/ mi stong pa yang ma lags/ a ni dmigs su mchis pa ma lags/ dmin/ 
115a7(1): ma tshas pa sang pal sa// ma rnam sang sa lags/ yang nam ma mchis pa yang ba lagag man lda pa ma masangs/ ldan pam mtsham thams
115b1(1): bcom ldan 'das de ltar na/ chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni a'i tshul lo// chos thams cad ni tshul gcig pa ste/ A'i tshul lo// chos thams cad ni 'gro ba gcing du/ 
115b2(1): ste a'i 'gro ba'o// chos thams cad ni 'jug pa gcig pa ste a la 'jug pa'o// chos thams cad ni gdags pa gcig pa ste as gdags pa'o// chos thams cad ni
115b3(1): za skad gcig pa ste a'i smad do// chos thams cad ni brjod pa gcig pa ste as brjod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rtogs par bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i
115b4(1): tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma byung ba de dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi sa'o// chos gang ma lags pa de dag ni ma lags pa ma mchis pa'i
115b5(1): tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma grub pa de dag ni ma grub pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma 'gags pa de dag 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis
115b6(1): rtogs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa de dag ni 'dus ma gyis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi te// de ni chos thams cad kyi tshul lo// / 
115b7(1): bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag gi tha skad ji ltar rtogs par brgya'o// 'di lnga ste dper na/ rmi lam na bra ba sna tshogs 'byung ba de bzhin du chos thams cad bal par
116a1(1): / 5/ bgyi'o// de ci'i slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rmi lam gyi bya ba ni ma skyes pa ni ma byung ba/ dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ 'on kyang de dag la gdags par gsung // 
116a2(1): de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi byed pa yang 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ zag cha la tha skad kyang blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper
116a3(1): na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gdags pa ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyi gdags par b.la'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na smig rgyu la cha bdu gdags pa'i thasang
116a4(1): mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha spad bal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la snyed per na/ me yang gi dkyil 'khor la bung med kyi gzugs sam/ sde ba'i gsungs
116a5(1): sdem srang mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha skad ngalta bar bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa rnams dga' bar bgyi ba'i slang du/ zil ba gyi bya ba bsrang du bgyi'o// khrilam
116a6(1): kyi bya bde dag ni ma mchisas// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byis pa dga' bar bgyi ba'i slang du/ mig yor dang / sdig tu dang / zag cha'i bya ba dag kyang tha skang du gyi ste/ zag rgyal
116a7(1): bya ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i
116b1(1): ting nge 'dzin to// de skad ces gsol ba dang / 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod ngo // bde gshegs khyod kyis
116b2(1): tshul gcig mkhyen to 'on kyang gzhan du gsungs// thub pa 'jig rten mkhas pa'i sras rnams rnam par rol pa'ang de bzhin no// 'jig rten po med bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis yod mi
116b3(1): chud// bdag gi don de phyogs bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gro ba stong // sgyu ma gsog dang sdig rgyu chu ma mchis la chab kyi 'du shes can// byis pa de dag blo log de bzhin
116b4(1): 'khrul te bdag tu sbyor ba bgyid// de dag yang dag ma 'tshal mi mkhas gnas min dngos la rten kyang 'chang // de bzhin byis pa'i skye bo smig rgyu 'dra ba'i phung po yod ma 'tshal// 'khor
116b5(1): bar dga' bas zug rngus zug cing sdug bsngal de'i dbang po 'das// gang la mi mkhas nges par sdug bsngal myong ba de la dngos ma mchis// blo stor yid nor sdug bsngal rnams
116b6(1): la bde bar 'du shes nor ba la// zhon mongs 'jigs pa che dang dug gsum rnams kyang rjes su 'gro zhing 'brang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dug can nyon mongs mtshungs med
116b7(1): rjes su 'thang // blo stor de dag sdug bsngal gang gis sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sdug bsngal ba// de rnams de dag rjes 'brang byis pa mi mkhas gnod pa'i khur yang khyer// de dag rgyal
117a1(1): ba'i tshul sa thar par brgyad pa 'di thos na/ sras bu ngan pa blon na de dag bstan dag bde ba nyid kyis 'jigs/ bde gshegs khrod kyis a'i yi ge tshul chen
117a2(1): sgo gcig de ltar bstan/ de la yang dag blo chen sa las shing skye bzhin du yid bskyed cing / bdud rnams bye ba dpung dang bcas btul byang chub ni ba mngon 'chang rgya/ yan lag brgyad
117a3(1): nga'i grwa bcas skye bo nyon mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol/ bde bar gshegs pa cang mkhyen nges pa rnams ni tshul gyis dam pa des/ myur du nyon mongs dug bsal byang chub dpag yas
117a4(1): zhi ba thob gyur cing / grol nas drug med gyur bskye bo gzhan mthong nges pa'i mkhyen bskyes nas/ pha rol mur phrin drag med bde zhing gdug pa thams cad 'jom par mdzad/ bde gsheg
117a5(1): thams cad stong yang bdag tu rtogs rnams tshul dang tshul min rtog/ 'gro ba kun gyi nang nas tshul dang tshul min bslabs pa dag/ grol nas 'gro ba kun la chags med yid kyis
117a6(1): ngo bo nyid kyis chos/ de'i tshul mthong la mkhas pa de dag mthu chen mgon por 'gyur/ 'ching dang bcings pa med cing bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams chos nyid med/ de bzhin
117a7(1): nyid da' ma nor de bzhin nyid ni mi bdag con mi mongs/ nyon mongs mtshan med cing ni byed med la nyon mongs rnams kyang med/ gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag
117b1(1): thams cad mkhyen tu 'gyur/ grol zhing grol mdzad ni pa'i chos can ni mdzad do ma nar 'gyur mi mnga'/ bcom ldan sngar bcas 'jig rten dpyid kyi sreg rgya bzhin du 'khrul ba/ 
117b2(1): kun rtog bdag nyid zil gnon bdag dang gzhan med bskyos pa bud med rtog/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal de na sna tshogs kyis bskyed sems kyang na/ las dang 'bras bu med cing de myong
117b3(1): gang gyur de yang med/ bde gshegs de ltar sangs rgyas rnam kyi spyod yul tshul ni bdag cag 'tshal/ des na da ltar bde gshegs ni thugs dbang po ni zhing nges pa ste/ bde ba'i blo ma
117b4(1): dag bcang dri med chos kyis rab tu mchod par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'phags pa'i gtso la bstod pas bsod nams gang byung ba/ ji snyed dpal sdug rkang gnyis gtso bos rnam
117b5(1): smin yongs su mkhyen gyur pa'i/ bdag cag dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis 'gro ba 'di kun kun mkhyen nyid thob shog/ bsod nams 'di kun 'gro ba kun gyi don bsngo kun kyang rgyal bar shog/ 
117b6(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gsal gyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / tshul gyi rjes su 'gro ba'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang thugs su
117b7(1): chud la/ 'khor de dag gis kyang khyad par thi'i par 'gyur bamakhyen nas de'i tshe 'jam pa med de de nas mi dang ldan pa ni thal gyis
118a1(1): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol// 'jig rten mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun mkhyen thams cad zil gnon pa// bde gshegs thugs rje ldan rnams rgyu ma
118a2(1): mchis par band pa mdzad na// rgyal ba dpal sdug rkang gnyis mchog gis 'jig rten thugs bcos stsol du gsol// 'jig rten 'das khyod ci slad 'dzum mdzad de rgyu bdag cag rnams
118a3(1): la gsungs// gtso bo de thos 'gro ba mtha' dag yid ni rab tu dang 'gyur zhing // rnam par 'dren pa nges 'byung las dang 'bras bu gzhal yas bgyid par 'gyur// des ni lha mir bcwa
118a4(1): pa'i 'jig rten 'khor bar nyams zag sdug bsngal 'di// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad bstan srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di nas sgrol bar 'gyur// drang srong chen po'i gsung mchog yan
118a5(1): lag brgyad ldan bzang po 'di thos na// 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid 'tshal dge la brtson zhing dga' bar 'gyur// the tshom bral 'gyur rnam ngag yid kyis brtson 'grus drag po
118a6(1): spobs bskyed cing // bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgyid khyod dang mthun 'byung sras su 'gyur// 'khor rnams 'di dag brten pa gzhan ma mchis par 'dren pa khyod kyis zhal
118a7(1): dul// 'gro ba'i rtsa lag rtog pa yid gnyis bsal cing lung bstan bka' stsal gsol ba// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag khrod kyi nam ring gnas shing nyan par 'tshal// gsungs ra
118b1(1): legs brjod bdud rtsi'i char po ba gang dag sgom pa 'chal bar 'gyur// 'dzin pa chen po khyad kyis 'khor 'di ga cing sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal// ring du song ba'i ma lus 'ani
118b2(1): du khyod kyi zhal du la// bde gshegs lha rnams lung bstan bka' stsal bzhad pa'i don kyang bstan du gsol// skyob pa'i gsung mchog thos na 'jig rten don chen shin du thob par
118b3(1): 'gyur// thub pa de ring su zhig dge ba 'phel cing grags pa don du gnyer// su zhib 'dren pa'i yon tan gter rnyed 'gyur ba bdag cag de nyan 'tshal// rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams
118b4(1): khyod kyis gsungs pa de dag thos shing dgar gyur nas// tshul 'di ston cing ting 'dzin stobs ldan shes rab la yang sgom par 'gyur// de nas com ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
118b5(1): rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyis spros pa legs par dus ldan skyes pa shin tu legs// bde gshegs rnam par sprul bzhin de ltar khyod kyi zla
118b6(1): zos 'byung 'gyur zhing // spobs pa che 'byung de phyir gang dag khyod kyis dris gyur pa// de dag lung bstan ngas bshad kun kyang dbang po zhibs bzhan par bgyis// 'od gsal ba
118b7(1): yi lha rnams blo dge sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong ba ste// 'jig rten mgon med yid can 'di dag mthong nas byang chub yang dag zhugs// byang chub nges 'brung lam mchog yang dag rgyal ba
119a1(1): 9/ spyad spyad pa// byang chub 'gro 'dod gang tshe ston med lam stor rnams la ston par 'gyur// tshul gyi dam pa shin tu bsal sgra thun mong ma yin 'di thos nas// sangs rgyas yo
119a2(1): tan don gnyer blo sbyangs de dag byang chub zhi thob 'gyur// de dag stobs skyed tshul dang tshul min mkhas pa byang chub yid nges 'gyur// bu skyes ma zhig dga' bas byang chub mchog tu de dag
119a3(1): smon lam btab// 'od gsal lha rnams 'di dag byang chub 'dod la tshul gyi sgo bstan te// bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med par phra ba'i tshul 'di bstan byas nas// sems can skar
119a4(1): ma'i grangs pas ches mang ba dag byang chub dga' byas nas// de'i 'og tu 'jig rten mkhas pa rang byung skyon bral kun mkhyen 'gyur// de dag zhing mchog brjod du med pa zhing rnams breb
119a5(1): brgyar bgrangs par// yangs shing shin tu ngag la mtha' dag bkod pa rnams kyis brgyad pa ste// kun gyi zhing du ngan song rnams dang de bzhin mi khom yong mi 'byung // bde bar gshegs nas
119a6(1): thubs paces sems can thams cad rang 'byung mdzad par 'gyur// ning rnams de dag gangan 'ang can thos theg pa son par mi 'gyur te// sems can thams cad rang 'byung nying du ma
119a7(1): dregs 'thogs pa med par 'gyur// den ring 'thung sangs rgyas maud ston mdzad pa 'jig rgya mkhas rnams kyi// mu che'i chang ni 'askal babyeb brgya grangs pacwa bu grong 'gyur/ 
119b1(1): thal 'jig rten khrag khrig khams kyi nyan thos mya ngan bslas pa bas// gang yang skyes pa 'am bud med gcig cig byang chub yang dag dga' byas na// bsod nams debs sngams
119b2(1): grangs sam dper kyang bya bar mi nus so// de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga' bar gyis// na thul 'di la 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba ba rnyed pa min/ 
119b3(1): de ni u dum ba ra'i me tog 'dra zhes sangs rgyas mtha' yas blo mangs gsungs// de phyir bla na med pa'i zhi bde byang chub mi gang 'dod pa yis// shin tu blo phra bsten bzang mkhyen pa tshul mkha
119b4(1): de la bsten par bya// de bzhin gshegs kyi zhal nas don byed gsung dag de 'dra thos gyur nas// 'khor rnams thams cad yi rangs mchog tu dga' zhing yang dag dga' bar gyur// khrag
119b5(1): khrig lha rnams nam mkhar 'khod nas gos kyi g.yab mo 'dor bar byed// dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang phyug khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sgra yang phyung / zhi ba thugs ni skye bo 'on
119b6(1): mongs rgod pas rgod 'gyur zhi bar mdzad// bdud rtsi ston cing dug gsum zhi mdzad sems can dug ni skyug tu gsol// khyod kyi ye shes thos nas skye dgu drug mod 'gyur zhing dgra med 'gyur// 
119b7(1): sdug bsngal rnams kyis 'dren las tshul chos mi zad srid pa'i rgyud las 'grol// / 'od gsal ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// bam po brgyad pa'o// 
120a1(1): / de nas dge rgyas ris kyis lha khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis// lha ma yin rnams nas 'od gsal ba'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ 
120a2(1): tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te// rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bdag cag rdul phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba yang brjod cing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
120a3(1): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mtshos te/ ting nge 'dzin thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs
120a4(1): pa'i dngos po thams cad la bde ba'i tshor ba sha stag myong bar 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi myong la/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa yang mi myong ste/ sems can
120a5(1): dmyal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang / bde ba'i 'du shes che bar gnas pa dang / mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang / bde ba'i 'du shes che bar gnas pa dang / lag pa chang ngam/ 
120a6(1): rna ba 'am/ sna'am/ rna ba dang sna gtubs kyang bde ba'i 'du shes na bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / swa lcag gis gzhus sam/ sra lcag byed 'tshal 'am/ lcag gis gnas kyang bde ba'i 'dra
120a7(1): shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / btson rang gzug gam/ lcags sgrog dang / shing sgrog du bcug gam/ mtshon cha dam po la rgyas btab ngam/ byis pa'i spyi gtsug ltar bcings sam/ 
120b1(1): drugs kyi snod ltar gdugs sam/ bu ram shing brdungs pa ltar brdungs sam/ 'dam bu gzhom pa ltar bcom mAm/ 'bru mar gyi mar me ltar 'bar byas sam/ mar gyi mar me dang na
120b2(1): bskol blta 'bar bar bus kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar me'i nang du bor ram/ seng ge'i khar bskabs sam/ sdug gi khar bskabs sam/ skam ril bya ba ltar zil tam/ dri bo'i chang pa la dus
120b3(1): bcad dam/ zhes byung ba bsgrags pa ltar bsgrags sam/ kaR+sha pa Ni tsam du gtugs sam/ 'bras phye bcos pa ltar bcos sam/ glang po che rnams kyis bcom pa yang bde ba'i 'du shes ce sa
120b4(1): 'gyur ba dang / mig phyung ngam/ gsal shing gi rtse mo la bzhag gam/ gsad pa'i gnas su khrid de rnam pa thams cad du mgo gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par gyur te/ bde ba yang ma
120b5(1): lags mi bde ba yang ma lags pa'i 'du shes rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ yun ring po nas spyad pa spyod pa'i
120b6(1): che/ smon lam 'di ltar btab ste/ gang gis bdag la kha zas sbyin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/ gang gis bdag la rim gro byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bsti stang bus
120b7(1): pa dang / mchod pa byas pa de ga thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/ gang yang bdag la gshe ba dang / mi bde bar byed pa dang / dag pa dang / mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang / rnam pa
121a1(1): / thams cad du srog gcod pa'i bar du byed pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub kyi bde ba thob cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
121a2(1): 'chang rgya bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/ de yid la byed pa de dag dang ldan zhing / del bu'i las dang / de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song na
121a3(1): bde ba'i 'du shes la sten cing / spen la sgom ni mang du byed de/ de las de'i rnam par smin pas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob po// bdag gi che byang chub
121a4(1): sems dpas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdud kyis mi 'phrogs shing mi 'khrugs par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe 'di ltar tshe la dbang ba dang / 
121a5(1): las la dbang ba dang / rnam par rtog pa la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba ste/ dbang lnga thob par rig par bgyi'o// de 'tshal na tshe rjes ma thag tu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 
121a6(1): de la 'tshal na bskal pa grangs ma mchis par gnas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing byang chub sems
121a7(1): dpa'i bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dzin padang / ngan 'grathams cad rab tugs la ba dang / bgro badrug po kun tu byas pa dang / byang chub semam pa'i 'thal pa sa/ 
121b1(1): cad la baM slebs pa dang / thobs mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang / bdud kyi las las rnam par rgyal ba dang / chos thams cad khong du chung bar rig par bgyi ba'i slad du so/ bcom ldan 'a
121b2(1): gis byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la nges pa'i rtogs pa thob par 'gyur ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// de nas dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin brjod
121b3(1): nas/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod ngo // dge rgyas lha yis 'dren pa 'dren la bstod// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma ci bzhin khyod kyis thub
121b4(1): pa legs par mkhyen// yan lag sna tshogs smra bskan ri khrod 'byung ba mkhas pas rtogs pa ltar// de bzhin bde gshegs drang srong khyod kyis lA ming bcas pa'i 'jig rten gzing po/ 
121b5(1): 'di ni sems can srog dang shed bu gsol ba gang zag ma mchis te// mi mchog khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par bshig cing stong par bshig cing stong par rnam bzhag la// rkang gnyis dam pa
121b6(1): sems can gtso bo byams pa gzhal yas sgom pa'ang mdzad// rgyal ba sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyis rtogs par dka'// byams pa dge skom sems can dmigs pa yin
121b7(1): zhes 'dren pas bka' stsal la// sems can rnam par bshig cing 'gro ba thams cad sems can med par mkhyen// de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rnyog pa mi mnga' the tshom bral thugs ldan// des na
121b8(1): 'di na rang bzhin nges pa'i thub chos gnas pa gang yang ma mchis ste
122a1(1): / bde gshegs rnam brtags blo mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal// bde bar gshegs pa sdug bsngal phyogs bcur gnas pa kun tu mi dmigs kyang // lha'i ltar
122a2(1): gyur khyod kyis sems can rnams la snying rje bgyi ba gsungs// de ltar rgyal mchog bdag cag rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ci bzhin kun tu mtshal// nges na rkang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog mchod
122a3(1): 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang ni bsngal gyi sdug bsngal ma gzigs la// dges pa skyes nas rab tu dges pa'i thugs kyis mi dges rnam par bsal/ 
122a4(1): de ltar sangs rgyas tshul ni bsam gyis mi khyab tshul 'di ci bzhin 'tshal// des ni mi mchog khyod la mchod nas brnyes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi// skyon bral khyod kyis 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal
122a5(1): mya ngan 'das ma dmigs// 'on kyang 'khor bar sems can gzigs shing don mdzad stobs dang ldan pa skyed// sems can sdug bsngal 'gro dang thub dang mya ngan 'das dang gnas ma mchis/ 
122a6(1): sangs rgyas tshul 'di rtogs nas thub pa mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// 'dren pa chang med pa ni pa gzigs shing de yang gnyis su med par bstan// gang zhig der dul ma gzigs pa
122a7(1): yang chad med gnas pa de ma gzigs// thub pas bag med gang yang ma gzigs pag yod mi yang ma gzings te// sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'chal nas thub pa stan pa khyad la mchod par bgyi
122b1(1): thub pa sru ni rnam par spangs pas spu bcal mdzad nam brnyes kyang // de ltar 'dren pa ma gsungs ma lags bsrel ba yong mi mngan// bde bar gshegs pas lung la song ba'i slob pa
122b2(1): bsgom par bgyis shes gsungs// sangs rgyas tshul 'di rig nas bde bar gshegs pa skyob la mchod pa bgyis// 'dren pas tshor ba'i rang bzhin btsal ba mdzad na brnyes par ma
122b3(1): gyur la// tshor ba tshor bar bgyid pa'ang thub pas yongs su btsal na ma brnyes te// de ltar gang dran bsgom de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang yod ma gzigs// sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal na
122b4(1): ston pa la ni bdag cag mchod pa bgyis// thub pas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te matsal na ma brnyes la// gang gis nye bar bzhag pa de yang dran pa med par rab mkhyen kyang // / 
122b5(1): thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis sems 'dus dran pa bsgom par gyis zhes gsungs// bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs pa 'di dag la gnas ston la mchod bgyis// 'jig rten phan par gzhed
122b6(1): pas chos dang chos la gang spyod de ma gzigs// bsgom par gang gsungs dran pa de yang 'di na rang bzhin ma mchis la// thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis chos 'dus dran pa bsgom par gyis
122b7(1): shes gsungs// sangs rgyas tshul bzhi po 'di rab tu 'tshal nas skyo ba la mchod pa bgyis// gnas gcig mchis pa ma lags gnyis sam gsum mam bani lta ga la mchis/ 
123a1(1): / gang gi gnas su brjod pa'i dran pa de yang gang na yang ma mchis te// de bas gang gis bde ba 'am sdug bsngal yang dag gang na yang de ma mchis// smyon pa'i tshul 'di
123a2(1): 'tshal nas des na bdag cag khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// ston pa'i tshul mchog bzhi po 'di rnams dge slong gang rnams 'dzin bgyid na// 'di dag thar pa nyid kyis lam ste 'khor
123a3(1): ba lam ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar de ni tshul 'dir ma bcings ma grol byang chub 'dren pa min// bcom ldan 'das kyis btags pa ma bshigs des na khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ 
123a4(1): thar mdzad skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis lam bzhi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gang // 'di dag bsgoms na mi rnams dbang po dul zhing mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// yang dag 'phrul dang ni rkang
123a5(1): dang bsgom pa mi dmigs te// chad par mi 'gyur bya ba'ang ston cing byed pa po yang mi dmigs pa// thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan 'dir lha tshogs the tshom gang na'ang ma mchis te// / 
123a6(1): de dag de la nem nur ma mchis de bzhin som nyi ma mchis gyur// 'di mchod pa bzang po mchog ces mchod 'os sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// des na bde gshegs dpe med spyad
123a7(1): mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchong ba 'tshal/ thar par mdzad srad 'jig rten mkhas pas nges 'byung dbang po lnga yang gsungs// ga tu bag yang byas la mya ngan 'das 'gro'i lam 'di
123b1(1): shes bsan/ thub pa dbang pa dang ni bsgom pa pa dang ni thar pa'ang mi dmigs te// 'di ltar lhal bar tho thom ma mchis des khrod la mchong pa 'jal/ sangs tu ma rnams kyi na
123b2(1): 'das par 'gro ba'i drang lam stobs lnga po// de dag nyon mongs zad bgyid ces ston pa thub pas gsungs// de dag rang bzhin ma mchis nyon mongs ma mchis rgyal ba ma mchis te/ 
123b3(1): thub pa bdag cag la'ang the tshom ma mchis de skad khyod la mchod// byang chub yan lag bdun po dag dge ba lam gyi dam pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya 'das 'gro'i drang lam mchod
123b4(1): ces thub pa'i gsungs// 'ching ba ma mchis ma lags grol ba ma mchis bcings pa'ang ma mchis te// sems can dkon mchog 'di la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis khyod la mchod// 
123b5(1): rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis bzhi phrag gnyis lam sems can rnams la bstan// brtson 'grus ldan par 'phags lam sdig bsngal mtha' mar 'byin pa bsgoms shes gsungs/ 
123b6(1): mi mchog la ma dang de bzhin nyon mongs 'di gnyis g.yo ba ma mchis te// 'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis gyur pas mcho de 'os khyod la mchod// 'dod chags gnyen por zhig
123b7(1): bka' stsal zhe sdang gnyen par byams pas gsungs// gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong thub pa mchog gis sems can rnams la bsan// 'di dag thams cad gamo ma mchis dang
124a1(1): / cig ngam min thon mongs min// 'di la lnga tshogs the tshom ma mchis thub pa mchod skad rtag tu brtson// sdug bsngal ni bu brir ni ni gnas lngag mthong lam yang bams
124a2(1): gsungs// bcom ldan 'das gang gis 'gro ba nyon mongs bag chags bcas dri de dag zhi// thub pa zhi gnas lhag mthong de bzhin dri ma thams cad stong pa ste// 'di la lnga tshogs gang du
124a3(1): yang the tshom ma mchis skyon bral khyod la mchod/ stobs bcu sems can rnams la dge ba bcu'i las lam ston mdzad// gsod dang khrig dang ma yin phra ma brdzun dang zhe gcod kyil
124a4(1): tshig dang // gnod sems dang ni mi rigs 'dod dang de bzhin log par rtog pa rnams// mi dge'i las lam 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams la bstan// sems
124a5(1): can mi dmigs gsod pa ga la mchis te lhag ma de dang 'dra// gnyen po dge ba ma mchis de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste// bde gshegs thub pa zag pa ma mchis rnams kyang ngo bo zhing / 
124a6(1): stong / rnam 'dzin the tsho me sa ma nyi ma mchis de skad khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// sangs rgyas sras po ngan pacom can snang nig spyong pa 'di sten pa// mkhas pa kun tu ge bcing chu/ 
124a7(1): sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan pade gshegs ye shes des ni tshul 'di bde bar thob par bgyis// 'di la lnga tshogs the tshom ma mchis mchod pa 'tshal// de ltar / 
124b1(1): rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas cang mi zer bar 'khod ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpe rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang cang mi zer bar 'khor par yang
124b2(1): mkhyen// de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pas sgrub pa yang thugs su chung nas// de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 
124b3(1): skye bo 'di kun bcom ldan 'khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i zil gyis zil mnan nas// bde gshegs rgyal ba khyu mchog khyod kyis ni 'dzum pa mdzad 'od 'jig rten bstan// rgyu ma mchis par
124b4(1): chos kun mkhas pa rnams ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum rgyu don gnyer med rnams la 'jig rten mkhas pas bka' stsal gsol// ma lus 'di dag thams gzhan du mi sems
124b5(1): khyod 'dzum re zhing 'khod// dpal sdug khyod la bstod pa bgyid cing nyan par 'tshal ba'i yid kyis gnas// sangs rgyas gsung gi dbang phyug thos yid ni rab tu rangs gyur te// chos rnams
124b6(1): kun la nges pa'i blo dge ldan pa'i ston par skye bar 'gyur// bde gshegs mi mchog dge thugs can ni de ring su zhig blo gros bskyed// de ring gang gis 'chi meng zhib rtogs shing phyogs rnams snang
124b7(1): bar bgyis// su zhig 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal ba 'dren pa dpag tu med 'gyur ba// de dag bka' stsol drang srong 'khor 'di lags par gsungs pas tshim par mdzod// rgyal ba khyu mchog
125a1(1): // dge sbyong dam pa de dang su btsun la dad pa skyes// bdud kyis mi 'phrogs blo ldan gang zhig chos la yang dag yongs su gnas// sangs rgyas sras po tshul mkhas gang zhig
125a2(1): de ring nges thob par gyur/ rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag bka' stsol 'gro 'di the tshom ma mchis mdzod// bde gshegs deng su 'gro la dang bskyed skye dgu rnams la byams gyur cing // byang
125a3(1): chub mthar phyir blo gros bstan zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas// gang la 'dzum pa deng bstan bde gshegs bstan pa 'dzin pa de gang lags// bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan
125a4(1): mnga' de dag bka' stsal bdag gi the tshom khum// 'dren pa khyod gsung yan lag brgyad ldan legs par dka' stsol thes gyur na// bde gshegs gsung gis thog mar bdag cag 'dod
125a5(1): zhing 'gro ba gzhan yang 'dren// de ltar gyur na bde gshegs bstan rab 'di ni sras la gnas par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dag yid ni myur du bde gshegs rnams la gnas par
125a6(1): 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// nga'i 'jig rten don byed 'dzub mdzad na thul khyod kyis mthong gyur cing // skyes
125a7(1): budam pa khyod kyis dus su dris te 'gro ba'i don bum pa// khyod kyi bsod nams 'phel ba brjod du med de bar mi 'gyur// de ni khyod la bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba 'di dag dga' sa
125b1(1): na// das rgyas gardzogs de dag ngamatshas nyid lani the tshom med// kun kyang yi rangs rab ni yid kyis tshogs bcad dgas gling la bsngags/ spyan gyi sangs rgyas bre sa pas
125b2(1): khrig stong grangs mdzod 'os mchod byas te// the tshom med pa'i yid kyis tshu la dris kun tu som ci med par gyur// de ltar sngon gyi rgya nges 'dir yang tshigs su bcang bas nga la bstod/ 
125b3(1): bskal ba bzang po'i rgyal ba bstod 'os kun la'ang 'di dag bstod par 'gyur// 'od dag bskal pa ut+pal la rgyal ba dgra rgyal mthu chen 'gyur// 'di dag sems can khrag khri
125b4(1): bsam yas yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar byed// sangs rgyas drang srong chen po de dag yid 'ong mtshan du gang 'gyur ba// de yang bstan gyis dad pa'i yid kyis sems kyi za ba spangs te
125b5(1): non// rgyal ba de kun chos kyi tog ces bya ba'i 'dren pa gzhal yas 'gyur// 'di dag re res kyang ni khrag khrig bsam yas mya ngan zlog par 'gyur// de'i tshe na bde gshegs kun
125b6(1): gyi ring bsrel shin tu rgyas 'gyur te// de che zhing kun tu rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog rgyas par 'gyur// thub pa grags chen de dag yongs su mya ngan par gyur pa na// thub pa skyob pa de
125b7(1): ngag kun gyi ring bsrel rgyas pas don chen 'gyur// sems can khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyis de rnying bsrel mchod byas te// ring bsrel de dag mchod nas mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba
126a1(1): / 'chi med thob// thub pa rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag grags pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur te// slob pa khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyang de tshe rgyal ba'i drung du 'du// ji ltar bye
126a2(1): ba brgya grangs nga la legs par spyad pa byas nas su// byams pa blta phyir rgya chen yid kyis byams pa'i 'khor du 'dod 'gyur ba// de ltar rgyal ldan thos slob tshogs de dag rgyal nas
126a3(1): rgyal 'khor du// rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag kun gyi ring bsrel mchod pa bya phyir 'dong // bde gshegs gsung sman 'gro ba thams cad ngo mtshar gyur pa de thos shing // dge rgyas ris kyi
126a4(1): lha'i bdag nyid chen po de tshe thos gyur nas// 'khor rnams thams cad rab tu dga' ste phal cher byang chub kyang bskyed// bdag nyid chen po shes nas thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos rab tu
126a5(1): gtugs// dge rgyas ris kyi lha lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas de tshe'i bras bu che ba'i ris kyi lnga bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas/ 
126a6(1): dge rgyas kyi ris lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas// tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ 
126a7(1): tshul gcig la nus pa dang / mas re re las kyang chos kyi sa mtha' yas pa 'byung bar yang dag par mthong zhing / tshul la 'jug pa thams cad las kyang mtha' yas pa'i srangs pa
126b1(1): dang / mi mtshang ba'i skabs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / bral ba'i skabs pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / nye ba'i spobs pa dang / za ba'i spobs pa dang / 
126b2(1): pa'i skabs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dag kyang 'byung bar shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes te/ chos
126b3(1): nyid brjod cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ de la brtson par bgyis na/ byang
126b4(1): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa thob cing / mi mchod pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / dmigs pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la rmongs pa ma
126b5(1): mchis par 'gyur ro// de la dmigs pa gang yang gzugs lags par 'tshal ba'i tshul gyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro// de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i
126b6(1): gzungs thob par 'gyur/ khams la 'jug pa dbang po la 'jug pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / sems can la 'jug pa dang / 
126b7(1): sems can ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dngos la 'jug pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa la 'jug
127a1(1): / pa dang / bdag la 'jug pa dang / stong pa la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / smon la 'jug pa dang / 
127a2(1): sngon ma mchis pa 'jug pa dang / gnas ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas la 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzung
127a3(1): thob par 'gyur te/ thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de'i phung po la 'jug kyang 'di lta ste/ phung po zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ni yongs su
127a4(1): ma grub pa'o zhes gzungs rab tu thob bo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs ni gang yang yongs su grub pa ma mchis te/ sa ni sar yongs su ma grub/ de bzhin du chu dang me dang rlung du
127a5(1): yongs su ma grub po// de ci'i slad zhe na/ sa ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// chu dang me dang rlung ni rang bzhin ma mchi
127a6(1): pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa zhes gdags par mi bgyi/ ma 'ongs pa zhes gangag
127a7(1): par mi bgyi/ da lar byung ba zhes gdags par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis
127b1(1): bag/ gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis te/ gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni gnags sna ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'das pa dang ma
127b2(1): pa dang da ltar byung ba'i gzungs gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig du bsdus nas/ gzugs kyi phung po'o zhes bka' stsal te/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dmigs
127b3(1): su ma mchis ni/ 'das par lta ga la 'gyur/ ma 'ongs par yang ga la gyur/ da ltar byung bar yang ga la 'gyur te/ de bas na gzugs kyi phung po ni gdags su ma mchis pa'o// 
127b4(1): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du phung po rnams ni dmigs su ma mchis so// phung po dmigs su ma mchis
127b5(1): pas gzungs dmigs su ma mchis so// de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs la 'jug par 'gyur ro// gzungs de yang ming tsam dang / tha skad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kur rdzo
127b6(1): tsam dang / brjod pa tsam dang / gdags pa tsam dang / ma gtogs par gzungs la 'jug par mi dmigs te/ 'di la phung po yang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyang mi dmigs/ 'jug
127b7(1): pa yang mi dmigs/ gzungs kyang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang 'di phung po zhes bgyi ba de ni ma bgyis pa'i chos gang ma bgyis pa de la srung ba yang ga la mchi
128a1(1): / te/ phung po ni spungs pa'i slad du phung po zhes bgyi'o// dper na khyim dang khang bzangs dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung khol ma dang / ba gaM
128a2(1): dang / dra ba dang / stegs bu dang / kha khyer dang / skar khung dang / blta ba dang rab dang / shing tegs dang / 'obs dang / chos mang po spogs pa la grong khyer zhes bgyi ba bzhin du/ phung
128a3(1): po zhes bgyi ba bzhin du phung po zhes bgyi ba de yang de bzhin te/ gzugs de yang ngo bo nyid kyis mi dmigs na/ de la spang blta ga la mchis pas na/ gzugs kyang ma mchis gzugs kyi
128a4(1): phung po yang ma mchis so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis dmigs su ma mchis na/ de la srung ba lta ga la mchis te/ slu
128a5(1): pam mchis pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa yang ma mchis rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang ma mchis so// de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur// gzungs thob pas spangs
128a6(1): pa thob par 'gyur ro// de la skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur ba ni/ mig gi skye mched ces bgyi ba ni/ mig go ci'i skye mched ces bgyis na sdug bsngal gyi skye mched do// 
128a7(1): del mig gang zhen 'byung bachen po pani dang bsre pa'i khams dang / tshul khams dang / mo'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang ba'o// da la sa'i khams dang b.rang bcin ma mchim
128b1(1): chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang ba dang / me'i khams dang ba dang / rlung gi khams dang ba ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos ga
128b2(1): gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// de ltar yongasu ma grub pa'i mig gi skye mched de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhi
128b3(1): gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi skye mched ni dngos po ma mchis slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis
128b4(1): te/ gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni gdags su ma mchis pa'o// de ltar na mig kyang ma skyes ma 'gags/ skye mched dang sdug bsngal yang ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o// gang ma skyes ma 'gan
128b5(1): ba de ni ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma togs par de ni gdags su ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos gang lo la mig ce
128b6(1): 'am/ skye mched ce 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes gdags par bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang dmigs su ma mchis te/ ming yang ming du brjod du ma mchis so// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus/ 
128b7(1): dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thob/ gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa thob bo// 
129a1(1): / de la khams la 'jug pas gzungs thob pa ni/ mig ni mig gis ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i srang du zhe na/ mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ khams ni khams kyi rang
129a2(1): bzhin dang bral ba'i slad du ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// gang yongs su ma grub
129a3(1): pa de la ni skye ba ma mchis so// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gags pa ma mchis so// gang lam skyes ma 'gags pa de ni ming tsam dang / tha skad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun
129a4(1): rdo ba tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma togs par 'das pa zhes gdegs par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// ming de yang ming gi
129a5(1): ma mchis/ brjod pa'i bar de yang brjod pas ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos ngo ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub
129a6(1): pa ste/ yongs su ma grub pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa/ de la 'ga' pa ma mchis so// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das shes gdags par
129a7(1): dgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / daltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyib ma lags so// gang dus gsum du gdags par bgyi ba ma lags pa don mong ma mchis pa/ mtshan nings
129b1(1): mchis pa thasrad ma mchis pa brda ma mchis pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ 'dris pa ma mchis pa/ brjod pa ma mchis pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa/ ma bstan pa/ 
129b2(1): rab tu bstan pa/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ dkar po ma lags pa/ nag po ma lags pa/ gnas ma lags pa/ rten ma
129b3(1): lags pa/ thob pa ma lags pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rtogs pa ma lags pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags/ so so'i skye bo'i sa ma lag/ 
129b4(1): nyan thos kyi sa ma lags/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lags/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa ma las/ sangs rgyas kyis ma lags pa ste/ sa yang ma lags sa ma lags pa yang ma
129b5(1): lags so// de ni de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid dang / zhi ba dang mtshan nyid ma mchis pa ste/ tha snyad tsam du btags pa'o// des
129b6(1): tha snyad du de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ste/ don dam par ni ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de mi dmigs so// de bzhin gzugs
129b7(1): kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du rgya cher khams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o// 
130a1(1): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni phung por btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dod / khams dang skye mched dang / dbang po dang bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel
130a2(1): bar 'byung bar btags kyang chos kyi dbyings zhing mi 'dor te// chos kyi dbyings de mi gang gis btags kyang de dang des chos kyi dbyings zhing mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das
130a3(1): 'di lta ste dper na/ sa'i khams ni ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyis kyang nges sa'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang
130a4(1): dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / 
130a5(1): nam mkha'i khams ni ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chu dang me dang rlung dang / nam mkha'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi
130a6(1): dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang nges chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ de ltar na khams la 'jug pas bzungs thob// gzungs la 'jug pas spobs
130a7(1): pa 'thob bo// bcom ldan 'das de la dbong po la 'jug pa/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ni dbang po ci shu gnyis te/ 'di la ste mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / 
130b1(1): sna'i dbang ba dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / po'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / bde ba'i dbang po dang / 
130b2(1): sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson
130b3(1): 'grus kyis dbang po dang dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang
130b4(1): po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste/ de la mig gis ma mchis/ dbang po ni dbang po ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ 
130b5(1): chos gang la rang bzhin mi ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// gang yongs su ma grub pa de ni mi skye ba/ gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gag pa/ gang ma skyes
130b6(1): ma 'gag pa de ni 'das pa zhes bgyi bar gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi bo ma lags so// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs
130b7(1): pa de ni mig ma lags/ dbang po ma lags so// gang mig la ma lags shing dbang po ma lags pa doni tha snyad ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ 'di lta ste dper na/ chang pa stong pa ni
131a1(1): / brdzun pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa/ ma mchis pa ste 'di ltar ming du gdags par bgyi/ don dam par ni stong pa yang mi dmigs chang pa yang mi dmigs / 
131a2(1): de bzhin du mig dang dbang po yang chang ba stong pa ltar brdzun zhing ma mchis la/ yang dag pa ma lags pa ste/ gso ba gsog log pa/ slu ba'i chos can/ byis pa drang ba glen parmod
131a3(1): par bgyid pa ste/ 'di ltar ming du gdags par bas kyi/ don dam par ni mig kyang mi dmigs/ dbang po yang mi dmigs na// de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i
131a4(1): ye shes brnyes nas/ ci tsam du phyin ci log la gnas pa'i sems can rnams bzungs pa'i slad du dbang po zhes bshags kyi don dam par ni mi lags so// dbang po ni rang bzhin dang
131a5(1): bral zhing / dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ chos gang gis stong pa de la/ des tha skad du bgyi ba ni brdzun pa/ ma mchis pa/ sob gsog/ lob pa slu ba'i chos na/ byis pa 'dring ba/ 
131a6(1): glen pa/ rmongs par bgyid pa/ rang bzhin dang bral ba zhis pa ste/ de ni mi skye mi 'gag go// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes bgyi bar gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma'o
131a7(1): pa dang da par byung ba zhes gangags par bgyib ma lags sa// byang dus pasum du ma mchis pa don ming ma mchis pa/ bdun pa ma mchis pa/ bcu pa mtshan padam mchis pasangs
131b1(1): su ma mchis pa/ gdags pa ma lags pa/ ma shes pa shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par shes pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ rnam par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa
131b2(1): ma thos pa thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par ma rig pa/ rnam par rig par bgyi ba lags pa/ ma togs pa rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thob pa thob par bgyi bam
131b3(1): lags pa/ ma mthong ba mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rnyed pa rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa'o// de ci'i srang du zhe na/ ma mchis shing ma mchis pa ma lags pa'i slang du'o// 
131b4(1): 'di lta ste dper na mi zhig rmi lam na dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyad pa dag nyal nyal ba las sad de rjes su dran la/ de dran yang rnyed par mi 'gyur/ 
131b5(1): par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rmi lam na yang mi des dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / ces pa dang / dga' mgur spyad pa de dag ma thob ma rnyed na/ nyal ba las sad pa'i tshe
131b6(1): lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ thob pa dang rnyed par bgyi ba de'i gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dbang po rnams ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ ji ltar rmi lam na dgod pa dang / 
131b7(1): dga' ba dang / ces pa dang / dga' mgur spyad pa de dag dmigs su mchis pa/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid kyi dmigs su ma mchis pa ste/ de dag ni 'das pa zhes
132a1(1): / gdags par 'gyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba nas gdags par bsgri ba mra lags so// gang dus gsum du dmigs su ma mchis bded/ 
132a2(1): ni brjod du ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ dbang po thams cad kyang de bzhin du rig par bgyi'o// de ltar na chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas chos thams cad la 'jug par bgyi/ chos
132a3(1): thams cad la 'jug pas kyang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o// de la ji ltar na bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni bden pa
132a4(1): ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa gang zag med
132a5(1): pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes bka' stsal te/ de la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis som ci ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de la sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 
132a6(1): sdug bsngal ma mchis pas rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la sems can ma mchis pa de la sdug bsngal yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ma mchis pa'i
132a7(1): slad du/ kun 'byung ba yang ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de tsa'i slad du zhe na/ gang la 'bras bu ma mchis pa de ni rgyu ma lags pa'i srang du'o// bcom ldan 'das kun 'byung ba ma mchis
132b1(1): ba'i slad du'o// 'gog pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa la spang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'gog pa ma
132b2(1): mchis pa'i skad du lam ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang spong bar mi bgyid pa de ni lam ma lags ste/ lam gyi 'bras bu ni 'gog pa ma lags la/ gang spang
132b3(1): ba'i 'gog pa'i nyon mongs pa de ni mi dmigs ste/ 'gog pa dmigs su ma mchis na/ lam du 'thad pa ma lags te/ 'bras bu ma mchis pa'i lam yang ma mchis pas/ de ltar
132b4(1): na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi pa de dag ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa ste/ gang brtags shing rnam par bsgrubs pa de ni ma mchis pa'o// gang ma mchis pa de la ni 'das
132b5(1): pa zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so// ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni ma skyes ma 'gags pa/ mtshan
132b6(1): nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma mchis pa/ ma btags pa/ gdags par mi bgyi ba/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rab tu bstan par bgyi ba ma
132b7(1): lags/ ma brjod pa/ brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon par ma brjod pas/ mngon par brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags
133a1(1): / pa gshes pa/ shes par brgyab pa lags pa/ yong du mdzud pa/ yang du rlung bar bsgri ba ma lags pa/ marnakhas pa// rnams par bgyibam la
133a2(1): ba/ marnyed pa rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mthob ba/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma zas pa thos par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyib ma lags pa/ 
133a3(1): ma sgrub pa/ bsgrub par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon tu ma bgyis pa/ mngon tu bgyi ba ma lags pa/ dkar po ma lags pa/ nag po ma lags pa/ snang ba ma lags pa
133a4(1): mun pa ma lags pa/ 'gro ba ma lags pa/ ma'ong ba ma lags pa/ gsal ba ma lags pa/ zab pam lags pa/ 'khrug pa ma lags pa/ dang ba ma lags pa/ 'jigs
133a5(1): pa ma lags pa/ bde ba ma lags pa/ 'ching ba ma lags pa/ 'gro ba ma lags pa/ rjes su chags pa ma lags pa/ khong khro ba ma lags pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma
133a6(1): lags pa/ rnam par byang ba ma lags pa/ ye shes ma lags pa/ rnam par shes pa ma lags pa/ lam ma lags pa/ lam gol ba ma lags pa/ 'jig pa ma lags pa/ 
133a7(1): rnam par 'artog pa ma lags pa/ gzung ba ma lags pa/ mi bzung bam lags pa/ rar ba ma lags pa/ rab tu nga sa ma lags pa/ dmigs pa ma lags pa/ dmigs
133b1(1): su ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ sems can ma lags pa/ sems can me mchis pa ma lags pa/ srog ma lags pa/ srog ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gang zag ma lags
133b2(1): pa/ gang zag ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ bdag ma lags pa/ bdag ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ dngos po ma lags pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ 
133b3(1): stong pa ma lags pa/ mi stong pa ma lags pa/ mtshan ma ma lags pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ smon pa ma lags pa/ smon pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa
133b4(1): gnas ma lags pa/ gnas ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ 'dus byas ma lags pa/ 'dus ma byas ma lags pa/ chad pa ma lags pa/ rtag pa ma lags pa/ log pa
133b5(1): ma lags pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa/ bden pa ma lags pa/ brdzun pa ma lagaso pa/ mngon par zhen pa ma lags pa/ mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa// 
133b6(1): rten pa ma lags pa/ rten ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ bzhi ma lags pa/ gzhi ma lkugs pa/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lag/ 
133b7(1): pa/ spang ba ma lags pa/ bsgom pa ma lags pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnyed pa ma lags pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ 'khor ba ma lags pa/ mya ngan la
134a1(1): da / 'das pa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas ma lags pa/ 'chang rgya bar bgyi ma lags pa/ so sa'i skye ba'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ 'phags pa'i spyod yul ma la
134a2(1): pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ 
134a3(1): spyod yul yang ma legs spyod yul ma lags pa/ bgyis pa ma legs pa/ ma bgyis pa ma lags pa/ dag pa ma lags pa/ dag par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste/ de ltar
134a4(1): bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug ce na/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnams par shes pa nas de ltar sdug bsngal gyi bung
134a5(1): po chen po 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de la ma rig pa ni rig pas mchis
134a6(1): so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar ma rig pa ni rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po mam
134a7(1): mngo ni yongs su ma grul pa'o// gang yangs su ma grub pa ni mi sla ba'o// gang mi skye ba den ma 'gas pa'o// gang ma skul ma 'gag pa den 'das pa zhes gdags pa / 
134b1(1): ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan pa
134b2(1): ma mchis pa/ gdags su ma mchis pa ste/ gzhan du na ming tsam dang / brda tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / kun rdzob dang / brjod pa dang / gdags pa tsam du sems can rnam
134b3(1): gzung ba'i don tu bgyi ba ma gtogs par ma rig pa de ni don dam par dmigs su ma mchis so// chos gang don dam par dmigs su ma mchis pa de ni gdags su ma mchis pa/ 
134b4(1): tha snyad bgyir ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang ming tsam zhes bgyi ba nas/ gdags pa tsam gyi bar de dag kyang / yang dag pa ma lags pa/ 
134b5(1): brdzun pa log pa/ brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa/ yongs su brtags pa/ rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par dpyad pa/ ma zhi ba rab tu spros pa'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du
134b6(1): byed rnams zhes bgyi ba yang / chos gang ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis pa de 'du byed skyed par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ de bas na ma rig pa ni ma mchis pa/ de ltar ma rig pa ma mchis pas
134b7(1): 'du byed rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rga bar mi gyur/ na bar mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i sladu zhen/ 
135a1(1): @/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de la rga pa ga las mchi ste/ gang la rga ba ma mchis pa de nin par mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ snre
135a2(1): mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste ming tsam du byas kyi don dam par ma lags so// ma rig pa
135a3(1): gang lags pa de nyid byang chub bo// de bzhin du srid pa'i yan lag thams cad kyang shes par bgyi ste/ de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pas/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jus
135a4(1): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni skyes pa ste/ chos thams cad kyang ma skyes pa'o// de bas na chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma 'gag pa ste/ chos thas
135a5(1): kyang ma 'gag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshan zhing ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ dmigs su ma mchis pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa/ rnam
135a6(1): maM par byang ba ma mchis pa/ rjes su chags pa mi mi chis pa/ khong khrob ma mchis pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin cing dang yang dag pa'i mtha' sa/ chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mthar
135a7(1): de'i slad du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos gang dang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gis chos thams cad mchis sde/ de'i srang du chos
135b1(1): thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub mngon par
135b2(1): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes mchin/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slang du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/ byang chub kyang gnyis/ 
135b3(1): su ma mchis pa lags pas/ gnyis su ma mchis pa ni gnyis su ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin
135b4(1): gshegs pas bla na med pa'i chos 'khor lo bskor to// zhes mchis na/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam thams cad la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
135b5(1): ni bzog pa 'am skor bar mdzad pa mdzad ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas so zhes
135b6(1): mchin/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sems can ma mchis pa ste/ de la yongs su mya ngan
135b7(1): las 'das pa gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can chad med pa'i don mdzad do zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad
136a1(1): lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos gang la yang phan pa 'am/ gnod pa'i rnam pa'i nye bar
136a2(1): gnas pa ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas tshe'i 'du byed bo zhes mchin/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// 
136a3(1): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni ci yang 'dor ba 'am len pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa ni phung po'i ldag
136a4(1): ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes mchin/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'dra
136a5(1): chos kyi dbyings ni 'khor ba 'amamya ngan las 'das pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di lta bu'i chos la nges par gyur na/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par
136a6(1): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni 'gyur ba mchis kyang gda'i/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzob
136a7(1): ma'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang bar mi 'gyur mi gda'o// kham pa dgu pa'o// de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lba bye ba phrag brgyad chus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chom na
136b1(1): la nges par 'gro ba brjod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ thal mo sbyar te phyogs
136b2(1): gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs mthu chen 'dren pa tshul dang
136b3(1): tshu la min mkhyed la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba kun la thugs brtse thub pa yang dag ci bzhin ston mdzad pa// 'dren pa tshul mkhas khyod kyi tshul ni yang dag nyid du yang dag bstar// mtha'
136b4(1): yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgo bos phyag 'tshal// khyod kyis byang chub nges par 'byung ba'i drang lam gcig pu bgrod pa bstan// khyod kyis byang chub
136b5(1): dam pa gzhal yas zhi ba shi ba mi g.yo brnyes/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam thog 'grol mdzad pa// mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par
136b6(1): 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal// phung po rnams ni ngo bo nyid stong shin tu phung po rnams dang bral// byis pa rmongs byed rnams ni rab tu bral bar khyod kyis yongs su rtags// shes pa
136b7(1): mi ldan skye bo bal chen 'dir bcings rlod la spre'u thogs bzhin// 'gro ba mkhas pa rnams ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa med par 'dong // khams rnams khams kyis rnam pa kun tu
137a1(1): / snang par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs// dper na dag narnam pa kun tu shin tu bral ba'ang// des ni ma mkhas skye bo yang dag ci bzhin mi zhes mang pas bci/ 
137a2(1): 'gro ba mkhas pa yang dag rtogs pa rnams ni khams gsum chags ma mchis// skye mched ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong zhes thams cad mkhyen pas snyan// yang dag ma lags brdzun
137a3(1): zhing byis bskyung ba chang bstong pa 'dra// mi mkhas skye bo chos la gcig tu ma nges mang po de la chags// dper na 'dzin pa rgya mtsho chen por 'khyams pa bzhin du 'khor bar ltung // 'dzin
137a4(1): pa dbang po 'od dag dbang po nyid du stong pa ste// thub pa me long nang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la bur shin tu stong // mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ma 'tshal mang po dag ni de la chags/ 
137a5(1): bya dang mtsho'i nadang srog chags dag ni rgyal thogs pa bzhin// sems can sems can nyid stong sems can bral zhing ngo bo nyid kyis stong // thub pa sems can ri mo mkhan gyis gzug
137a6(1): bris bris bzhin du ma mchis na/ mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ci bzhin ma 'tshal mang po de la chags// mkhas pa yang dag rtogs rnams sponga'i sbubs nas pa'i bya bzhin grol// rten 'byung
137a7(1): chos rnams de dag skad cig pa ste stong zhing dmigs ma mchis// rmi lam dga' ba bzhin tu gzung du ma mchis byis rmongs bgyid pa// mi na sa rtogs pa'i srad du ngas kyang mi mkhas hU~M
137b1(1): bzang ba bcings/ mkhas pa yang dag bturkogs rnams bze ba nas thar pa'i bu bzhi zol/ thub pas chos nyid bsam yas ci bzhin chos rnams thams cad bsam mi khrug/ thub pa
137b2(1): zhib bya ngan 'das pa ji bzhin chos kun mtshan nyid bral// thub pa khams gsum mi chags bzhin du chos kun gnas pa ma mchis te// de srad tshul gcig 'di 'tshal gyur na 'gro kun bde bar
137b3(1): gshegs par 'gyur// thub pa bdag dang gzhan du mi mkhyen lta bur chos kun g.yo ba med// thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ji bzhin chos kun bsam mi khyab/ thub pa byi ba'i spyod
137b4(1): yul lags ji bzhin chos kun brtags pa lags// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ni rab gsal de bzhin shes par gyis// mi mkhas yang dag rgyal bas byang chub gzhal yas brtse
137b5(1): shes smras pa dang // gang dag rgyal bas 'khor lo dam pa gzhal yas mchog bskor smra ba dang // gang dag bde gshegs skye ba pas srog chags khrag khrig mya ngan bzlas smra ba// de dag thams
137b6(1): cang yang dag ma 'tshal la ba thibs por yongs srung bris/ gang dag bde bar gshegs pas che'i 'du byed patang bzung smra ba dang / gang dag stobs bcu 'gro ba'i don mdzad yongs su mya
137b7(1): 'das sla ba// de dag thams cad lta bar song la yid chags bdud kyis lag tu mchis// chos kyis de bzhin nyid 'di ma 'chal 'dren pas mkhyen bzhin 'chal bar bgyi// gang dag tshul dang
139a1(1): cad mkhyen par 'gyur// 'gro ba rab tu grol mdzad cing bzhin yang dag ston pa mdzad par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su
139a2(1): bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// lha tshogs rnams kyi ched du nga yis 'dzum pa 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa// rta thul khyod kyis dus dang chong shes nga la dris pa shin tu lags// gang phyir nga yis
139a3(1): 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di'i rgyu'i tshul dang rgyu// de khyod bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba che gcig yid kyis zhon// thams cad mkhyen pa rnams ni rgyu'i 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gzigs shing / 
139a4(1): rgyu las gzigs nas rkang gnyis dam pa dpal sdug rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad// kha cig blo zhan bdag cag nyan thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang / kha cig kha rog 'dug la dga' zhing
139a5(1): rang rgyal byang chub ngom zhugs dang // kha cig bdag 'jig rten 'dren pa mthu bo cher ni 'gyur byas te// skye bo sdug bsngal lhung ba grol zhes nus pa'i bsam mtha' mkhyen gyur nas// 'dzum pa
139a6(1): chung mdza dgang 'byung can thos don du mdzad par shes par bya// 'jam pa 'bring mdzad gang 'byung rang rdul don du mdzad par rig par bya// 'dzum mchogangs gang mdzad pa 'di ni 'dren pa'i
139a7(1): don du shes par bya// rab 'bring tha ma 'di gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur gsungs te// kha cig thar pa don gnyer lam gsum zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di mkhyen nas// des na 'jig
139b1(1): rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren pa dam 'dzum pa mdzad// rta thul de la nyan thos don du 'dzum mngang nabs 'og nub par 'gyur// rang rgyal don du 'dzum mdzad sku'i dbus su nub par
139b2(1): 'gyur// 'dren pa skabs bcu dzin tu 'jam pa mdzad pa gtsug tu nub par 'gyur/ de lar khyod kyis 'jam pa brgya ni rnam gsum shes par bgyi// bral ba mchog rnams don du dang
139b3(1): 'dzum de kun nga'i gtsug tu nug/ sdig pa gnom pa tshul dung slar 'dzub pas ngas bstan shes par gyis// 'dzin pa rnams kyi 'dzum pa gang yin de rgyurnams gsum ngam bshang kyis/ 
139b4(1): kun kyang rtse gcig yid byos de ning las legs par mnyan par gyis// dang po'i don tu 'dren pa 'dzum pa nges mdzad myur du thob mar nub// 'bring gi don ni dus chod cung zad bsdad cing phyi
139b5(1): nas nub par 'gyur// blo mchog ldan phyir 'dzum pa rgyal ba mdzad shin tu ring du gnas/ rtag thul nyan thos don du gnas 'jam de theg pa'i dbang gis mdzad// gzhan yang 'dzum rgyu rnam
139b6(1): gsum gshad kyis rta thul khyod kyis mnyan par gyis// gang dag rgyal ba drang po stobs bcu po la skor ba byed pa ni// de dag nga la skyen par bskor nas myur du shin tu mkhas par 'gyur/ 'bring ngon

140a1(1): #// mthong 'gyur na// de ni rkang gnyis dam pa thub pa'i sku kun khyab par gnas par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzum bsan 'di ni zhing gi dbang du shes par bya/

144b7(1): rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mig mi 'dzums kyis gsol pa// byis pa rnams kyi bla rmongs pa/ ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa// bar na'ang gnas pa ma lags pa// de dag rang bzhin
145a1(1): / khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pas gsol pa// gang zag sems can ma mchis pa/ ma mchis tha spad ma mchis pa// bstan pa slad du brjod pa

145a3(1): par// rnam par 'dzin pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu smon pa med la gnas pas gsol pa// ji ltar mtshan ma stong gyur cing // smon pa dmigs su ma mchis dang // sul smon lamam
145a4(1): gyur pa// de yang de'i rdul du mkhyen// lha'i bu ting nge 'dzin la gnol bas gsol pa/ rnam mtharas la bstan bgyis zhing // gang zhig grol 'gyur ram mchis// de bzhin gan nas rnamam

145a7(1): mapa ni mas pa sadang // ga'i bung me bdan yang sngags la ba// thab kya gas nga pa chim te// dzam kyi 'khor la rab tu brnang / na pas mdza pams
145b1(1): na thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan/ lha'i bu tho phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad dngos nyid kyis// ma skye 'gags pa ma lags te// de dag bde gzhegs
145b2(1): khyod kyis mkhyen// gnan yang de bzhin gshegs par mdzad// lha'i bu seng geng ros gsol pa// khyod kyis stong pa zhing bstan te// seng ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad pas// mu stegs
145b3(1): can kun rab 'jigs pa// seng ge ri dgas phra mo bzhin// lha'i bu bag yod las kyis gsol pa// bag yod sngon du btang mdzad de// khyod kyis spyod pa spyad bgyis pas// sangs rgyas
145b4(1): chos la 'dren pa khyod// bag yod pas ni nges par byung // lha'i bu bag yod rab gnas kyis gsol pa// bag yod pa la rab gnas te// khyod kyi nyid kyi chos kyang srel// stobs bcu
145b5(1): gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos// bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu spel// lha'i bu bag yod skyes kyis gsol pa// bag yod pa la brtson pas na// byang chub phyogs rnams yang dag skyes// 
145b6(1): thub chen rang yang grol gyur nas// de dag rnams ni 'jig rten 'grel/ lha'i bu nges par byung gi sol pa// byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dag/ ji snyed thar la rten pa'i rnams/ kun
145b7(1): kyang khyod la srab pa ste// bag yod pas ni nges par byung // lha'i bu bag yong gnas pas gsol pa// bag yod yongs sum btang bas// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyisas// 'gro ba 'di
146a1(1): / lam chags par// thams cad mkhyen du nges par byung / lha'i bu bag yong bsrungs kyis gsol pa// byang chub lam la bsnyen mdzad cing // khyod ni bag gis bsrungs
146a2(1): bsan// thugs rje chen po mkhas pa yis// byang chub dam pa brnyes par 'gyur/ lha'i bu bag yod btson gyis gsol pa// bag yod pa la brtson cing // mtshan tshad gcis pa rnasas
146a3(1): bgyis pas// dpa' ba chen po khyad kyis sras// lab kyi dkor yang zab par 'gyur// lha'i bu bag yong mngon par dga' bas gsol pa// bag yod dga' ba'i bstan pa rnams// de ga
146a4(1): sangs rgyas ye shes kyis// dpa' bo nyon mongs ri 'jigs pas// nga rgyal ri yang de bzhin bsil// lha'i bu bag yod 'dzin gyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas ye shes tshol mdzad che// 
146a5(1): khyod ni ngag gis bzung bas na// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// khyod kyi thugs ni skyom gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas brtson gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams de dag rang bzhin zhi// de ni sangs
146a6(1): rgyus spyod yul lags// byang chub yang dag gang zhugs dang // thams cad mkhyen pa der mi 'jigs// lnga'i gnas la yang dag par gnas pas// ni gnas bzhugs pa ste// 'an
146a7(1): dzin pas la ma ga/ semams na mangs ni ba ma sa// rdus tha ma ba bzhin// kwa'i thun panas rab tugs kyis sa mal pa/ yangs rgyam ya btus

146b2(1): kyis ni yongs su dul// bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs so// 'dod chags kyis ni gnod mi 'gyur// lha'i bu zhiganas nges par byung gis gsol pa// ni ba'i yid mnga' zhi gnas la// 
146b3(1): po chen po sgom mdzad pas// ci la gnas te bsam gan mdzad// sus kyang khyod kyis tshul la 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas sngon du 'gros gsol pa// ston pas sangs rgyas chos rnams kyi// 
146b4(1): sngon du zhi gnas 'gro zhes gsungs// gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba'i// chos gzhan de'i rjes su 'brang // lha'i bu zhi gnas rjesu 'brang gis gsol pa// 'jig rten sgron ma zhig rma
146b5(1): ni// sems kyi rtog pa dang bar bgyid// zhi ba'i sems ldan rnams kyi 'ching // de khyod mtha' yas dbang du mdzad// lha'i bu zhig nas spyod yul gyis gsol pa// chos rnams kun gyi
146b6(1): spyod yul ni// zhi gnas yid zhes 'dren pas gsungs// de la chags med spyod pa ni// rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu ni gnas brlan gyis gsol pa// bsam gtan/ 
146b7(1): gyis ni mngon brgyan te// shes rab kyis ni sems bsgoms pas// de phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes/ de bzhin skye bo rnams kyang 'dren// lha'i bu zhi gnas lhur len gyis gsol pa/ 
147a1(1): /  sh+tsa mas smra /  da sa shA // ts+tshi rnam mnas // 'a byu dungs par ltung // lha'i bumam ma thang mngan
147a2(1): gsol ba// dpa' bo chen po lhag mthong ni// chos rnams thams cad ston ste// de la khyod kyi sras spyod cing // rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu ldag mthong byung gis gsol pa/ 
147a3(1): rab pha rol phyin gnas shing // rnam par 'drer pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sman pa'i rgyal po sten pa ste/ de bas lhag mthong dge ba lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong rab gnas kyis gsol pa// chos rnam
147a4(1): thams cad bcal bgyis te// yang dag ji bzhin mthong gyur na/ brtan pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob// byang chub nyid la gnas par 'dod/ lha'i bu lhag mthong nges byung gis gsol pa// gang zas

147b7(1): dag 'jug gis gsol pa// dpa' ba chen po chos kun no// lhag mthong zhing yang dag 'dur// rang bzhini med par rnam mthong na// de ni rang byung byang chub lags// lha'i bu lcag mthong snying pos

148b1(1): sangs rgyas spyod yul gang mos pa// de dag ston pa mchod pa de ni bla na med// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'phags kyis gsol pa// gang gis 'dren pa 'phags gyur

152a7(1): tshor bzhin pas gsal pa// nga banyid kyis dngas med par// tshor bas khrod kyis rab tu mkhren/ khril ba sdu gu'i dpa' 'jag// de lam pa'i srub chags/ lha'i bu tshor ba mas
152b1(1): rtogs pas gsol pa// shes rab bcas pas yongs brtags na// tshor ba 'gro bar ma song zhing // 'ong ba med la dngos med par// de ni thub chen khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i 'tsha
152b2(1): ba dang bral bas gsol pa// tshor ba dang ni tshor ba po// rang bzhin med par khyod kyis gzigs// zab mo blta ka'i tshig de yang // khyod kyi sems can rnams la bstan// lha'i burtsa
152b3(1): ba'i rgyud la nges pas gsol pa// tshor ba de ni kun rdzob tsam// don dam nyid du mi dmigs te// khyod kyis sems can der btul bas// 'gro ba the tshom ma mchis gyur// lha'i bu tshor
152b4(1): ba la mkhas pas gsol pa// tshor ba'i phung po mkhas pa po// mkha' la rlung gyi dkyil 'khor bzhin// byis pa'i blo can rmongs bgyid pa// de ni khyod kyis yang dag gzigs// lha'i bu
152b5(1): tshor ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa// tshor ba'i phung po mngon khyen pa// rig cing rig pa mthar byon pa// mkhas pa rnams kyis mchog khyod kyis// tshor ba bdag med rab tu gzigs/ 
152b6(1): g+ha'i bu tshor ba las rgal bas gsol// gang gnyis gtso bo dam pa khyod// rgal dka' tshor ba'i mtsho las rgal// 'dam las rgal cing sdig med pa// byang chub mchog 'di sangs rgyas
152b7(1): byar// lha'i bu tshor ba las byung gyis gsol pa// rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten du// tshor ba rnams ni byung mkhyen nas// tshor ba'i phung po rabargal te// sangs rgyas 'jig rten chag
153a1(1): #/ mi mnga'// lnga'i bu tshor ba'i rig pas gsol ba// mi rnams bdag la gang 'chi ba'i// tshor ba thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen// nyon mongs zhags pas 'ching 'gyur ba// 
153a2(1): de'i rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems la mkhas pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sems kyis nyon mongs pam// bdud rnams kyang ni sra dkongs// sems de rang bzhin
153a3(1): ma mchis par// thub pa chen po khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems yongs su shes pas gsol pa// ci ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan po yis// sgyu ma'i sna tshogs sprul pa bzhin/ sem
153a4(1): na bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen// de phyir khyod la 'jig rten mchod// lha'i bu sems la yang dag par rtogs pas gsol pa// sgyu ma mkhan nam slob ma bzhin// gang gis 'am
153a5(1): ba 'di bcings pa'i// sems de khyod kyis yang dag nags// de ni khrod kyis ji bzhin khyen// lha'i bu sems kyis spyod pas gsol pa// sems kyi spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen/ 
153a6(1): rnam par 'dren pa rmi la man// ji ltar tshogs kyi grangs bzhin du// byis pa'i sems rmongs bgyid pa gzigs// lha'i bu sems kyis dbang phyug gis gisal ba// dul gyur lags
153a7(1): rung ba yi// sems kyi rang bzhin grags med pa// gang la 'jig non gnying mi rnyed// mtshan nyid brtan pa khyod kyis gzigs// lnga'i bu sems la dpa' bas gsol pa// gang gis sems
153b1(1): la sems med shes// mkhas pa sgyid lug mi 'gyur zhing // bdud sde rab tu 'dul bgyid pa// de dag 'dir ni dpa' zhes bgyi// lnga'i bu sems kyis yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa/ 
153b2(1): gang dag sems la sems med shes// de dag sangs rgyas sras lags te// dpa' chen sangs rgyas chos rnams la// skyes bu de dag yang dag 'phags// lha'i bu zhi ba'i sems kyis
153b3(1): gsol pa// gang gis sems la dbang bgyis pa// sems can de dag zhi ra ba ni// bdud kyi nags las rab grol bas// de dag bdud kyi dbang mi mchi// khwa'i bu sems mtshan pas
153b4(1): gsol pa// mi rnams gang dag sems mnyen zhing // bsnyen par dka' dang dpa' ba dang // khyod kyis bstan la gang mos pa// de dag 'dor bar zhum mi 'gyur// lha'i bu sems dag pas
153b5(1): gsol pa// sems dag las rnams gtsang gyur cing // yang dag rtogs pas spyod bgyid pa// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan thos na// zab mo rnams la zhum mi 'gyur// lha'i bu chos nyid la gnas pa
153b6(1): gsol pa// gang gis yid ni chos nyid la// rab tu dga' zhing thogs myed pa// de dag mi dbang sras po ste// zhi ba'i sar ni phyin pa lags// lha'i bu chos la sems pas gsol pa/ 
153b7(1): chos rnams thams cad chos dbyings su// 'dren pa de la bslabs pa yi// chos nyid la ni gang sems pa// de dag spyod yul ma yin med// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la nges par byed kyis
154a1(1): @#/ gsol pa// mi mchog khyod gi sras kyi rnams// chos kyi dbyings la nges byung ste// 'dren pa khyod kyi sras de dag/ mtshan nyid cig gis nges byung lags// lha'i bu chos
154a2(1): kyi dbyings kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa// chos rnams kun gyis spyod yul ni// chos kyi dbyings zhes rgyal bas gsungs// dpa' bo khyod ni gang spyod pa'i// ye shes de ni bsam mi khyab
154a3(1): lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas gsol pa// chos kyi dbyings la gang zhugs pa// de dag ye shes bsam yas te// sangs rgyas chos la the tshom med// sems can bsam la de dag
